2769 dns_message_logfmtpacket(fctx->qmessage, "sending packet to",
2770 &query->addrinfo->sockaddr,
2771 DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
2772 DNS_LOGMODULE_PACKETS,
2773 &dns_master_style_comment,
2774 ISC_LOG_DEBUG(11),
2775 fctx->res->mctx);
2776
2777 /*
2778 * We're now done with the query message.
2779 */
2780 dns_message_reset(fctx->qmessage, DNS_MESSAGE_INTENTRENDER);
2781
2782 if (query->exclusivesocket)
2783 sock = dns_dispatch_getentrysocket(query->dispentry);
2784 else
2785 sock = dns_dispatch_getsocket(query->dispatch);
2786 /*
2787 * Send the query!
2788 */
2789 if (!tcp) {
2790 address = &query->addrinfo->sockaddr;
2791 if (query->exclusivesocket) {
2792 result = isc_socket_connect(sock, address, task,
2793 resquery_udpconnected,
2794 query);
2795 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2796 goto cleanup_message;
2797 query->connects++;
2798 }
2799 }
2800 isc_buffer_usedregion(buffer, &r);
2801
2802 /*
2803 * XXXRTH Make sure we don't send to ourselves! We should probably
2804 * prune out these addresses when we get them from the ADB.
2805 */
2806 memset(&query->sendevent, 0, sizeof(query->sendevent));
2807 ISC_EVENT_INIT(&query->sendevent, sizeof(query->sendevent), 0, NULL,
2808 ISC_SOCKEVENT_SENDDONE, resquery_senddone, query,
2809 NULL, NULL, NULL);
2810
2811 if (query->dscp == -1) {
2812 query->sendevent.attributes &= ~ISC_SOCKEVENTATTR_DSCP;
2813 query->sendevent.dscp = 0;
2814 } else {
2815 query->sendevent.attributes |= ISC_SOCKEVENTATTR_DSCP;
2816 query->sendevent.dscp = query->dscp;
2817 if (tcp)
2818 isc_socket_dscp(sock, query->dscp);
2819 }
2820
2821 result = isc_socket_sendto2(sock, &r, task, address, NULL,
2822 &query->sendevent, 0);
2823 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2824
2825 query->sends++;
2826
2827 QTRACE("sent");
2828
2829#ifdef HAVE_DNSTAP
2830 /*
2831 * Log the outgoing query via dnstap.
2832 */
2833 if ((fctx->qmessage->flags & DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_RD) != 0)
2834 dtmsgtype = DNS_DTTYPE_FQ;
2835 else
2836 dtmsgtype = DNS_DTTYPE_RQ;
2837
2838 result = isc_socket_getsockname(sock, &localaddr);
2839 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2840 la = &localaddr;
2841
2842 dns_dt_send(fctx->res->view, dtmsgtype, la, &query->addrinfo->sockaddr,
2843 tcp, &zr, &query->start, NULL, &query->buffer);
2844#endif /* HAVE_DNSTAP */
2845
2846 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2847
2848 cleanup_message:
2849 if (cleanup_cctx)
2850 dns_compress_invalidate(&cctx);
2851
2852 dns_message_reset(fctx->qmessage, DNS_MESSAGE_INTENTRENDER);
2853
2854 /*
2855 * Stop the dispatcher from listening.
2856 */
2857 dns_dispatch_removeresponse(&query->dispentry, NULL);
2858
2859 cleanup_temps:
2860 if (qname != NULL)
2861 dns_message_puttempname(fctx->qmessage, &qname);
2862 if (qrdataset != NULL)
2863 dns_message_puttemprdataset(fctx->qmessage, &qrdataset);
2864
2865 return (result);
2866}
2867
2868static void
2869resquery_connected(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
2870 isc_socketevent_t *sevent = (isc_socketevent_t *)event;
2871 resquery_t *query = event->ev_arg;
2872 bool retry = false;
2873 isc_interval_t interval;
2874 isc_result_t result;
2875 unsigned int attrs;
2876 fetchctx_t *fctx;
2877
2878 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == ISC_SOCKEVENT_CONNECT);
2879 REQUIRE(VALID_QUERY(query));
2880
2881 QTRACE("connected");
2882
2883 UNUSED(task);
2884
2885 /*
2886 * XXXRTH
2887 *
2888 * Currently we don't wait for the connect event before retrying
2889 * a query. This means that if we get really behind, we may end
2890 * up doing extra work!
2891 */
2892
2893 query->connects--;
2894 fctx = query->fctx;
2895
2896 if (RESQUERY_CANCELED(query)) {
2897 /*
2898 * This query was canceled while the connect() was in
2899 * progress.
2900 */
2901 isc_socket_detach(&query->tcpsocket);
2902 resquery_destroy(&query);
2903 } else {
2904 switch (sevent->result) {
2905 case ISC_R_SUCCESS:
2906
2907 /*
2908 * Extend the idle timer for TCP. 20 seconds
2909 * should be long enough for a TCP connection to be
2910 * established, a single DNS request to be sent,
2911 * and the response received.
2912 */
2913 isc_interval_set(&interval, 20, 0);
2914 result = fctx_startidletimer(query->fctx, &interval);
2915 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2916 FCTXTRACE("query canceled: idle timer failed; "
2917 "responding");
2918
2919 fctx_cancelquery(&query, NULL, NULL, false,
2920 false);
2921 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
2922 break;
2923 }
2924 /*
2925 * We are connected. Create a dispatcher and
2926 * send the query.
2927 */
2928 attrs = 0;
2929 attrs |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_TCP;
2930 attrs |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_PRIVATE;
2931 attrs |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_CONNECTED;
2932 if (isc_sockaddr_pf(&query->addrinfo->sockaddr) ==
2933 AF_INET)
2934 attrs |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_IPV4;
2935 else
2936 attrs |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_IPV6;
2937 attrs |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_MAKEQUERY;
2938
2939 result = dns_dispatch_createtcp(query->dispatchmgr,
2940 query->tcpsocket,
2941 query->fctx->res->taskmgr,
2942 NULL, NULL,
2943 4096, 2, 1, 1, 3,
2944 attrs,
2945 &query->dispatch);
2946
2947 /*
2948 * Regardless of whether dns_dispatch_create()
2949 * succeeded or not, we don't need our reference
2950 * to the socket anymore.
2951 */
2952 isc_socket_detach(&query->tcpsocket);
2953
2954 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2955 result = resquery_send(query);
2956
2957 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2958 FCTXTRACE("query canceled: "
2959 "resquery_send() failed; responding");
2960
2961 fctx_cancelquery(&query, NULL, NULL,
2962 false, false);
2963 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
2964 }
2965 break;
2966
2967 case ISC_R_NETUNREACH:
2968 case ISC_R_HOSTUNREACH:
2969 case ISC_R_CONNREFUSED:
2970 case ISC_R_NOPERM:
2971 case ISC_R_ADDRNOTAVAIL:
2972 case ISC_R_CONNECTIONRESET:
2973 FCTXTRACE3("query canceled in connected(): "
2974 "no route to host; no response",
2975 sevent->result);
2976
2977 /*
2978 * No route to remote.
2979 */
2980 isc_socket_detach(&query->tcpsocket);
2981 fctx_cancelquery(&query, NULL, NULL,
2982 true, false);
2983 retry = true;
2984 break;
2985
2986 default:
2987 FCTXTRACE3("query canceled in connected() due to "
2988 "unexpected event result; responding",
2989 sevent->result);
2990
2991 isc_socket_detach(&query->tcpsocket);
2992 fctx_cancelquery(&query, NULL, NULL,
2993 false, false);
2994 break;
2995 }
2996 }
2997
2998 isc_event_free(&event);
2999
3000 if (retry) {
3001 /*
3002 * Behave as if the idle timer has expired. For TCP
3003 * connections this may not actually reflect the latest timer.
3004 */
3005 fctx->attributes &= ~FCTX_ATTR_ADDRWAIT;
3006 result = fctx_stopidletimer(fctx);
3007 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
3008 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
3009 else
3010 fctx_try(fctx, true, false);
3011 }
3012}
3013
3014static void
3015fctx_finddone(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
3016 fetchctx_t *fctx;
3017 dns_adbfind_t *find;
3018 dns_resolver_t *res;
3019 bool want_try = false;
3020 bool want_done = false;
3021 bool bucket_empty = false;
3022 unsigned int bucketnum;
3023 bool dodestroy = false;
3024
3025 find = event->ev_sender;
3026 fctx = event->ev_arg;
3027 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
3028 res = fctx->res;
3029
3030 UNUSED(task);
3031
3032 FCTXTRACE("finddone");
3033
3034 bucketnum = fctx->bucketnum;
3035 LOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
3036
3037 INSIST(fctx->pending > 0);
3038 fctx->pending--;
3039
3040 if (ADDRWAIT(fctx)) {
3041 /*
3042 * The fetch is waiting for a name to be found.
3043 */
3044 INSIST(!SHUTTINGDOWN(fctx));
3045 if (event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_ADBMOREADDRESSES) {
3046 fctx->attributes &= ~FCTX_ATTR_ADDRWAIT;
3047 want_try = true;
3048 } else {
3049 fctx->findfail++;
3050 if (fctx->pending == 0) {
3051 /*
3052 * We've got nothing else to wait for and don't
3053 * know the answer. There's nothing to do but
3054 * fail the fctx.
3055 */
3056 fctx->attributes &= ~FCTX_ATTR_ADDRWAIT;
3057 want_done = true;
3058 }
3059 }
3060 } else if (SHUTTINGDOWN(fctx) && fctx->pending == 0 &&
3061 fctx->nqueries == 0 && ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->validators)) {
3062
3063 if (fctx->references == 0) {
3064 bucket_empty = fctx_unlink(fctx);
3065 dodestroy = true;
3066 }
3067 }
3068 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
3069
3070 isc_event_free(&event);
3071 dns_adb_destroyfind(&find);
3072
3073 if (want_try) {
3074 fctx_try(fctx, true, false);
3075 } else if (want_done) {
3076 FCTXTRACE("fetch failed in finddone(); return ISC_R_FAILURE");
3077 fctx_done(fctx, ISC_R_FAILURE, __LINE__);
3078 } else if (dodestroy) {
3079 fctx_destroy(fctx);
3080 if (bucket_empty)
3081 empty_bucket(res);
3082 }
3083}
3084
3085
3086static inline bool
3087bad_server(fetchctx_t *fctx, isc_sockaddr_t *address) {
3088 isc_sockaddr_t *sa;
3089
3090 for (sa = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->bad);
3091 sa != NULL;
3092 sa = ISC_LIST_NEXT(sa, link)) {
3093 if (isc_sockaddr_equal(sa, address))
3094 return (true);
3095 }
3096
3097 return (false);
3098}
3099
3100static inline bool
3101mark_bad(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
3102 dns_adbfind_t *curr;
3103 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo;
3104 bool all_bad = true;
3105
3106#ifdef ENABLE_AFL
3107 if (dns_fuzzing_resolver) {
3108 return (false);
3109 }
3110#endif
3111
3112 /*
3113 * Mark all known bad servers, so we don't try to talk to them
3114 * again.
3115 */
3116
3117 /*
3118 * Mark any bad nameservers.
3119 */
3120 for (curr = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->finds);
3121 curr != NULL;
3122 curr = ISC_LIST_NEXT(curr, publink)) {
3123 for (addrinfo = ISC_LIST_HEAD(curr->list);
3124 addrinfo != NULL;
3125 addrinfo = ISC_LIST_NEXT(addrinfo, publink)) {
3126 if (bad_server(fctx, &addrinfo->sockaddr))
3127 addrinfo->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3128 else
3129 all_bad = false;
3130 }
3131 }
3132
3133 /*
3134 * Mark any bad forwarders.
3135 */
3136 for (addrinfo = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->forwaddrs);
3137 addrinfo != NULL;
3138 addrinfo = ISC_LIST_NEXT(addrinfo, publink)) {
3139 if (bad_server(fctx, &addrinfo->sockaddr))
3140 addrinfo->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3141 else
3142 all_bad = false;
3143 }
3144
3145 /*
3146 * Mark any bad alternates.
3147 */
3148 for (curr = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->altfinds);
3149 curr != NULL;
3150 curr = ISC_LIST_NEXT(curr, publink)) {
3151 for (addrinfo = ISC_LIST_HEAD(curr->list);
3152 addrinfo != NULL;
3153 addrinfo = ISC_LIST_NEXT(addrinfo, publink)) {
3154 if (bad_server(fctx, &addrinfo->sockaddr))
3155 addrinfo->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3156 else
3157 all_bad = false;
3158 }
3159 }
3160
3161 for (addrinfo = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->altaddrs);
3162 addrinfo != NULL;
3163 addrinfo = ISC_LIST_NEXT(addrinfo, publink)) {
3164 if (bad_server(fctx, &addrinfo->sockaddr))
3165 addrinfo->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3166 else
3167 all_bad = false;
3168 }
3169
3170 return (all_bad);
3171}
3172
3173static void
3174add_bad(fetchctx_t *fctx, dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo, isc_result_t reason,
3175 badnstype_t badtype)
3176{
3177 char namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
3178 char addrbuf[ISC_SOCKADDR_FORMATSIZE];
3179 char classbuf[64];
3180 char typebuf[64];
3181 char code[64];
3182 isc_buffer_t b;
3183 isc_sockaddr_t *sa;
3184 const char *spc = "";
3185 isc_sockaddr_t *address = &addrinfo->sockaddr;
3186
3187#ifdef ENABLE_AFL
3188 if (dns_fuzzing_resolver)
3189 return;
3190#endif
3191
3192 if (reason == DNS_R_LAME)
3193 fctx->lamecount++;
3194 else {
3195 switch (badtype) {
3196 case badns_unreachable:
3197 fctx->neterr++;
3198 break;
3199 case badns_response:
3200 fctx->badresp++;
3201 break;
3202 case badns_validation:
3203 break; /* counted as 'valfail' */
3204 case badns_forwarder:
3205 /*
3206 * We were called to prevent the given forwarder from
3207 * being used again for this fetch context.
3208 */
3209 break;
3210 }
3211 }
3212
3213 if (bad_server(fctx, address)) {
3214 /*
3215 * We already know this server is bad.
3216 */
3217 return;
3218 }
3219
3220 FCTXTRACE("add_bad");
3221
3222 sa = isc_mem_get(fctx->mctx, sizeof(*sa));
3223 if (sa == NULL)
3224 return;
3225 *sa = *address;
3226 ISC_LIST_INITANDAPPEND(fctx->bad, sa, link);
3227
3228 if (reason == DNS_R_LAME) /* already logged */
3229 return;
3230
3231 if (reason == DNS_R_UNEXPECTEDRCODE &&
3232 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_servfail &&
3233 ISFORWARDER(addrinfo))
3234 return;
3235
3236 if (reason == DNS_R_UNEXPECTEDRCODE) {
3237 isc_buffer_init(&b, code, sizeof(code) - 1);
3238 dns_rcode_totext(fctx->rmessage->rcode, &b);
3239 code[isc_buffer_usedlength(&b)] = '\0';
3240 spc = " ";
3241 } else if (reason == DNS_R_UNEXPECTEDOPCODE) {
3242 isc_buffer_init(&b, code, sizeof(code) - 1);
3243 dns_opcode_totext((dns_opcode_t)fctx->rmessage->opcode, &b);
3244 code[isc_buffer_usedlength(&b)] = '\0';
3245 spc = " ";
3246 } else {
3247 code[0] = '\0';
3248 }
3249 dns_name_format(&fctx->name, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
3250 dns_rdatatype_format(fctx->type, typebuf, sizeof(typebuf));
3251 dns_rdataclass_format(fctx->res->rdclass, classbuf, sizeof(classbuf));
3252 isc_sockaddr_format(address, addrbuf, sizeof(addrbuf));
3253 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_LAME_SERVERS,
3254 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_INFO,
3255 "%s%s%s resolving '%s/%s/%s': %s",
3256 code, spc, dns_result_totext(reason),
3257 namebuf, typebuf, classbuf, addrbuf);
3258}
3259
3260/*
3261 * Sort addrinfo list by RTT.
3262 */
3263static void
3264sort_adbfind(dns_adbfind_t *find, unsigned int bias) {
3265 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *best, *curr;
3266 dns_adbaddrinfolist_t sorted;
3267 unsigned int best_srtt, curr_srtt;
3268
3269 /* Lame N^2 bubble sort. */
3270 ISC_LIST_INIT(sorted);
3271 while (!ISC_LIST_EMPTY(find->list)) {
3272 best = ISC_LIST_HEAD(find->list);
3273 best_srtt = best->srtt;
3274 if (isc_sockaddr_pf(&best->sockaddr) != AF_INET6)
3275 best_srtt += bias;
3276 curr = ISC_LIST_NEXT(best, publink);
3277 while (curr != NULL) {
3278 curr_srtt = curr->srtt;
3279 if (isc_sockaddr_pf(&curr->sockaddr) != AF_INET6)
3280 curr_srtt += bias;
3281 if (curr_srtt < best_srtt) {
3282 best = curr;
3283 best_srtt = curr_srtt;
3284 }
3285 curr = ISC_LIST_NEXT(curr, publink);
3286 }
3287 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(find->list, best, publink);
3288 ISC_LIST_APPEND(sorted, best, publink);
3289 }
3290 find->list = sorted;
3291}
3292
3293/*
3294 * Sort a list of finds by server RTT.
3295 */
3296static void
3297sort_finds(dns_adbfindlist_t *findlist, unsigned int bias) {
3298 dns_adbfind_t *best, *curr;
3299 dns_adbfindlist_t sorted;
3300 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo, *bestaddrinfo;
3301 unsigned int best_srtt, curr_srtt;
3302
3303 /* Sort each find's addrinfo list by SRTT. */
3304 for (curr = ISC_LIST_HEAD(*findlist);
3305 curr != NULL;
3306 curr = ISC_LIST_NEXT(curr, publink))
3307 sort_adbfind(curr, bias);
3308
3309 /* Lame N^2 bubble sort. */
3310 ISC_LIST_INIT(sorted);
3311 while (!ISC_LIST_EMPTY(*findlist)) {
3312 best = ISC_LIST_HEAD(*findlist);
3313 bestaddrinfo = ISC_LIST_HEAD(best->list);
3314 INSIST(bestaddrinfo != NULL);
3315 best_srtt = bestaddrinfo->srtt;
3316 if (isc_sockaddr_pf(&bestaddrinfo->sockaddr) != AF_INET6)
3317 best_srtt += bias;
3318 curr = ISC_LIST_NEXT(best, publink);
3319 while (curr != NULL) {
3320 addrinfo = ISC_LIST_HEAD(curr->list);
3321 INSIST(addrinfo != NULL);
3322 curr_srtt = addrinfo->srtt;
3323 if (isc_sockaddr_pf(&addrinfo->sockaddr) != AF_INET6)
3324 curr_srtt += bias;
3325 if (curr_srtt < best_srtt) {
3326 best = curr;
3327 best_srtt = curr_srtt;
3328 }
3329 curr = ISC_LIST_NEXT(curr, publink);
3330 }
3331 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(*findlist, best, publink);
3332 ISC_LIST_APPEND(sorted, best, publink);
3333 }
3334 *findlist = sorted;
3335}
3336
3337static void
3338findname(fetchctx_t *fctx, const dns_name_t *name, in_port_t port,
3339 unsigned int options, unsigned int flags, isc_stdtime_t now,
3340 bool *overquota, bool *need_alternate)
3341{
3342 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *ai;
3343 dns_adbfind_t *find;
3344 dns_resolver_t *res;
3345 bool unshared;
3346 isc_result_t result;
3347
3348 FCTXTRACE("FINDNAME");
3349 res = fctx->res;
3350 unshared = ((fctx->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_UNSHARED) != 0);
3351 /*
3352 * If this name is a subdomain of the query domain, tell
3353 * the ADB to start looking using zone/hint data. This keeps us
3354 * from getting stuck if the nameserver is beneath the zone cut
3355 * and we don't know its address (e.g. because the A record has
3356 * expired).
3357 */
3358 if (dns_name_issubdomain(name, &fctx->domain))
3359 options |= DNS_ADBFIND_STARTATZONE;
3360 options |= DNS_ADBFIND_GLUEOK;
3361 options |= DNS_ADBFIND_HINTOK;
3362
3363 /*
3364 * See what we know about this address.
3365 */
3366 find = NULL;
3367 result = dns_adb_createfind(fctx->adb,
3368 res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].task,
3369 fctx_finddone, fctx, name,
3370 &fctx->name, fctx->type,
3371 options, now, NULL,
3372 res->view->dstport,
3373 fctx->depth + 1, fctx->qc, &find);
3374 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
3375 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_DEBUG(3),
3376 "fctx %p(%s): createfind for %p/%d - %s",
3377 fctx, fctx->info, fctx->client, fctx->id,
3378 isc_result_totext(result));
3379 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
3380 if (result == DNS_R_ALIAS) {
3381 char namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
3382
3383 /*
3384 * XXXRTH Follow the CNAME/DNAME chain?
3385 */
3386 dns_adb_destroyfind(&find);
3387 fctx->adberr++;
3388 dns_name_format(name, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
3389 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_CNAME,
3390 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_INFO,
3391 "skipping nameserver '%s' because it "
3392 "is a CNAME, while resolving '%s'",
3393 namebuf, fctx->info);
3394 }
3395 } else if (!ISC_LIST_EMPTY(find->list)) {
3396 /*
3397 * We have at least some of the addresses for the
3398 * name.
3399 */
3400 INSIST((find->options & DNS_ADBFIND_WANTEVENT) == 0);
3401 if (flags != 0 || port != 0) {
3402 for (ai = ISC_LIST_HEAD(find->list);
3403 ai != NULL;
3404 ai = ISC_LIST_NEXT(ai, publink)) {
3405 ai->flags |= flags;
3406 if (port != 0)
3407 isc_sockaddr_setport(&ai->sockaddr,
3408 port);
3409 }
3410 }
3411 if ((flags & FCTX_ADDRINFO_FORWARDER) != 0)
3412 ISC_LIST_APPEND(fctx->altfinds, find, publink);
3413 else
3414 ISC_LIST_APPEND(fctx->finds, find, publink);
3415 } else {
3416 /*
3417 * We don't know any of the addresses for this
3418 * name.
3419 */
3420 if ((find->options & DNS_ADBFIND_WANTEVENT) != 0) {
3421 /*
3422 * We're looking for them and will get an
3423 * event about it later.
3424 */
3425 fctx->pending++;
3426 /*
3427 * Bootstrap.
3428 */
3429 if (need_alternate != NULL &&
3430 !*need_alternate && unshared &&
3431 ((res->dispatches4 == NULL &&
3432 find->result_v6 != DNS_R_NXDOMAIN) ||
3433 (res->dispatches6 == NULL &&
3434 find->result_v4 != DNS_R_NXDOMAIN)))
3435 *need_alternate = true;
3436 } else {
3437 if ((find->options & DNS_ADBFIND_OVERQUOTA) != 0) {
3438 if (overquota != NULL)
3439 *overquota = true;
3440 fctx->quotacount++; /* quota exceeded */
3441 }
3442 else if ((find->options & DNS_ADBFIND_LAMEPRUNED) != 0)
3443 fctx->lamecount++; /* cached lame server */
3444 else
3445 fctx->adberr++; /* unreachable server, etc. */
3446
3447 /*
3448 * If we know there are no addresses for
3449 * the family we are using then try to add
3450 * an alternative server.
3451 */
3452 if (need_alternate != NULL && !*need_alternate &&
3453 ((res->dispatches4 == NULL &&
3454 find->result_v6 == DNS_R_NXRRSET) ||
3455 (res->dispatches6 == NULL &&
3456 find->result_v4 == DNS_R_NXRRSET)))
3457 *need_alternate = true;
3458 dns_adb_destroyfind(&find);
3459 }
3460 }
3461}
3462
3463static bool
3464isstrictsubdomain(const dns_name_t *name1, const dns_name_t *name2) {
3465 int order;
3466 unsigned int nlabels;
3467 dns_namereln_t namereln;
3468
3469 namereln = dns_name_fullcompare(name1, name2, &order, &nlabels);
3470 return (namereln == dns_namereln_subdomain);
3471}
3472
3473static isc_result_t
3474fctx_getaddresses(fetchctx_t *fctx, bool badcache) {
3475 dns_rdata_t rdata = DNS_RDATA_INIT;
3476 isc_result_t result;
3477 dns_resolver_t *res;
3478 isc_stdtime_t now;
3479 unsigned int stdoptions = 0;
3480 dns_forwarder_t *fwd;
3481 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *ai;
3482 bool all_bad;
3483 dns_rdata_ns_t ns;
3484 bool need_alternate = false;
3485 bool all_spilled = true;
3486
3487 FCTXTRACE5("getaddresses", "fctx->depth=", fctx->depth);
3488
3489 /*
3490 * Don't pound on remote servers. (Failsafe!)
3491 */
3492 fctx->restarts++;
3493 if (fctx->restarts > 100) {
3494 FCTXTRACE("too many restarts");
3495 return (DNS_R_SERVFAIL);
3496 }
3497
3498 res = fctx->res;
3499
3500 if (fctx->depth > res->maxdepth) {
3501 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
3502 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_DEBUG(3),
3503 "too much NS indirection resolving '%s' "
3504 "(depth=%u, maxdepth=%u)",
3505 fctx->info, fctx->depth, res->maxdepth);
3506 return (DNS_R_SERVFAIL);
3507 }
3508
3509 /*
3510 * Forwarders.
3511 */
3512
3513 INSIST(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->forwaddrs));
3514 INSIST(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->altaddrs));
3515
3516 /*
3517 * If we have DNS_FETCHOPT_NOFORWARD set and forwarding policy
3518 * allows us to not forward - skip forwarders and go straight
3519 * to NSes. This is currently used to make sure that priming query
3520 * gets root servers' IP addresses in ADDITIONAL section.
3521 */
3522 if ((fctx->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOFORWARD) != 0 &&
3523 (fctx->fwdpolicy != dns_fwdpolicy_only))
3524 {
3525 goto normal_nses;
3526 }
3527
3528 /*
3529 * If this fctx has forwarders, use them; otherwise use any
3530 * selective forwarders specified in the view; otherwise use the
3531 * resolver's forwarders (if any).
3532 */
3533 fwd = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->forwarders);
3534 if (fwd == NULL) {
3535 dns_forwarders_t *forwarders = NULL;
3536 dns_name_t *name = &fctx->name;
3537 dns_name_t suffix;
3538 unsigned int labels;
3539 dns_fixedname_t fixed;
3540 dns_name_t *domain;
3541
3542 /*
3543 * DS records are found in the parent server.
3544 * Strip label to get the correct forwarder (if any).
3545 */
3546 if (dns_rdatatype_atparent(fctx->type) &&
3547 dns_name_countlabels(name) > 1) {
3548 dns_name_init(&suffix, NULL);
3549 labels = dns_name_countlabels(name);
3550 dns_name_getlabelsequence(name, 1, labels - 1, &suffix);
3551 name = &suffix;
3552 }
3553
3554 domain = dns_fixedname_initname(&fixed);
3555 result = dns_fwdtable_find(res->view->fwdtable, name,
3556 domain, &forwarders);
3557 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
3558 fwd = ISC_LIST_HEAD(forwarders->fwdrs);
3559 fctx->fwdpolicy = forwarders->fwdpolicy;
3560 if (fctx->fwdpolicy == dns_fwdpolicy_only &&
3561 isstrictsubdomain(domain, &fctx->domain)) {
3562 fcount_decr(fctx);
3563 dns_name_free(&fctx->domain, fctx->mctx);
3564 dns_name_init(&fctx->domain, NULL);
3565 result = dns_name_dup(domain, fctx->mctx,
3566 &fctx->domain);
3567 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
3568 return (result);
3569 result = fcount_incr(fctx, true);
3570 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
3571 return (result);
3572 }
3573 }
3574 }
3575
3576 while (fwd != NULL) {
3577 if ((isc_sockaddr_pf(&fwd->addr) == AF_INET &&
3578 res->dispatches4 == NULL) ||
3579 (isc_sockaddr_pf(&fwd->addr) == AF_INET6 &&
3580 res->dispatches6 == NULL))
3581 {
3582 fwd = ISC_LIST_NEXT(fwd, link);
3583 continue;
3584 }
3585 ai = NULL;
3586 result = dns_adb_findaddrinfo(fctx->adb, &fwd->addr, &ai, 0);
3587 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
3588 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *cur;
3589 ai->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_FORWARDER;
3590 ai->dscp = fwd->dscp;
3591 cur = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->forwaddrs);
3592 while (cur != NULL && cur->srtt < ai->srtt)
3593 cur = ISC_LIST_NEXT(cur, publink);
3594 if (cur != NULL)
3595 ISC_LIST_INSERTBEFORE(fctx->forwaddrs, cur,
3596 ai, publink);
3597 else
3598 ISC_LIST_APPEND(fctx->forwaddrs, ai, publink);
3599 }
3600 fwd = ISC_LIST_NEXT(fwd, link);
3601 }
3602
3603 /*
3604 * If the forwarding policy is "only", we don't need the addresses
3605 * of the nameservers.
3606 */
3607 if (fctx->fwdpolicy == dns_fwdpolicy_only)
3608 goto out;
3609
3610 /*
3611 * Normal nameservers.
3612 */
3613 normal_nses:
3614 stdoptions = DNS_ADBFIND_WANTEVENT | DNS_ADBFIND_EMPTYEVENT;
3615 if (fctx->restarts == 1) {
3616 /*
3617 * To avoid sending out a flood of queries likely to
3618 * result in NXRRSET, we suppress fetches for address
3619 * families we don't have the first time through,
3620 * provided that we have addresses in some family we
3621 * can use.
3622 *
3623 * We don't want to set this option all the time, since
3624 * if fctx->restarts > 1, we've clearly been having trouble
3625 * with the addresses we had, so getting more could help.
3626 */
3627 stdoptions |= DNS_ADBFIND_AVOIDFETCHES;
3628 }
3629 if (res->dispatches4 != NULL)
3630 stdoptions |= DNS_ADBFIND_INET;
3631 if (res->dispatches6 != NULL)
3632 stdoptions |= DNS_ADBFIND_INET6;
3633
3634 if ((stdoptions & DNS_ADBFIND_ADDRESSMASK) == 0)
3635 return (DNS_R_SERVFAIL);
3636
3637 isc_stdtime_get(&now);
3638
3639 INSIST(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->finds));
3640 INSIST(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->altfinds));
3641
3642 for (result = dns_rdataset_first(&fctx->nameservers);
3643 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS;
3644 result = dns_rdataset_next(&fctx->nameservers))
3645 {
3646 bool overquota = false;
3647
3648 dns_rdataset_current(&fctx->nameservers, &rdata);
3649 /*
3650 * Extract the name from the NS record.
3651 */
3652 result = dns_rdata_tostruct(&rdata, &ns, NULL);
3653 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
3654 continue;
3655
3656 findname(fctx, &ns.name, 0, stdoptions, 0, now,
3657 &overquota, &need_alternate);
3658
3659 if (!overquota)
3660 all_spilled = false;
3661
3662 dns_rdata_reset(&rdata);
3663 dns_rdata_freestruct(&ns);
3664 }
3665 if (result != ISC_R_NOMORE)
3666 return (result);
3667
3668 /*
3669 * Do we need to use 6 to 4?
3670 */
3671 if (need_alternate) {
3672 int family;
3673 alternate_t *a;
3674 family = (res->dispatches6 != NULL) ? AF_INET6 : AF_INET;
3675 for (a = ISC_LIST_HEAD(res->alternates);
3676 a != NULL;
3677 a = ISC_LIST_NEXT(a, link)) {
3678 if (!a->isaddress) {
3679 findname(fctx, &a->_u._n.name, a->_u._n.port,
3680 stdoptions, FCTX_ADDRINFO_FORWARDER,
3681 now, NULL, NULL);
3682 continue;
3683 }
3684 if (isc_sockaddr_pf(&a->_u.addr) != family)
3685 continue;
3686 ai = NULL;
3687 result = dns_adb_findaddrinfo(fctx->adb, &a->_u.addr,
3688 &ai, 0);
3689 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
3690 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *cur;
3691 ai->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_FORWARDER;
3692 cur = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->altaddrs);
3693 while (cur != NULL && cur->srtt < ai->srtt)
3694 cur = ISC_LIST_NEXT(cur, publink);
3695 if (cur != NULL)
3696 ISC_LIST_INSERTBEFORE(fctx->altaddrs,
3697 cur, ai, publink);
3698 else
3699 ISC_LIST_APPEND(fctx->altaddrs, ai,
3700 publink);
3701 }
3702 }
3703 }
3704
3705 out:
3706 /*
3707 * Mark all known bad servers.
3708 */
3709 all_bad = mark_bad(fctx);
3710
3711 /*
3712 * How are we doing?
3713 */
3714 if (all_bad) {
3715 /*
3716 * We've got no addresses.
3717 */
3718 if (fctx->pending > 0) {
3719 /*
3720 * We're fetching the addresses, but don't have any
3721 * yet. Tell the caller to wait for an answer.
3722 */
3723 result = DNS_R_WAIT;
3724 } else {
3725 isc_time_t expire;
3726 isc_interval_t i;
3727 /*
3728 * We've lost completely. We don't know any
3729 * addresses, and the ADB has told us it can't get
3730 * them.
3731 */
3732 FCTXTRACE("no addresses");
3733 isc_interval_set(&i, DNS_RESOLVER_BADCACHETTL(fctx), 0);
3734 result = isc_time_nowplusinterval(&expire, &i);
3735 if (badcache &&
3736 (fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_dnskey ||
3737 fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_dlv ||
3738 fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_ds) &&
3739 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
3740 dns_resolver_addbadcache(res, &fctx->name,
3741 fctx->type, &expire);
3742
3743 result = ISC_R_FAILURE;
3744
3745 /*
3746 * If all of the addresses found were over the
3747 * fetches-per-server quota, return the configured
3748 * response.
3749 */
3750 if (all_spilled) {
3751 result = res->quotaresp[dns_quotatype_server];
3752 inc_stats(res, dns_resstatscounter_serverquota);
3753 }
3754 }
3755 } else {
3756 /*
3757 * We've found some addresses. We might still be looking
3758 * for more addresses.
3759 */
3760 sort_finds(&fctx->finds, res->view->v6bias);
3761 sort_finds(&fctx->altfinds, 0);
3762 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
3763 }
3764
3765 return (result);
3766}
3767
3768static inline void
3769possibly_mark(fetchctx_t *fctx, dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addr) {
3770 isc_netaddr_t na;
3771 char buf[ISC_NETADDR_FORMATSIZE];
3772 isc_sockaddr_t *sa;
3773 bool aborted = false;
3774 bool bogus;
3775 dns_acl_t *blackhole;
3776 isc_netaddr_t ipaddr;
3777 dns_peer_t *peer = NULL;
3778 dns_resolver_t *res;
3779 const char *msg = NULL;
3780
3781 sa = &addr->sockaddr;
3782
3783 res = fctx->res;
3784 isc_netaddr_fromsockaddr(&ipaddr, sa);
3785 blackhole = dns_dispatchmgr_getblackhole(res->dispatchmgr);
3786 (void) dns_peerlist_peerbyaddr(res->view->peers, &ipaddr, &peer);
3787
3788 if (blackhole != NULL) {
3789 int match;
3790
3791 if ((dns_acl_match(&ipaddr, NULL, blackhole,
3792 &res->view->aclenv, &match,
3793 NULL) == ISC_R_SUCCESS) &&
3794 match > 0)
3795 {
3796 aborted = true;
3797 }
3798 }
3799
3800 if (peer != NULL &&
3801 dns_peer_getbogus(peer, &bogus) == ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
3802 bogus)
3803 aborted = true;
3804
3805 if (aborted) {
3806 addr->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3807 msg = "ignoring blackholed / bogus server: ";
3808 } else if (isc_sockaddr_isnetzero(sa)) {
3809 addr->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3810 msg = "ignoring net zero address: ";
3811 } else if (isc_sockaddr_ismulticast(sa)) {
3812 addr->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3813 msg = "ignoring multicast address: ";
3814 } else if (isc_sockaddr_isexperimental(sa)) {
3815 addr->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3816 msg = "ignoring experimental address: ";
3817 } else if (sa->type.sa.sa_family != AF_INET6) {
3818 return;
3819 } else if (IN6_IS_ADDR_V4MAPPED(&sa->type.sin6.sin6_addr)) {
3820 addr->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3821 msg = "ignoring IPv6 mapped IPV4 address: ";
3822 } else if (IN6_IS_ADDR_V4COMPAT(&sa->type.sin6.sin6_addr)) {
3823 addr->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3824 msg = "ignoring IPv6 compatibility IPV4 address: ";
3825 } else
3826 return;
3827
3828 if (isc_log_wouldlog(dns_lctx, ISC_LOG_DEBUG(3))) {
3829 isc_netaddr_fromsockaddr(&na, sa);
3830 isc_netaddr_format(&na, buf, sizeof(buf));
3831 FCTXTRACE2(msg, buf);
3832 }
3833}
3834
3835static inline dns_adbaddrinfo_t *
3836fctx_nextaddress(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
3837 dns_adbfind_t *find, *start;
3838 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo;
3839 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *faddrinfo;
3840
3841 /*
3842 * Return the next untried address, if any.
3843 */
3844
3845 /*
3846 * Find the first unmarked forwarder (if any).
3847 */
3848 for (addrinfo = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->forwaddrs);
3849 addrinfo != NULL;
3850 addrinfo = ISC_LIST_NEXT(addrinfo, publink)) {
3851 if (!UNMARKED(addrinfo))
3852 continue;
3853 possibly_mark(fctx, addrinfo);
3854 if (UNMARKED(addrinfo)) {
3855 addrinfo->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3856 fctx->find = NULL;
3857 fctx->forwarding = true;
3858 return (addrinfo);
3859 }
3860 }
3861
3862 /*
3863 * No forwarders. Move to the next find.
3864 */
3865 fctx->forwarding = false;
3866 fctx->attributes |= FCTX_ATTR_TRIEDFIND;
3867
3868 find = fctx->find;
3869 if (find == NULL) {
3870 find = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->finds);
3871 } else {
3872 find = ISC_LIST_NEXT(find, publink);
3873 if (find == NULL)
3874 find = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->finds);
3875 }
3876
3877 /*
3878 * Find the first unmarked addrinfo.
3879 */
3880 addrinfo = NULL;
3881 if (find != NULL) {
3882 start = find;
3883 do {
3884 for (addrinfo = ISC_LIST_HEAD(find->list);
3885 addrinfo != NULL;
3886 addrinfo = ISC_LIST_NEXT(addrinfo, publink)) {
3887 if (!UNMARKED(addrinfo))
3888 continue;
3889 possibly_mark(fctx, addrinfo);
3890 if (UNMARKED(addrinfo)) {
3891 addrinfo->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3892 break;
3893 }
3894 }
3895 if (addrinfo != NULL)
3896 break;
3897 find = ISC_LIST_NEXT(find, publink);
3898 if (find == NULL)
3899 find = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->finds);
3900 } while (find != start);
3901 }
3902
3903 fctx->find = find;
3904 if (addrinfo != NULL)
3905 return (addrinfo);
3906
3907 /*
3908 * No nameservers left. Try alternates.
3909 */
3910
3911 fctx->attributes |= FCTX_ATTR_TRIEDALT;
3912
3913 find = fctx->altfind;
3914 if (find == NULL) {
3915 find = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->altfinds);
3916 } else {
3917 find = ISC_LIST_NEXT(find, publink);
3918 if (find == NULL)
3919 find = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->altfinds);
3920 }
3921
3922 /*
3923 * Find the first unmarked addrinfo.
3924 */
3925 addrinfo = NULL;
3926 if (find != NULL) {
3927 start = find;
3928 do {
3929 for (addrinfo = ISC_LIST_HEAD(find->list);
3930 addrinfo != NULL;
3931 addrinfo = ISC_LIST_NEXT(addrinfo, publink)) {
3932 if (!UNMARKED(addrinfo))
3933 continue;
3934 possibly_mark(fctx, addrinfo);
3935 if (UNMARKED(addrinfo)) {
3936 addrinfo->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3937 break;
3938 }
3939 }
3940 if (addrinfo != NULL)
3941 break;
3942 find = ISC_LIST_NEXT(find, publink);
3943 if (find == NULL)
3944 find = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->altfinds);
3945 } while (find != start);
3946 }
3947
3948 faddrinfo = addrinfo;
3949
3950 /*
3951 * See if we have a better alternate server by address.
3952 */
3953
3954 for (addrinfo = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->altaddrs);
3955 addrinfo != NULL;
3956 addrinfo = ISC_LIST_NEXT(addrinfo, publink)) {
3957 if (!UNMARKED(addrinfo))
3958 continue;
3959 possibly_mark(fctx, addrinfo);
3960 if (UNMARKED(addrinfo) &&
3961 (faddrinfo == NULL ||
3962 addrinfo->srtt < faddrinfo->srtt)) {
3963 if (faddrinfo != NULL)
3964 faddrinfo->flags &= ~FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3965 addrinfo->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_MARK;
3966 break;
3967 }
3968 }
3969
3970 if (addrinfo == NULL) {
3971 addrinfo = faddrinfo;
3972 fctx->altfind = find;
3973 }
3974
3975 return (addrinfo);
3976}
3977
3978static void
3979fctx_try(fetchctx_t *fctx, bool retrying, bool badcache) {
3980 isc_result_t result;
3981 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo = NULL;
3982 dns_resolver_t *res;
3983 isc_task_t *task;
3984 unsigned int bucketnum;
3985 bool bucket_empty;
3986
3987 FCTXTRACE5("try", "fctx->qc=", isc_counter_used(fctx->qc));
3988
3989 REQUIRE(!ADDRWAIT(fctx));
3990
3991 res = fctx->res;
3992 bucketnum = fctx->bucketnum;
3993
3994 /* We've already exceeded maximum query count */
3995 if (isc_counter_used(fctx->qc) > res->maxqueries) {
3996 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
3997 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_DEBUG(3),
3998 "exceeded max queries resolving '%s' "
3999 "(querycount=%u, maxqueries=%u)",
4000 fctx->info,
4001 isc_counter_used(fctx->qc), res->maxqueries);
4002 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
4003 return;
4004 }
4005
4006 addrinfo = fctx_nextaddress(fctx);
4007
4008 /* Try to find an address that isn't over quota */
4009 while (addrinfo != NULL && dns_adbentry_overquota(addrinfo->entry)) {
4010 addrinfo = fctx_nextaddress(fctx);
4011 }
4012
4013 if (addrinfo == NULL) {
4014 /* We have no more addresses. Start over. */
4015 fctx_cancelqueries(fctx, true, false);
4016 fctx_cleanupall(fctx);
4017 result = fctx_getaddresses(fctx, badcache);
4018 if (result == DNS_R_WAIT) {
4019 /*
4020 * Sleep waiting for addresses.
4021 */
4022 FCTXTRACE("addrwait");
4023 fctx->attributes |= FCTX_ATTR_ADDRWAIT;
4024 return;
4025 } else if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4026 /*
4027 * Something bad happened.
4028 */
4029 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
4030 return;
4031 }
4032
4033 addrinfo = fctx_nextaddress(fctx);
4034
4035 while (addrinfo != NULL &&
4036 dns_adbentry_overquota(addrinfo->entry)) {
4037 addrinfo = fctx_nextaddress(fctx);
4038 }
4039
4040 /*
4041 * While we may have addresses from the ADB, they
4042 * might be bad ones. In this case, return SERVFAIL.
4043 */
4044 if (addrinfo == NULL) {
4045 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
4046 return;
4047 }
4048 }
4049 /*
4050 * We're minimizing and we're not yet at the final NS -
4051 * we need to launch a query for NS for 'upper' domain
4052 */
4053 if (fctx->minimized && !fctx->forwarding) {
4054 unsigned int options = fctx->options;
4055 options &= ~DNS_FETCHOPT_QMINIMIZE;
4056 fctx_increference(fctx);
4057 task = res->buckets[bucketnum].task;
4058 fctx_stoptimer(fctx);
4059 result = dns_resolver_createfetch(fctx->res, &fctx->qminname,
4060 fctx->qmintype, &fctx->domain,
4061 &fctx->nameservers,
4062 NULL, NULL, 0,
4063 options, 0, fctx->qc, task,
4064 resume_qmin, fctx,
4065 &fctx->qminrrset, NULL,
4066 &fctx->qminfetch);
4067 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4068 LOCK(&fctx->res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
4069 RUNTIME_CHECK(!fctx_decreference(fctx));
4070 UNLOCK(&fctx->res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
4071 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
4072 }
4073 return;
4074 }
4075
4076 if (dns_name_countlabels(&fctx->domain) > 2) {
4077 result = isc_counter_increment(fctx->qc);
4078 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4079 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
4080 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_DEBUG(3),
4081 "exceeded max queries resolving '%s'",
4082 fctx->info);
4083 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
4084 return;
4085 }
4086 }
4087
4088 fctx_increference(fctx);
4089 result = fctx_query(fctx, addrinfo, fctx->options);
4090 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4091 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
4092 LOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
4093 bucket_empty = fctx_decreference(fctx);
4094 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
4095 if (bucket_empty)
4096 empty_bucket(res);
4097 } else if (retrying) {
4098 inc_stats(res, dns_resstatscounter_retry);
4099 }
4100}
4101
4102static void
4103resume_qmin(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
4104 dns_fetchevent_t *fevent;
4105 dns_resolver_t *res;
4106 fetchctx_t *fctx;
4107 isc_result_t result;
4108 bool bucket_empty;
4109 unsigned int bucketnum;
4110 unsigned int findoptions = 0;
4111 dns_name_t *fname, *dcname;
4112 dns_fixedname_t ffixed, dcfixed;
4113 fname = dns_fixedname_initname(&ffixed);
4114 dcname = dns_fixedname_initname(&dcfixed);
4115
4116 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_FETCHDONE);
4117 fevent = (dns_fetchevent_t *)event;
4118 fctx = event->ev_arg;
4119 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
4120 res = fctx->res;
4121
4122 UNUSED(task);
4123 FCTXTRACE("resume_qmin");
4124
4125 if (fevent->node != NULL)
4126 dns_db_detachnode(fevent->db, &fevent->node);
4127 if (fevent->db != NULL)
4128 dns_db_detach(&fevent->db);
4129
4130 bucketnum = fctx->bucketnum;
4131
4132 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(fevent->rdataset)) {
4133 dns_rdataset_disassociate(fevent->rdataset);
4134 }
4135 result = fevent->result;
4136 fevent = NULL;
4137 isc_event_free(&event);
4138
4139 dns_resolver_destroyfetch(&fctx->qminfetch);
4140
4141 if (SHUTTINGDOWN(fctx)) {
4142 maybe_destroy(fctx, false);
4143 goto cleanup;
4144 }
4145
4146 /*
4147 * Note: fevent->rdataset must be disassociated and
4148 * isc_event_free(&event) be called before resuming
4149 * processing of the 'fctx' to prevent use-after-free.
4150 * 'fevent' is set to NULL so as to not have a dangling
4151 * pointer.
4152 */
4153 if (result == ISC_R_CANCELED) {
4154 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
4155 goto cleanup;
4156 }
4157
4158 if (NXDOMAIN_RESULT(result) || result == DNS_R_FORMERR ||
4159 result == DNS_R_REMOTEFORMERR)
4160 {
4161 if ((fctx->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_QMIN_STRICT) == 0) {
4162 fctx->qmin_labels = DNS_MAX_LABELS + 1;
4163 /*
4164 * We store the result. If we succeed in the end
4165 * we'll issue a warning that the server is broken.
4166 */
4167 fctx->qmin_warning = result;
4168 } else {
4169 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
4170 goto cleanup;
4171 }
4172 }
4173
4174 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(&fctx->nameservers)) {
4175 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&fctx->nameservers);
4176 }
4177
4178 if (dns_rdatatype_atparent(fctx->type)) {
4179 findoptions |= DNS_DBFIND_NOEXACT;
4180 }
4181 result = dns_view_findzonecut(res->view, &fctx->name, fname,
4182 dcname, fctx->now, findoptions,
4183 true, true, &fctx->nameservers, NULL);
4184
4185 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4186 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
4187 goto cleanup;
4188 }
4189 fcount_decr(fctx);
4190 dns_name_free(&fctx->domain, fctx->mctx);
4191 dns_name_init(&fctx->domain, NULL);
4192 result = dns_name_dup(fname, fctx->mctx, &fctx->domain);
4193 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4194 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
4195 goto cleanup;
4196 }
4197 dns_name_free(&fctx->qmindcname, fctx->mctx);
4198 dns_name_init(&fctx->qmindcname, NULL);
4199 result = dns_name_dup(dcname, fctx->mctx, &fctx->qmindcname);
4200 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4201 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
4202 goto cleanup;
4203 }
4204 fctx->ns_ttl = fctx->nameservers.ttl;
4205 fctx->ns_ttl_ok = true;
4206
4207 result = fctx_minimize_qname(fctx);
4208 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4209 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
4210 goto cleanup;
4211 }
4212
4213 if (!fctx->minimized) {
4214 /*
4215 * We have finished minimizing, but fctx->finds was filled at
4216 * the beginning of the run - now we need to clear it before
4217 * sending the final query to use proper nameservers.
4218 */
4219 fctx_cancelqueries(fctx, false, false);
4220 fctx_cleanupall(fctx);
4221 }
4222
4223 fctx_try(fctx, true, false);
4224
4225 cleanup:
4226 INSIST(event == NULL);
4227 INSIST(fevent == NULL);
4228 LOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
4229 bucket_empty = fctx_decreference(fctx);
4230 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
4231 if (bucket_empty)
4232 empty_bucket(res);
4233}
4234
4235static bool
4236fctx_unlink(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
4237 dns_resolver_t *res;
4238 unsigned int bucketnum;
4239
4240 /*
4241 * Caller must be holding the bucket lock.
4242 */
4243
4244 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
4245 REQUIRE(fctx->state == fetchstate_done ||
4246 fctx->state == fetchstate_init);
4247 REQUIRE(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->events));
4248 REQUIRE(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->queries));
4249 REQUIRE(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->finds));
4250 REQUIRE(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->altfinds));
4251 REQUIRE(fctx->pending == 0);
4252 REQUIRE(fctx->references == 0);
4253 REQUIRE(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->validators));
4254
4255 FCTXTRACE("unlink");
4256
4257 res = fctx->res;
4258 bucketnum = fctx->bucketnum;
4259
4260 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(res->buckets[bucketnum].fctxs, fctx, link);
4261
4262 LOCK(&res->nlock);
4263 res->nfctx--;
4264 UNLOCK(&res->nlock);
4265 dec_stats(res, dns_resstatscounter_nfetch);
4266
4267 if (res->buckets[bucketnum].exiting &&
4268 ISC_LIST_EMPTY(res->buckets[bucketnum].fctxs))
4269 return (true);
4270
4271 return (false);
4272}
4273
4274static void
4275fctx_destroy(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
4276 isc_sockaddr_t *sa, *next_sa;
4277 struct tried *tried;
4278
4279 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
4280 REQUIRE(fctx->state == fetchstate_done ||
4281 fctx->state == fetchstate_init);
4282 REQUIRE(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->events));
4283 REQUIRE(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->queries));
4284 REQUIRE(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->finds));
4285 REQUIRE(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->altfinds));
4286 REQUIRE(fctx->pending == 0);
4287 REQUIRE(fctx->references == 0);
4288 REQUIRE(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->validators));
4289 REQUIRE(!ISC_LINK_LINKED(fctx, link));
4290
4291 FCTXTRACE("destroy");
4292
4293 /*
4294 * Free bad.
4295 */
4296 for (sa = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->bad);
4297 sa != NULL;
4298 sa = next_sa) {
4299 next_sa = ISC_LIST_NEXT(sa, link);
4300 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(fctx->bad, sa, link);
4301 isc_mem_put(fctx->mctx, sa, sizeof(*sa));
4302 }
4303
4304 for (tried = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->edns);
4305 tried != NULL;
4306 tried = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->edns)) {
4307 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(fctx->edns, tried, link);
4308 isc_mem_put(fctx->mctx, tried, sizeof(*tried));
4309 }
4310
4311 for (tried = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->edns512);
4312 tried != NULL;
4313 tried = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->edns512)) {
4314 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(fctx->edns512, tried, link);
4315 isc_mem_put(fctx->mctx, tried, sizeof(*tried));
4316 }
4317
4318 for (sa = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->bad_edns);
4319 sa != NULL;
4320 sa = next_sa) {
4321 next_sa = ISC_LIST_NEXT(sa, link);
4322 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(fctx->bad_edns, sa, link);
4323 isc_mem_put(fctx->mctx, sa, sizeof(*sa));
4324 }
4325
4326 isc_counter_detach(&fctx->qc);
4327 fcount_decr(fctx);
4328 isc_timer_detach(&fctx->timer);
4329 dns_message_destroy(&fctx->rmessage);
4330 dns_message_destroy(&fctx->qmessage);
4331 if (dns_name_countlabels(&fctx->domain) > 0)
4332 dns_name_free(&fctx->domain, fctx->mctx);
4333 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(&fctx->nameservers))
4334 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&fctx->nameservers);
4335 dns_name_free(&fctx->name, fctx->mctx);
4336 dns_name_free(&fctx->qminname, fctx->mctx);
4337 dns_name_free(&fctx->qmindcname, fctx->mctx);
4338 dns_db_detach(&fctx->cache);
4339 dns_adb_detach(&fctx->adb);
4340 isc_mem_free(fctx->mctx, fctx->info);
4341 isc_mem_putanddetach(&fctx->mctx, fctx, sizeof(*fctx));
4342}
4343
4344/*
4345 * Fetch event handlers.
4346 */
4347
4348static void
4349fctx_timeout(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
4350 fetchctx_t *fctx = event->ev_arg;
4351 isc_timerevent_t *tevent = (isc_timerevent_t *)event;
4352 resquery_t *query;
4353
4354 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
4355
4356 UNUSED(task);
4357
4358 FCTXTRACE("timeout");
4359
4360 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_querytimeout);
4361
4362 if (event->ev_type == ISC_TIMEREVENT_LIFE) {
4363 fctx->reason = NULL;
4364 fctx_done(fctx, ISC_R_TIMEDOUT, __LINE__);
4365 } else {
4366 isc_result_t result;
4367
4368 fctx->timeouts++;
4369 fctx->timeout = true;
4370
4371 /*
4372 * We could cancel the running queries here, or we could let
4373 * them keep going. Since we normally use separate sockets for
4374 * different queries, we adopt the former approach to reduce
4375 * the number of open sockets: cancel the oldest query if it
4376 * expired after the query had started (this is usually the
4377 * case but is not always so, depending on the task schedule
4378 * timing).
4379 */
4380 query = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->queries);
4381 if (query != NULL &&
4382 isc_time_compare(&tevent->due, &query->start) >= 0)
4383 {
4384 FCTXTRACE("query timed out; no response");
4385 fctx_cancelquery(&query, NULL, NULL, true, false);
4386 }
4387 fctx->attributes &= ~FCTX_ATTR_ADDRWAIT;
4388
4389 /*
4390 * Our timer has triggered. Reestablish the fctx lifetime
4391 * timer.
4392 */
4393 result = fctx_starttimer(fctx);
4394 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4395 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
4396 } else {
4397 /* Keep trying */
4398 fctx_try(fctx, true, false);
4399 }
4400 }
4401
4402 isc_event_free(&event);
4403}
4404
4405static void
4406fctx_shutdown(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
4407 isc_event_t *cevent;
4408
4409 /*
4410 * Start the shutdown process for fctx, if it isn't already underway.
4411 */
4412
4413 FCTXTRACE("shutdown");
4414
4415 /*
4416 * The caller must be holding the appropriate bucket lock.
4417 */
4418
4419 if (fctx->want_shutdown)
4420 return;
4421
4422 fctx->want_shutdown = true;
4423
4424 /*
4425 * Unless we're still initializing (in which case the
4426 * control event is still outstanding), we need to post
4427 * the control event to tell the fetch we want it to
4428 * exit.
4429 */
4430 if (fctx->state != fetchstate_init) {
4431 cevent = &fctx->control_event;
4432 isc_task_sendto(fctx->res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].task,
4433 &cevent, fctx->bucketnum);
4434 }
4435}
4436
4437static void
4438fctx_doshutdown(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
4439 fetchctx_t *fctx = event->ev_arg;
4440 bool bucket_empty = false;
4441 dns_resolver_t *res;
4442 unsigned int bucketnum;
4443 dns_validator_t *validator;
4444 bool dodestroy = false;
4445
4446 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
4447
4448 UNUSED(task);
4449
4450 res = fctx->res;
4451 bucketnum = fctx->bucketnum;
4452
4453 FCTXTRACE("doshutdown");
4454
4455 /*
4456 * An fctx that is shutting down is no longer in ADDRWAIT mode.
4457 */
4458 fctx->attributes &= ~FCTX_ATTR_ADDRWAIT;
4459
4460 /*
4461 * Cancel all pending validators. Note that this must be done
4462 * without the bucket lock held, since that could cause deadlock.
4463 */
4464 validator = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->validators);
4465 while (validator != NULL) {
4466 dns_validator_cancel(validator);
4467 validator = ISC_LIST_NEXT(validator, link);
4468 }
4469
4470 if (fctx->nsfetch != NULL)
4471 dns_resolver_cancelfetch(fctx->nsfetch);
4472
4473 if (fctx->qminfetch != NULL)
4474 dns_resolver_cancelfetch(fctx->qminfetch);
4475
4476 /*
4477 * Shut down anything still running on behalf of this
4478 * fetch, and clean up finds and addresses. To avoid deadlock
4479 * with the ADB, we must do this before we lock the bucket lock.
4480 */
4481 fctx_stopqueries(fctx, false, false);
4482 fctx_cleanupall(fctx);
4483
4484 LOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
4485
4486 fctx->attributes |= FCTX_ATTR_SHUTTINGDOWN;
4487
4488 INSIST(fctx->state == fetchstate_active ||
4489 fctx->state == fetchstate_done);
4490 INSIST(fctx->want_shutdown);
4491
4492 if (fctx->state != fetchstate_done) {
4493 fctx->state = fetchstate_done;
4494 fctx_sendevents(fctx, ISC_R_CANCELED, __LINE__);
4495 }
4496
4497 if (fctx->references == 0 && fctx->pending == 0 &&
4498 fctx->nqueries == 0 && ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->validators)) {
4499 bucket_empty = fctx_unlink(fctx);
4500 dodestroy = true;
4501 }
4502
4503 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
4504
4505 if (dodestroy) {
4506 fctx_destroy(fctx);
4507 if (bucket_empty)
4508 empty_bucket(res);
4509 }
4510}
4511
4512static void
4513fctx_start(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
4514 fetchctx_t *fctx = event->ev_arg;
4515 bool done = false, bucket_empty = false;
4516 dns_resolver_t *res;
4517 unsigned int bucketnum;
4518 bool dodestroy = false;
4519
4520 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
4521
4522 UNUSED(task);
4523
4524 res = fctx->res;
4525 bucketnum = fctx->bucketnum;
4526
4527 FCTXTRACE("start");
4528
4529 LOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
4530
4531 INSIST(fctx->state == fetchstate_init);
4532 if (fctx->want_shutdown) {
4533 /*
4534 * We haven't started this fctx yet, and we've been requested
4535 * to shut it down.
4536 */
4537 fctx->attributes |= FCTX_ATTR_SHUTTINGDOWN;
4538 fctx->state = fetchstate_done;
4539 fctx_sendevents(fctx, ISC_R_CANCELED, __LINE__);
4540 /*
4541 * Since we haven't started, we INSIST that we have no
4542 * pending ADB finds and no pending validations.
4543 */
4544 INSIST(fctx->pending == 0);
4545 INSIST(fctx->nqueries == 0);
4546 INSIST(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->validators));
4547 if (fctx->references == 0) {
4548 /*
4549 * It's now safe to destroy this fctx.
4550 */
4551 bucket_empty = fctx_unlink(fctx);
4552 dodestroy = true;
4553 }
4554 done = true;
4555 } else {
4556 /*
4557 * Normal fctx startup.
4558 */
4559 fctx->state = fetchstate_active;
4560 /*
4561 * Reset the control event for later use in shutting down
4562 * the fctx.
4563 */
4564 ISC_EVENT_INIT(event, sizeof(*event), 0, NULL,
4565 DNS_EVENT_FETCHCONTROL, fctx_doshutdown, fctx,
4566 NULL, NULL, NULL);
4567 }
4568
4569 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
4570
4571 if (!done) {
4572 isc_result_t result;
4573
4574 INSIST(!dodestroy);
4575
4576 /*
4577 * All is well. Start working on the fetch.
4578 */
4579 result = fctx_starttimer(fctx);
4580 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
4581 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
4582 else
4583 fctx_try(fctx, false, false);
4584 } else if (dodestroy) {
4585 fctx_destroy(fctx);
4586 if (bucket_empty)
4587 empty_bucket(res);
4588 }
4589}
4590
4591/*
4592 * Fetch Creation, Joining, and Cancelation.
4593 */
4594
4595static inline isc_result_t
4596fctx_join(fetchctx_t *fctx, isc_task_t *task, const isc_sockaddr_t *client,
4597 dns_messageid_t id, isc_taskaction_t action, void *arg,
4598 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset, dns_rdataset_t *sigrdataset,
4599 dns_fetch_t *fetch)
4600{
4601 isc_task_t *tclone;
4602 dns_fetchevent_t *event;
4603
4604 FCTXTRACE("join");
4605
4606 /*
4607 * We store the task we're going to send this event to in the
4608 * sender field. We'll make the fetch the sender when we actually
4609 * send the event.
4610 */
4611 tclone = NULL;
4612 isc_task_attach(task, &tclone);
4613 event = (dns_fetchevent_t *)
4614 isc_event_allocate(fctx->res->mctx, tclone, DNS_EVENT_FETCHDONE,
4615 action, arg, sizeof(*event));
4616 if (event == NULL) {
4617 isc_task_detach(&tclone);
4618 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
4619 }
4620 event->result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL;
4621 event->qtype = fctx->type;
4622 event->db = NULL;
4623 event->node = NULL;
4624 event->rdataset = rdataset;
4625 event->sigrdataset = sigrdataset;
4626 event->fetch = fetch;
4627 event->client = client;
4628 event->id = id;
4629 dns_fixedname_init(&event->foundname);
4630
4631 /*
4632 * Make sure that we can store the sigrdataset in the
4633 * first event if it is needed by any of the events.
4634 */
4635 if (event->sigrdataset != NULL)
4636 ISC_LIST_PREPEND(fctx->events, event, ev_link);
4637 else
4638 ISC_LIST_APPEND(fctx->events, event, ev_link);
4639 fctx->references++;
4640 fctx->client = client;
4641
4642 fetch->magic = DNS_FETCH_MAGIC;
4643 fetch->private = fctx;
4644
4645 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
4646}
4647
4648static inline void
4649log_ns_ttl(fetchctx_t *fctx, const char *where) {
4650 char namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
4651 char domainbuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
4652
4653 dns_name_format(&fctx->name, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
4654 dns_name_format(&fctx->domain, domainbuf, sizeof(domainbuf));
4655 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
4656 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_DEBUG(10),
4657 "log_ns_ttl: fctx %p: %s: %s (in '%s'?): %u %u",
4658 fctx, where, namebuf, domainbuf,
4659 fctx->ns_ttl_ok, fctx->ns_ttl);
4660}
4661
4662static isc_result_t
4663fctx_create(dns_resolver_t *res, const dns_name_t *name, dns_rdatatype_t type,
4664 const dns_name_t *domain, dns_rdataset_t *nameservers,
4665 unsigned int options, unsigned int bucketnum, unsigned int depth,
4666 isc_counter_t *qc, fetchctx_t **fctxp)
4667{
4668 fetchctx_t *fctx;
4669 isc_result_t result;
4670 isc_result_t iresult;
4671 isc_interval_t interval;
4672 unsigned int findoptions = 0;
4673 char buf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE + DNS_RDATATYPE_FORMATSIZE];
4674 char typebuf[DNS_RDATATYPE_FORMATSIZE];
4675 isc_mem_t *mctx;
4676
4677 /*
4678 * Caller must be holding the lock for bucket number 'bucketnum'.
4679 */
4680 REQUIRE(fctxp != NULL && *fctxp == NULL);
4681
4682 mctx = res->buckets[bucketnum].mctx;
4683 fctx = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*fctx));
4684 if (fctx == NULL)
4685 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
4686
4687 fctx->qc = NULL;
4688 if (qc != NULL) {
4689 isc_counter_attach(qc, &fctx->qc);
4690 } else {
4691 result = isc_counter_create(res->mctx,
4692 res->maxqueries, &fctx->qc);
4693 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
4694 goto cleanup_fetch;
4695 }
4696
4697 /*
4698 * Make fctx->info point to a copy of a formatted string
4699 * "name/type".
4700 */
4701 dns_name_format(name, buf, sizeof(buf));
4702 dns_rdatatype_format(type, typebuf, sizeof(typebuf));
4703 strlcat(buf, "/", sizeof(buf));
4704 strlcat(buf, typebuf, sizeof(buf));
4705 fctx->info = isc_mem_strdup(mctx, buf);
4706 if (fctx->info == NULL) {
4707 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
4708 goto cleanup_counter;
4709 }
4710
4711 FCTXTRACE("create");
4712 dns_name_init(&fctx->name, NULL);
4713 result = dns_name_dup(name, mctx, &fctx->name);
4714 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
4715 goto cleanup_info;
4716 dns_name_init(&fctx->qminname, NULL);
4717 result = dns_name_dup(name, mctx, &fctx->qminname);
4718 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
4719 goto cleanup_qminname;
4720 dns_name_init(&fctx->domain, NULL);
4721 dns_rdataset_init(&fctx->nameservers);
4722
4723 fctx->type = type;
4724 fctx->qmintype = type;
4725 fctx->options = options;
4726 /*
4727 * Note! We do not attach to the task. We are relying on the
4728 * resolver to ensure that this task doesn't go away while we are
4729 * using it.
4730 */
4731 fctx->res = res;
4732 fctx->references = 0;
4733 fctx->bucketnum = bucketnum;
4734 fctx->dbucketnum = RES_NOBUCKET;
4735 fctx->state = fetchstate_init;
4736 fctx->want_shutdown = false;
4737 fctx->cloned = false;
4738 fctx->depth = depth;
4739 fctx->minimized = false;
4740 fctx->ip6arpaskip = false;
4741 fctx->forwarding = false;
4742 fctx->qmin_labels = 1;
4743 fctx->qmin_warning = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
4744 fctx->qminfetch = NULL;
4745 dns_rdataset_init(&fctx->qminrrset);
4746 dns_name_init(&fctx->qmindcname, NULL);
4747 isc_stdtime_get(&fctx->now);
4748 ISC_LIST_INIT(fctx->queries);
4749 ISC_LIST_INIT(fctx->finds);
4750 ISC_LIST_INIT(fctx->altfinds);
4751 ISC_LIST_INIT(fctx->forwaddrs);
4752 ISC_LIST_INIT(fctx->altaddrs);
4753 ISC_LIST_INIT(fctx->forwarders);
4754 fctx->fwdpolicy = dns_fwdpolicy_none;
4755 ISC_LIST_INIT(fctx->bad);
4756 ISC_LIST_INIT(fctx->edns);
4757 ISC_LIST_INIT(fctx->edns512);
4758 ISC_LIST_INIT(fctx->bad_edns);
4759 ISC_LIST_INIT(fctx->validators);
4760 fctx->validator = NULL;
4761 fctx->find = NULL;
4762 fctx->altfind = NULL;
4763 fctx->pending = 0;
4764 fctx->restarts = 0;
4765 fctx->querysent = 0;
4766 fctx->referrals = 0;
4767 TIME_NOW(&fctx->start);
4768 fctx->timeouts = 0;
4769 fctx->lamecount = 0;
4770 fctx->quotacount = 0;
4771 fctx->adberr = 0;
4772 fctx->neterr = 0;
4773 fctx->badresp = 0;
4774 fctx->findfail = 0;
4775 fctx->valfail = 0;
4776 fctx->result = ISC_R_FAILURE;
4777 fctx->vresult = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
4778 fctx->exitline = -1; /* sentinel */
4779 fctx->logged = false;
4780 fctx->attributes = 0;
4781 fctx->spilled = false;
4782 fctx->nqueries = 0;
4783 fctx->reason = NULL;
4784 fctx->rand_buf = 0;
4785 fctx->rand_bits = 0;
4786 fctx->timeout = false;
4787 fctx->addrinfo = NULL;
4788 fctx->client = NULL;
4789 fctx->ns_ttl = 0;
4790 fctx->ns_ttl_ok = false;
4791
4792 dns_name_init(&fctx->nsname, NULL);
4793 fctx->nsfetch = NULL;
4794 dns_rdataset_init(&fctx->nsrrset);
4795
4796 if (domain == NULL) {
4797 dns_forwarders_t *forwarders = NULL;
4798 dns_fixedname_t fixed;
4799 unsigned int labels;
4800 const dns_name_t *fwdname = name;
4801 dns_name_t suffix;
4802 dns_name_t *fname;
4803
4804 /*
4805 * DS records are found in the parent server. Strip one
4806 * leading label from the name (to be used in finding
4807 * the forwarder).
4808 */
4809 if (dns_rdatatype_atparent(fctx->type) &&
4810 dns_name_countlabels(name) > 1) {
4811 dns_name_init(&suffix, NULL);
4812 labels = dns_name_countlabels(name);
4813 dns_name_getlabelsequence(name, 1, labels - 1, &suffix);
4814 fwdname = &suffix;
4815 }
4816
4817 /* Find the forwarder for this name. */
4818 fname = dns_fixedname_initname(&fixed);
4819 result = dns_fwdtable_find(fctx->res->view->fwdtable, fwdname,
4820 fname, &forwarders);
4821 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
4822 fctx->fwdpolicy = forwarders->fwdpolicy;
4823
4824 if (fctx->fwdpolicy != dns_fwdpolicy_only) {
4825 dns_fixedname_t dcfixed;
4826 dns_name_t *dcname;
4827 dcname = dns_fixedname_initname(&dcfixed);
4828 /*
4829 * The caller didn't supply a query domain and
4830 * nameservers, and we're not in forward-only mode,
4831 * so find the best nameservers to use.
4832 */
4833 if (dns_rdatatype_atparent(fctx->type))
4834 findoptions |= DNS_DBFIND_NOEXACT;
4835 result = dns_view_findzonecut(res->view, name, fname,
4836 dcname, fctx->now,
4837 findoptions, true, true,
4838 &fctx->nameservers,
4839 NULL);
4840 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4841 goto cleanup_nameservers;
4842 }
4843
4844 result = dns_name_dup(fname, mctx, &fctx->domain);
4845 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4846 goto cleanup_nameservers;
4847 }
4848 result = dns_name_dup(dcname, mctx, &fctx->qmindcname);
4849 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4850 goto cleanup_domain;
4851 }
4852 fctx->ns_ttl = fctx->nameservers.ttl;
4853 fctx->ns_ttl_ok = true;
4854 } else {
4855 /*
4856 * We're in forward-only mode. Set the query domain.
4857 */
4858 result = dns_name_dup(fname, mctx, &fctx->domain);
4859 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4860 goto cleanup_name;
4861 }
4862 result = dns_name_dup(fname, mctx, &fctx->qmindcname);
4863 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4864 goto cleanup_domain;
4865 }
4866 /*
4867 * Disable query minimization
4868 */
4869 options &= ~DNS_FETCHOPT_QMINIMIZE;
4870 }
4871 } else {
4872 result = dns_name_dup(domain, mctx, &fctx->domain);
4873 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4874 goto cleanup_name;
4875 }
4876 result = dns_name_dup(domain, mctx, &fctx->qmindcname);
4877 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4878 goto cleanup_domain;
4879 }
4880 dns_rdataset_clone(nameservers, &fctx->nameservers);
4881 fctx->ns_ttl = fctx->nameservers.ttl;
4882 fctx->ns_ttl_ok = true;
4883 }
4884
4885 /*
4886 * Are there too many simultaneous queries for this domain?
4887 */
4888 result = fcount_incr(fctx, false);
4889 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4890 result = fctx->res->quotaresp[dns_quotatype_zone];
4891 inc_stats(res, dns_resstatscounter_zonequota);
4892 goto cleanup_domain;
4893 }
4894
4895 log_ns_ttl(fctx, "fctx_create");
4896
4897 INSIST(dns_name_issubdomain(&fctx->name, &fctx->domain));
4898
4899 fctx->qmessage = NULL;
4900 result = dns_message_create(mctx, DNS_MESSAGE_INTENTRENDER,
4901 &fctx->qmessage);
4902
4903 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
4904 goto cleanup_fcount;
4905
4906 fctx->rmessage = NULL;
4907 result = dns_message_create(mctx, DNS_MESSAGE_INTENTPARSE,
4908 &fctx->rmessage);
4909
4910 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
4911 goto cleanup_qmessage;
4912
4913 /*
4914 * Compute an expiration time for the entire fetch.
4915 */
4916 isc_interval_set(&interval, res->query_timeout / 1000,
4917 res->query_timeout % 1000 * 1000000);
4918 iresult = isc_time_nowplusinterval(&fctx->expires, &interval);
4919 if (iresult != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4920 UNEXPECTED_ERROR(__FILE__, __LINE__,
4921 "isc_time_nowplusinterval: %s",
4922 isc_result_totext(iresult));
4923 result = ISC_R_UNEXPECTED;
4924 goto cleanup_rmessage;
4925 }
4926
4927 /*
4928 * Default retry interval initialization. We set the interval now
4929 * mostly so it won't be uninitialized. It will be set to the
4930 * correct value before a query is issued.
4931 */
4932 isc_interval_set(&fctx->interval, 2, 0);
4933
4934 /*
4935 * Create an inactive timer. It will be made active when the fetch
4936 * is actually started.
4937 */
4938 fctx->timer = NULL;
4939 iresult = isc_timer_create(res->timermgr, isc_timertype_inactive,
4940 NULL, NULL,
4941 res->buckets[bucketnum].task, fctx_timeout,
4942 fctx, &fctx->timer);
4943 if (iresult != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4944 UNEXPECTED_ERROR(__FILE__, __LINE__,
4945 "isc_timer_create: %s",
4946 isc_result_totext(iresult));
4947 result = ISC_R_UNEXPECTED;
4948 goto cleanup_rmessage;
4949 }
4950
4951 /*
4952 * Attach to the view's cache and adb.
4953 */
4954 fctx->cache = NULL;
4955 dns_db_attach(res->view->cachedb, &fctx->cache);
4956 fctx->adb = NULL;
4957 dns_adb_attach(res->view->adb, &fctx->adb);
4958 fctx->mctx = NULL;
4959 isc_mem_attach(mctx, &fctx->mctx);
4960
4961 ISC_LIST_INIT(fctx->events);
4962 ISC_LINK_INIT(fctx, link);
4963 fctx->magic = FCTX_MAGIC;
4964
4965 /*
4966 * If qname minimization is enabled we need to trim
4967 * the name in fctx to proper length.
4968 */
4969 if ((options & DNS_FETCHOPT_QMINIMIZE) != 0) {
4970 fctx->ip6arpaskip =
4971 (options & DNS_FETCHOPT_QMIN_SKIP_IP6A) != 0 &&
4972 dns_name_issubdomain(&fctx->name, &ip6_arpa);
4973 result = fctx_minimize_qname(fctx);
4974 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
4975 goto cleanup_mctx;
4976 }
4977 }
4978
4979 ISC_LIST_APPEND(res->buckets[bucketnum].fctxs, fctx, link);
4980
4981 LOCK(&res->nlock);
4982 res->nfctx++;
4983 UNLOCK(&res->nlock);
4984 inc_stats(res, dns_resstatscounter_nfetch);
4985
4986 *fctxp = fctx;
4987
4988 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
4989
4990 cleanup_mctx:
4991 fctx->magic = 0;
4992 isc_mem_detach(&fctx->mctx);
4993 dns_adb_detach(&fctx->adb);
4994 dns_db_detach(&fctx->cache);
4995 isc_timer_detach(&fctx->timer);
4996
4997 cleanup_rmessage:
4998 dns_message_destroy(&fctx->rmessage);
4999
5000 cleanup_qmessage:
5001 dns_message_destroy(&fctx->qmessage);
5002
5003 cleanup_fcount:
5004 fcount_decr(fctx);
5005
5006 cleanup_domain:
5007 if (dns_name_countlabels(&fctx->domain) > 0)
5008 dns_name_free(&fctx->domain, mctx);
5009 if (dns_name_countlabels(&fctx->qmindcname) > 0)
5010 dns_name_free(&fctx->qmindcname, mctx);
5011
5012 cleanup_nameservers:
5013 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(&fctx->nameservers))
5014 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&fctx->nameservers);
5015
5016 cleanup_name:
5017 dns_name_free(&fctx->name, mctx);
5018
5019 cleanup_qminname:
5020 dns_name_free(&fctx->qminname, mctx);
5021
5022 cleanup_info:
5023 isc_mem_free(mctx, fctx->info);
5024
5025 cleanup_counter:
5026 isc_counter_detach(&fctx->qc);
5027
5028 cleanup_fetch:
5029 isc_mem_put(mctx, fctx, sizeof(*fctx));
5030
5031 return (result);
5032}
5033
5034/*
5035 * Handle Responses
5036 */
5037static inline bool
5038is_lame(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
5039 dns_message_t *message = fctx->rmessage;
5040 dns_name_t *name;
5041 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
5042 isc_result_t result;
5043
5044 if (message->rcode != dns_rcode_noerror &&
5045 message->rcode != dns_rcode_yxdomain &&
5046 message->rcode != dns_rcode_nxdomain)
5047 return (false);
5048
5049 if (message->counts[DNS_SECTION_ANSWER] != 0)
5050 return (false);
5051
5052 if (message->counts[DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY] == 0)
5053 return (false);
5054
5055 result = dns_message_firstname(message, DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY);
5056 while (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
5057 name = NULL;
5058 dns_message_currentname(message, DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY, &name);
5059 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
5060 rdataset != NULL;
5061 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link)) {
5062 dns_namereln_t namereln;
5063 int order;
5064 unsigned int labels;
5065 if (rdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_ns)
5066 continue;
5067 namereln = dns_name_fullcompare(name, &fctx->domain,
5068 &order, &labels);
5069 if (namereln == dns_namereln_equal &&
5070 (message->flags & DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_AA) != 0)
5071 return (false);
5072 if (namereln == dns_namereln_subdomain)
5073 return (false);
5074 return (true);
5075 }
5076 result = dns_message_nextname(message, DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY);
5077 }
5078
5079 return (false);
5080}
5081
5082static inline void
5083log_lame(fetchctx_t *fctx, dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo) {
5084 char namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
5085 char domainbuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
5086 char addrbuf[ISC_SOCKADDR_FORMATSIZE];
5087
5088 dns_name_format(&fctx->name, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
5089 dns_name_format(&fctx->domain, domainbuf, sizeof(domainbuf));
5090 isc_sockaddr_format(&addrinfo->sockaddr, addrbuf, sizeof(addrbuf));
5091 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_LAME_SERVERS,
5092 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_INFO,
5093 "lame server resolving '%s' (in '%s'?): %s",
5094 namebuf, domainbuf, addrbuf);
5095}
5096
5097static inline void
5098log_formerr(fetchctx_t *fctx, const char *format, ...) {
5099 char nsbuf[ISC_SOCKADDR_FORMATSIZE];
5100 char clbuf[ISC_SOCKADDR_FORMATSIZE];
5101 const char *clmsg = "";
5102 char msgbuf[2048];
5103 va_list args;
5104
5105 va_start(args, format);
5106 vsnprintf(msgbuf, sizeof(msgbuf), format, args);
5107 va_end(args);
5108
5109 isc_sockaddr_format(&fctx->addrinfo->sockaddr, nsbuf, sizeof(nsbuf));
5110
5111 if (fctx->client != NULL) {
5112 clmsg = " for client ";
5113 isc_sockaddr_format(fctx->client, clbuf, sizeof(clbuf));
5114 } else {
5115 clbuf[0] = '\0';
5116 }
5117
5118 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
5119 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
5120 "DNS format error from %s resolving %s%s%s: %s",
5121 nsbuf, fctx->info, clmsg, clbuf, msgbuf);
5122}
5123
5124static isc_result_t
5125same_question(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
5126 isc_result_t result;
5127 dns_message_t *message = fctx->rmessage;
5128 dns_name_t *name;
5129 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
5130
5131 /*
5132 * Caller must be holding the fctx lock.
5133 */
5134
5135 /*
5136 * XXXRTH Currently we support only one question.
5137 */
5138 if (ISC_UNLIKELY(message->counts[DNS_SECTION_QUESTION] == 0)) {
5139 if ((message->flags & DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_TC) != 0) {
5140 /*
5141 * If TC=1 and the question section is empty, we
5142 * accept the reply message as a truncated
5143 * answer, to be retried over TCP.
5144 *
5145 * It is really a FORMERR condition, but this is
5146 * a workaround to accept replies from some
5147 * implementations.
5148 *
5149 * Because the question section matching is not
5150 * performed, the worst that could happen is
5151 * that an attacker who gets past the ID and
5152 * source port checks can force the use of
5153 * TCP. This is considered an acceptable risk.
5154 */
5155 log_formerr(fctx,
5156 "empty question section, "
5157 "accepting it anyway as TC=1");
5158 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
5159 } else {
5160 log_formerr(fctx, "empty question section");
5161 return (DNS_R_FORMERR);
5162 }
5163 } else if (ISC_UNLIKELY(message->counts[DNS_SECTION_QUESTION] > 1)) {
5164 log_formerr(fctx, "too many questions");
5165 return (DNS_R_FORMERR);
5166 }
5167
5168 result = dns_message_firstname(message, DNS_SECTION_QUESTION);
5169 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5170 return (result);
5171 name = NULL;
5172 dns_message_currentname(message, DNS_SECTION_QUESTION, &name);
5173 rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
5174 INSIST(rdataset != NULL);
5175 INSIST(ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link) == NULL);
5176
5177 if (fctx->type != rdataset->type ||
5178 fctx->res->rdclass != rdataset->rdclass ||
5179 !dns_name_equal(&fctx->name, name)) {
5180 char namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
5181 char classbuf[DNS_RDATACLASS_FORMATSIZE];
5182 char typebuf[DNS_RDATATYPE_FORMATSIZE];
5183
5184 dns_name_format(name, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
5185 dns_rdataclass_format(rdataset->rdclass, classbuf,
5186 sizeof(classbuf));
5187 dns_rdatatype_format(rdataset->type, typebuf, sizeof(typebuf));
5188 log_formerr(fctx, "question section mismatch: got %s/%s/%s",
5189 namebuf, classbuf, typebuf);
5190 return (DNS_R_FORMERR);
5191 }
5192
5193 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
5194}
5195
5196static void
5197clone_results(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
5198 dns_fetchevent_t *event, *hevent;
5199 isc_result_t result;
5200 dns_name_t *name, *hname;
5201
5202 FCTXTRACE("clone_results");
5203
5204 /*
5205 * Set up any other events to have the same data as the first
5206 * event.
5207 *
5208 * Caller must be holding the appropriate lock.
5209 */
5210
5211 fctx->cloned = true;
5212 hevent = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->events);
5213 if (hevent == NULL)
5214 return;
5215 hname = dns_fixedname_name(&hevent->foundname);
5216 for (event = ISC_LIST_NEXT(hevent, ev_link);
5217 event != NULL;
5218 event = ISC_LIST_NEXT(event, ev_link)) {
5219 name = dns_fixedname_name(&event->foundname);
5220 result = dns_name_copy(hname, name, NULL);
5221 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5222 event->result = result;
5223 else
5224 event->result = hevent->result;
5225 dns_db_attach(hevent->db, &event->db);
5226 dns_db_attachnode(hevent->db, hevent->node, &event->node);
5227 INSIST(hevent->rdataset != NULL);
5228 INSIST(event->rdataset != NULL);
5229 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(hevent->rdataset))
5230 dns_rdataset_clone(hevent->rdataset, event->rdataset);
5231 INSIST(! (hevent->sigrdataset == NULL &&
5232 event->sigrdataset != NULL));
5233 if (hevent->sigrdataset != NULL &&
5234 dns_rdataset_isassociated(hevent->sigrdataset) &&
5235 event->sigrdataset != NULL)
5236 dns_rdataset_clone(hevent->sigrdataset,
5237 event->sigrdataset);
5238 }
5239}
5240
5241#define CACHE(r) (((r)->attributes & DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE) != 0)
5242#define ANSWER(r) (((r)->attributes & DNS_RDATASETATTR_ANSWER) != 0)
5243#define ANSWERSIG(r) (((r)->attributes & DNS_RDATASETATTR_ANSWERSIG) != 0)
5244#define EXTERNAL(r) (((r)->attributes & DNS_RDATASETATTR_EXTERNAL) != 0)
5245#define CHAINING(r) (((r)->attributes & DNS_RDATASETATTR_CHAINING) != 0)
5246#define CHASE(r) (((r)->attributes & DNS_RDATASETATTR_CHASE) != 0)
5247#define CHECKNAMES(r) (((r)->attributes & DNS_RDATASETATTR_CHECKNAMES) != 0)
5248
5249/*
5250 * Destroy '*fctx' if it is ready to be destroyed (i.e., if it has
5251 * no references and is no longer waiting for any events).
5252 *
5253 * Requires:
5254 * '*fctx' is shutting down.
5255 *
5256 * Returns:
5257 * true if the resolver is exiting and this is the last fctx in the bucket.
5258 */
5259static bool
5260maybe_destroy(fetchctx_t *fctx, bool locked) {
5261 unsigned int bucketnum;
5262 bool bucket_empty = false;
5263 dns_resolver_t *res = fctx->res;
5264 dns_validator_t *validator, *next_validator;
5265 bool dodestroy = false;
5266
5267 REQUIRE(SHUTTINGDOWN(fctx));
5268
5269 bucketnum = fctx->bucketnum;
5270 if (!locked)
5271 LOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
5272 if (fctx->pending != 0 || fctx->nqueries != 0)
5273 goto unlock;
5274
5275 for (validator = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->validators);
5276 validator != NULL; validator = next_validator) {
5277 next_validator = ISC_LIST_NEXT(validator, link);
5278 dns_validator_cancel(validator);
5279 }
5280
5281 if (fctx->references == 0 && ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->validators)) {
5282 bucket_empty = fctx_unlink(fctx);
5283 dodestroy = true;
5284 }
5285 unlock:
5286 if (!locked)
5287 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
5288 if (dodestroy)
5289 fctx_destroy(fctx);
5290 return (bucket_empty);
5291}
5292
5293/*
5294 * The validator has finished.
5295 */
5296static void
5297validated(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
5298 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo;
5299 dns_dbnode_t *node = NULL;
5300 dns_dbnode_t *nsnode = NULL;
5301 dns_fetchevent_t *hevent;
5302 dns_name_t *name;
5303 dns_rdataset_t *ardataset = NULL;
5304 dns_rdataset_t *asigrdataset = NULL;
5305 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
5306 dns_rdataset_t *sigrdataset;
5307 dns_resolver_t *res;
5308 dns_valarg_t *valarg;
5309 dns_validatorevent_t *vevent;
5310 fetchctx_t *fctx;
5311 bool chaining;
5312 bool negative;
5313 bool sentresponse;
5314 isc_result_t eresult = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
5315 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
5316 isc_stdtime_t now;
5317 uint32_t ttl;
5318 unsigned options;
5319 uint32_t bucketnum;
5320 dns_fixedname_t fwild;
5321 dns_name_t *wild = NULL;
5322
5323 UNUSED(task); /* for now */
5324
5325 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_VALIDATORDONE);
5326 valarg = event->ev_arg;
5327 fctx = valarg->fctx;
5328 res = fctx->res;
5329 addrinfo = valarg->addrinfo;
5330 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
5331 REQUIRE(!ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->validators));
5332
5333 vevent = (dns_validatorevent_t *)event;
5334 fctx->vresult = vevent->result;
5335
5336 FCTXTRACE("received validation completion event");
5337
5338 bucketnum = fctx->bucketnum;
5339 LOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
5340
5341 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(fctx->validators, vevent->validator, link);
5342 fctx->validator = NULL;
5343
5344 /*
5345 * Destroy the validator early so that we can
5346 * destroy the fctx if necessary. Save the wildcard name.
5347 */
5348 if (vevent->proofs[DNS_VALIDATOR_NOQNAMEPROOF] != NULL) {
5349 wild = dns_fixedname_initname(&fwild);
5350 dns_name_copy(dns_fixedname_name(&vevent->validator->wild),
5351 wild, NULL);
5352 }
5353 dns_validator_destroy(&vevent->validator);
5354 isc_mem_put(fctx->mctx, valarg, sizeof(*valarg));
5355
5356 negative = (vevent->rdataset == NULL);
5357
5358 sentresponse = ((fctx->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOVALIDATE) != 0);
5359
5360 /*
5361 * If shutting down, ignore the results. Check to see if we're
5362 * done waiting for validator completions and ADB pending events; if
5363 * so, destroy the fctx.
5364 */
5365 if (SHUTTINGDOWN(fctx) && !sentresponse) {
5366 bool bucket_empty;
5367 bucket_empty = maybe_destroy(fctx, true);
5368 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
5369 if (bucket_empty)
5370 empty_bucket(res);
5371 goto cleanup_event;
5372 }
5373
5374 isc_stdtime_get(&now);
5375
5376 /*
5377 * If chaining, we need to make sure that the right result code is
5378 * returned, and that the rdatasets are bound.
5379 */
5380 if (vevent->result == ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
5381 !negative &&
5382 vevent->rdataset != NULL &&
5383 CHAINING(vevent->rdataset))
5384 {
5385 if (vevent->rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_cname)
5386 eresult = DNS_R_CNAME;
5387 else {
5388 INSIST(vevent->rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_dname);
5389 eresult = DNS_R_DNAME;
5390 }
5391 chaining = true;
5392 } else
5393 chaining = false;
5394
5395 /*
5396 * Either we're not shutting down, or we are shutting down but want
5397 * to cache the result anyway (if this was a validation started by
5398 * a query with cd set)
5399 */
5400
5401 hevent = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->events);
5402 if (hevent != NULL) {
5403 if (!negative && !chaining &&
5404 (fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_any ||
5405 fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig ||
5406 fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_sig)) {
5407 /*
5408 * Don't bind rdatasets; the caller
5409 * will iterate the node.
5410 */
5411 } else {
5412 ardataset = hevent->rdataset;
5413 asigrdataset = hevent->sigrdataset;
5414 }
5415 }
5416
5417 if (vevent->result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
5418 FCTXTRACE("validation failed");
5419 inc_stats(res, dns_resstatscounter_valfail);
5420 fctx->valfail++;
5421 fctx->vresult = vevent->result;
5422 if (fctx->vresult != DNS_R_BROKENCHAIN) {
5423 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
5424 if (vevent->rdataset != NULL)
5425 result = dns_db_findnode(fctx->cache,
5426 vevent->name,
5427 true, &node);
5428 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5429 (void)dns_db_deleterdataset(fctx->cache, node,
5430 NULL,
5431 vevent->type, 0);
5432 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
5433 vevent->sigrdataset != NULL)
5434 (void)dns_db_deleterdataset(fctx->cache, node,
5435 NULL,
5436 dns_rdatatype_rrsig,
5437 vevent->type);
5438 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5439 dns_db_detachnode(fctx->cache, &node);
5440 }
5441 if (fctx->vresult == DNS_R_BROKENCHAIN && !negative) {
5442 /*
5443 * Cache the data as pending for later validation.
5444 */
5445 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
5446 if (vevent->rdataset != NULL)
5447 result = dns_db_findnode(fctx->cache,
5448 vevent->name,
5449 true, &node);
5450 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
5451 (void)dns_db_addrdataset(fctx->cache, node,
5452 NULL, now,
5453 vevent->rdataset, 0,
5454 NULL);
5455 }
5456 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
5457 vevent->sigrdataset != NULL)
5458 (void)dns_db_addrdataset(fctx->cache, node,
5459 NULL, now,
5460 vevent->sigrdataset,
5461 0, NULL);
5462 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5463 dns_db_detachnode(fctx->cache, &node);
5464 }
5465 result = fctx->vresult;
5466 add_bad(fctx, addrinfo, result, badns_validation);
5467 isc_event_free(&event);
5468 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
5469 INSIST(fctx->validator == NULL);
5470 fctx->validator = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->validators);
5471 if (fctx->validator != NULL)
5472 dns_validator_send(fctx->validator);
5473 else if (sentresponse)
5474 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__); /* Locks bucket. */
5475 else if (result == DNS_R_BROKENCHAIN) {
5476 isc_result_t tresult;
5477 isc_time_t expire;
5478 isc_interval_t i;
5479
5480 isc_interval_set(&i, DNS_RESOLVER_BADCACHETTL(fctx), 0);
5481 tresult = isc_time_nowplusinterval(&expire, &i);
5482 if (negative &&
5483 (fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_dnskey ||
5484 fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_dlv ||
5485 fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_ds) &&
5486 tresult == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5487 dns_resolver_addbadcache(res, &fctx->name,
5488 fctx->type, &expire);
5489 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__); /* Locks bucket. */
5490 } else
5491 fctx_try(fctx, true, true); /* Locks bucket. */
5492 return;
5493 }
5494
5495
5496 if (negative) {
5497 dns_rdatatype_t covers;
5498 FCTXTRACE("nonexistence validation OK");
5499
5500 inc_stats(res, dns_resstatscounter_valnegsuccess);
5501
5502 /*
5503 * Cache DS NXDOMAIN seperately to other types.
5504 */
5505 if (fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_nxdomain &&
5506 fctx->type != dns_rdatatype_ds)
5507 covers = dns_rdatatype_any;
5508 else
5509 covers = fctx->type;
5510
5511 result = dns_db_findnode(fctx->cache, vevent->name, true,
5512 &node);
5513 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5514 goto noanswer_response;
5515
5516 /*
5517 * If we are asking for a SOA record set the cache time
5518 * to zero to facilitate locating the containing zone of
5519 * a arbitrary zone.
5520 */
5521 ttl = res->view->maxncachettl;
5522 if (fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_soa &&
5523 covers == dns_rdatatype_any && res->zero_no_soa_ttl)
5524 ttl = 0;
5525
5526 result = ncache_adderesult(fctx->rmessage, fctx->cache, node,
5527 covers, now,
5528 fctx->res->view->minncachettl, ttl,
5529 vevent->optout, vevent->secure,
5530 ardataset, &eresult);
5531 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5532 goto noanswer_response;
5533 goto answer_response;
5534 } else
5535 inc_stats(res, dns_resstatscounter_valsuccess);
5536
5537 FCTXTRACE("validation OK");
5538
5539 if (vevent->proofs[DNS_VALIDATOR_NOQNAMEPROOF] != NULL) {
