5540 result = dns_rdataset_addnoqname(vevent->rdataset,
5541 vevent->proofs[DNS_VALIDATOR_NOQNAMEPROOF]);
5542 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
5543 INSIST(vevent->sigrdataset != NULL);
5544 vevent->sigrdataset->ttl = vevent->rdataset->ttl;
5545 if (vevent->proofs[DNS_VALIDATOR_CLOSESTENCLOSER] != NULL) {
5546 result = dns_rdataset_addclosest(vevent->rdataset,
5547 vevent->proofs[DNS_VALIDATOR_CLOSESTENCLOSER]);
5548 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
5549 }
5550 } else if (vevent->rdataset->trust == dns_trust_answer &&
5551 vevent->rdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_rrsig)
5552 {
5553 isc_result_t tresult;
5554 dns_name_t *noqname = NULL;
5555 tresult = findnoqname(fctx, vevent->name,
5556 vevent->rdataset->type, &noqname);
5557 if (tresult == ISC_R_SUCCESS && noqname != NULL) {
5558 tresult = dns_rdataset_addnoqname(vevent->rdataset,
5559 noqname);
5560 RUNTIME_CHECK(tresult == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
5561 }
5562 }
5563
5564 /*
5565 * The data was already cached as pending data.
5566 * Re-cache it as secure and bind the cached
5567 * rdatasets to the first event on the fetch
5568 * event list.
5569 */
5570 result = dns_db_findnode(fctx->cache, vevent->name, true, &node);
5571 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5572 goto noanswer_response;
5573
5574 options = 0;
5575 if ((fctx->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_PREFETCH) != 0)
5576 options = DNS_DBADD_PREFETCH;
5577 result = dns_db_addrdataset(fctx->cache, node, NULL, now,
5578 vevent->rdataset, options, ardataset);
5579 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
5580 result != DNS_R_UNCHANGED)
5581 goto noanswer_response;
5582 if (ardataset != NULL && NEGATIVE(ardataset)) {
5583 if (NXDOMAIN(ardataset))
5584 eresult = DNS_R_NCACHENXDOMAIN;
5585 else
5586 eresult = DNS_R_NCACHENXRRSET;
5587 } else if (vevent->sigrdataset != NULL) {
5588 result = dns_db_addrdataset(fctx->cache, node, NULL, now,
5589 vevent->sigrdataset, options,
5590 asigrdataset);
5591 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
5592 result != DNS_R_UNCHANGED)
5593 goto noanswer_response;
5594 }
5595
5596 if (sentresponse) {
5597 bool bucket_empty = false;
5598 /*
5599 * If we only deferred the destroy because we wanted to cache
5600 * the data, destroy now.
5601 */
5602 dns_db_detachnode(fctx->cache, &node);
5603 if (SHUTTINGDOWN(fctx))
5604 bucket_empty = maybe_destroy(fctx, true);
5605 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
5606 if (bucket_empty)
5607 empty_bucket(res);
5608 goto cleanup_event;
5609 }
5610
5611 if (!ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->validators)) {
5612 INSIST(!negative);
5613 INSIST(fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_any ||
5614 fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig ||
5615 fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_sig);
5616 /*
5617 * Don't send a response yet - we have
5618 * more rdatasets that still need to
5619 * be validated.
5620 */
5621 dns_db_detachnode(fctx->cache, &node);
5622 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
5623 dns_validator_send(ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->validators));
5624 goto cleanup_event;
5625 }
5626
5627 answer_response:
5628 /*
5629 * Cache any SOA/NS/NSEC records that happened to be validated.
5630 */
5631 result = dns_message_firstname(fctx->rmessage, DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY);
5632 while (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
5633 name = NULL;
5634 dns_message_currentname(fctx->rmessage, DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY,
5635 &name);
5636 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
5637 rdataset != NULL;
5638 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link)) {
5639 if ((rdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_ns &&
5640 rdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_soa &&
5641 rdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_nsec) ||
5642 rdataset->trust != dns_trust_secure)
5643 continue;
5644 for (sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
5645 sigrdataset != NULL;
5646 sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(sigrdataset, link)) {
5647 if (sigrdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_rrsig ||
5648 sigrdataset->covers != rdataset->type)
5649 continue;
5650 break;
5651 }
5652 if (sigrdataset == NULL ||
5653 sigrdataset->trust != dns_trust_secure)
5654 continue;
5655 result = dns_db_findnode(fctx->cache, name, true,
5656 &nsnode);
5657 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5658 continue;
5659
5660 result = dns_db_addrdataset(fctx->cache, nsnode, NULL,
5661 now, rdataset, 0, NULL);
5662 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5663 result = dns_db_addrdataset(fctx->cache, nsnode,
5664 NULL, now,
5665 sigrdataset, 0,
5666 NULL);
5667 dns_db_detachnode(fctx->cache, &nsnode);
5668 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5669 continue;
5670 }
5671 result = dns_message_nextname(fctx->rmessage,
5672 DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY);
5673 }
5674
5675 /*
5676 * Add the wild card entry.
5677 */
5678 if (vevent->proofs[DNS_VALIDATOR_NOQNAMEPROOF] != NULL &&
5679 vevent->rdataset != NULL &&
5680 dns_rdataset_isassociated(vevent->rdataset) &&
5681 vevent->rdataset->trust == dns_trust_secure &&
5682 vevent->sigrdataset != NULL &&
5683 dns_rdataset_isassociated(vevent->sigrdataset) &&
5684 vevent->sigrdataset->trust == dns_trust_secure &&
5685 wild != NULL)
5686 {
5687 dns_dbnode_t *wnode = NULL;
5688
5689 result = dns_db_findnode(fctx->cache, wild, true, &wnode);
5690 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5691 result = dns_db_addrdataset(fctx->cache, wnode, NULL,
5692 now, vevent->rdataset, 0,
5693 NULL);
5694 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5695 (void)dns_db_addrdataset(fctx->cache, wnode, NULL, now,
5696 vevent->sigrdataset, 0, NULL);
5697 if (wnode != NULL)
5698 dns_db_detachnode(fctx->cache, &wnode);
5699 }
5700
5701 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
5702
5703 /*
5704 * Respond with an answer, positive or negative,
5705 * as opposed to an error. 'node' must be non-NULL.
5706 */
5707
5708 fctx->attributes |= FCTX_ATTR_HAVEANSWER;
5709
5710 if (hevent != NULL) {
5711 /*
5712 * Negative results must be indicated in event->result.
5713 */
5714 INSIST(hevent->rdataset != NULL);
5715 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(hevent->rdataset) &&
5716 NEGATIVE(hevent->rdataset)) {
5717 INSIST(eresult == DNS_R_NCACHENXDOMAIN ||
5718 eresult == DNS_R_NCACHENXRRSET);
5719 }
5720 hevent->result = eresult;
5721 RUNTIME_CHECK(dns_name_copy(vevent->name,
5722 dns_fixedname_name(&hevent->foundname), NULL)
5723 == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
5724 dns_db_attach(fctx->cache, &hevent->db);
5725 dns_db_transfernode(fctx->cache, &node, &hevent->node);
5726 clone_results(fctx);
5727 }
5728
5729 noanswer_response:
5730 if (node != NULL)
5731 dns_db_detachnode(fctx->cache, &node);
5732
5733 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
5734 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__); /* Locks bucket. */
5735
5736 cleanup_event:
5737 INSIST(node == NULL);
5738 isc_event_free(&event);
5739}
5740
5741static void
5742fctx_log(void *arg, int level, const char *fmt, ...) {
5743 char msgbuf[2048];
5744 va_list args;
5745 fetchctx_t *fctx = arg;
5746
5747 va_start(args, fmt);
5748 vsnprintf(msgbuf, sizeof(msgbuf), fmt, args);
5749 va_end(args);
5750
5751 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
5752 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, level,
5753 "fctx %p(%s): %s", fctx, fctx->info, msgbuf);
5754}
5755
5756static inline isc_result_t
5757findnoqname(fetchctx_t *fctx, dns_name_t *name, dns_rdatatype_t type,
5758 dns_name_t **noqnamep)
5759{
5760 dns_rdataset_t *nrdataset, *next, *sigrdataset;
5761 dns_rdata_rrsig_t rrsig;
5762 isc_result_t result;
5763 unsigned int labels;
5764 dns_section_t section;
5765 dns_name_t *zonename;
5766 dns_fixedname_t fzonename;
5767 dns_name_t *closest;
5768 dns_fixedname_t fclosest;
5769 dns_name_t *nearest;
5770 dns_fixedname_t fnearest;
5771 dns_rdatatype_t found = dns_rdatatype_none;
5772 dns_name_t *noqname = NULL;
5773
5774 FCTXTRACE("findnoqname");
5775
5776 REQUIRE(noqnamep != NULL && *noqnamep == NULL);
5777
5778 /*
5779 * Find the SIG for this rdataset, if we have it.
5780 */
5781 for (sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
5782 sigrdataset != NULL;
5783 sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(sigrdataset, link)) {
5784 if (sigrdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig &&
5785 sigrdataset->covers == type)
5786 break;
5787 }
5788
5789 if (sigrdataset == NULL)
5790 return (ISC_R_NOTFOUND);
5791
5792 labels = dns_name_countlabels(name);
5793
5794 for (result = dns_rdataset_first(sigrdataset);
5795 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS;
5796 result = dns_rdataset_next(sigrdataset)) {
5797 dns_rdata_t rdata = DNS_RDATA_INIT;
5798 dns_rdataset_current(sigrdataset, &rdata);
5799 result = dns_rdata_tostruct(&rdata, &rrsig, NULL);
5800 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
5801 /* Wildcard has rrsig.labels < labels - 1. */
5802 if (rrsig.labels + 1U >= labels)
5803 continue;
5804 break;
5805 }
5806
5807 if (result == ISC_R_NOMORE)
5808 return (ISC_R_NOTFOUND);
5809 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5810 return (result);
5811
5812 zonename = dns_fixedname_initname(&fzonename);
5813 closest = dns_fixedname_initname(&fclosest);
5814 nearest = dns_fixedname_initname(&fnearest);
5815
5816#define NXND(x) ((x) == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
5817
5818 section = DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY;
5819 for (result = dns_message_firstname(fctx->rmessage, section);
5820 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS;
5821 result = dns_message_nextname(fctx->rmessage, section)) {
5822 dns_name_t *nsec = NULL;
5823 dns_message_currentname(fctx->rmessage, section, &nsec);
5824 for (nrdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(nsec->list);
5825 nrdataset != NULL; nrdataset = next) {
5826 bool data = false, exists = false;
5827 bool optout = false, unknown = false;
5828 bool setclosest = false;
5829 bool setnearest = false;
5830
5831 next = ISC_LIST_NEXT(nrdataset, link);
5832 if (nrdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_nsec &&
5833 nrdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_nsec3)
5834 continue;
5835
5836 if (nrdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_nsec &&
5837 NXND(dns_nsec_noexistnodata(type, name, nsec,
5838 nrdataset, &exists,
5839 &data, NULL, fctx_log,
5840 fctx)))
5841 {
5842 if (!exists) {
5843 noqname = nsec;
5844 found = dns_rdatatype_nsec;
5845 }
5846 }
5847
5848 if (nrdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_nsec3 &&
5849 NXND(dns_nsec3_noexistnodata(type, name, nsec,
5850 nrdataset, zonename,
5851 &exists, &data,
5852 &optout, &unknown,
5853 &setclosest,
5854 &setnearest,
5855 closest, nearest,
5856 fctx_log, fctx)))
5857 {
5858 if (!exists && setnearest) {
5859 noqname = nsec;
5860 found = dns_rdatatype_nsec3;
5861 }
5862 }
5863 }
5864 }
5865 if (result == ISC_R_NOMORE)
5866 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
5867 if (noqname != NULL) {
5868 for (sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(noqname->list);
5869 sigrdataset != NULL;
5870 sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(sigrdataset, link)) {
5871 if (sigrdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig &&
5872 sigrdataset->covers == found)
5873 break;
5874 }
5875 if (sigrdataset != NULL)
5876 *noqnamep = noqname;
5877 }
5878 return (result);
5879}
5880
5881static inline isc_result_t
5882cache_name(fetchctx_t *fctx, dns_name_t *name, dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo,
5883 isc_stdtime_t now)
5884{
5885 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset = NULL, *sigrdataset = NULL;
5886 dns_rdataset_t *addedrdataset = NULL;
5887 dns_rdataset_t *ardataset = NULL, *asigrdataset = NULL;
5888 dns_rdataset_t *valrdataset = NULL, *valsigrdataset = NULL;
5889 dns_dbnode_t *node = NULL, **anodep = NULL;
5890 dns_db_t **adbp = NULL;
5891 dns_name_t *aname = NULL;
5892 dns_resolver_t *res = fctx->res;
5893 bool need_validation = false;
5894 bool secure_domain = false;
5895 bool have_answer = false;
5896 isc_result_t result, eresult = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
5897 dns_fetchevent_t *event = NULL;
5898 unsigned int options;
5899 isc_task_t *task;
5900 bool fail;
5901 unsigned int valoptions = 0;
5902 bool checknta = true;
5903
5904 FCTXTRACE("cache_name");
5905
5906 /*
5907 * The appropriate bucket lock must be held.
5908 */
5909 task = res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].task;
5910
5911 /*
5912 * Is DNSSEC validation required for this name?
5913 */
5914 if ((fctx->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_NONTA) != 0) {
5915 valoptions |= DNS_VALIDATOR_NONTA;
5916 checknta = false;
5917 }
5918
5919 if (res->view->enablevalidation) {
5920 result = issecuredomain(res->view, name, fctx->type,
5921 now, checknta, &secure_domain);
5922 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
5923 return (result);
5924 }
5925
5926 if (!secure_domain && res->view->dlv != NULL) {
5927 valoptions |= DNS_VALIDATOR_DLV;
5928 secure_domain = true;
5929 }
5930 }
5931
5932 if ((fctx->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOCDFLAG) != 0) {
5933 valoptions |= DNS_VALIDATOR_NOCDFLAG;
5934 }
5935
5936 if ((fctx->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOVALIDATE) != 0) {
5937 need_validation = false;
5938 } else {
5939 need_validation = secure_domain;
5940 }
5941
5942 if (((name->attributes & DNS_NAMEATTR_ANSWER) != 0) &&
5943 (!need_validation))
5944 {
5945 have_answer = true;
5946 event = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->events);
5947 if (event != NULL) {
5948 adbp = &event->db;
5949 aname = dns_fixedname_name(&event->foundname);
5950 result = dns_name_copy(name, aname, NULL);
5951 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
5952 return (result);
5953 }
5954 anodep = &event->node;
5955 /*
5956 * If this is an ANY, SIG or RRSIG query, we're not
5957 * going to return any rdatasets, unless we encountered
5958 * a CNAME or DNAME as "the answer". In this case,
5959 * we're going to return DNS_R_CNAME or DNS_R_DNAME
5960 * and we must set up the rdatasets.
5961 */
5962 if ((fctx->type != dns_rdatatype_any &&
5963 fctx->type != dns_rdatatype_rrsig &&
5964 fctx->type != dns_rdatatype_sig) ||
5965 (name->attributes & DNS_NAMEATTR_CHAINING) != 0)
5966 {
5967 ardataset = event->rdataset;
5968 asigrdataset = event->sigrdataset;
5969 }
5970 }
5971 }
5972
5973 /*
5974 * Find or create the cache node.
5975 */
5976 node = NULL;
5977 result = dns_db_findnode(fctx->cache, name, true, &node);
5978 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
5979 return (result);
5980 }
5981
5982 /*
5983 * Cache or validate each cacheable rdataset.
5984 */
5985 fail = ((fctx->res->options & DNS_RESOLVER_CHECKNAMESFAIL) != 0);
5986 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
5987 rdataset != NULL;
5988 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link))
5989 {
5990 if (!CACHE(rdataset)) {
5991 continue;
5992 }
5993 if (CHECKNAMES(rdataset)) {
5994 char namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
5995 char typebuf[DNS_RDATATYPE_FORMATSIZE];
5996 char classbuf[DNS_RDATATYPE_FORMATSIZE];
5997
5998 dns_name_format(name, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
5999 dns_rdatatype_format(rdataset->type, typebuf,
6000 sizeof(typebuf));
6001 dns_rdataclass_format(rdataset->rdclass, classbuf,
6002 sizeof(classbuf));
6003 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
6004 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
6005 "check-names %s %s/%s/%s",
6006 fail ? "failure" : "warning",
6007 namebuf, typebuf, classbuf);
6008 if (fail) {
6009 if (ANSWER(rdataset)) {
6010 dns_db_detachnode(fctx->cache, &node);
6011 return (DNS_R_BADNAME);
6012 }
6013 continue;
6014 }
6015 }
6016
6017 /*
6018 * Enforce the configure maximum cache TTL.
6019 */
6020 if (rdataset->ttl > res->view->maxcachettl) {
6021 rdataset->ttl = res->view->maxcachettl;
6022 }
6023
6024 /*
6025 * Enforce configured minimum cache TTL.
6026 */
6027 if (rdataset->ttl < res->view->mincachettl) {
6028 rdataset->ttl = res->view->mincachettl;
6029 }
6030
6031 /*
6032 * Mark the rdataset as being prefetch eligible.
6033 */
6034 if (rdataset->ttl > fctx->res->view->prefetch_eligible) {
6035 rdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_PREFETCH;
6036 }
6037
6038 /*
6039 * Find the SIG for this rdataset, if we have it.
6040 */
6041 for (sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
6042 sigrdataset != NULL;
6043 sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(sigrdataset, link))
6044 {
6045 if (sigrdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig &&
6046 sigrdataset->covers == rdataset->type)
6047 {
6048 break;
6049 }
6050 }
6051
6052 /*
6053 * If this RRset is in a secure domain, is in bailiwick,
6054 * and is not glue, attempt DNSSEC validation. (We do not
6055 * attempt to validate glue or out-of-bailiwick data--even
6056 * though there might be some performance benefit to doing
6057 * so--because it makes it simpler and safer to ensure that
6058 * records from a secure domain are only cached if validated
6059 * within the context of a query to the domain that owns
6060 * them.)
6061 */
6062 if (secure_domain && rdataset->trust != dns_trust_glue &&
6063 !EXTERNAL(rdataset))
6064 {
6065 dns_trust_t trust;
6066
6067 /*
6068 * RRSIGs are validated as part of validating the
6069 * type they cover.
6070 */
6071 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig) {
6072 continue;
6073 }
6074
6075 if (sigrdataset == NULL && need_validation &&
6076 !ANSWER(rdataset))
6077 {
6078 /*
6079 * Ignore unrelated non-answer
6080 * rdatasets that are missing signatures.
6081 */
6082 continue;
6083 }
6084
6085 /*
6086 * Normalize the rdataset and sigrdataset TTLs.
6087 */
6088 if (sigrdataset != NULL) {
6089 rdataset->ttl = ISC_MIN(rdataset->ttl,
6090 sigrdataset->ttl);
6091 sigrdataset->ttl = rdataset->ttl;
6092 }
6093
6094 /*
6095 * Mark the rdataset as being prefetch eligible.
6096 */
6097 if (rdataset->ttl > fctx->res->view->prefetch_eligible)
6098 {
6099 rdataset->attributes |=
6100 DNS_RDATASETATTR_PREFETCH;
6101 }
6102
6103 /*
6104 * Cache this rdataset/sigrdataset pair as
6105 * pending data. Track whether it was additional
6106 * or not. If this was a priming query, additional
6107 * should be cached as glue.
6108 */
6109 if (rdataset->trust == dns_trust_additional) {
6110 trust = dns_trust_pending_additional;
6111 } else {
6112 trust = dns_trust_pending_answer;
6113 }
6114
6115 rdataset->trust = trust;
6116 if (sigrdataset != NULL) {
6117 sigrdataset->trust = trust;
6118 }
6119 if (!need_validation || !ANSWER(rdataset)) {
6120 options = 0;
6121 if (ANSWER(rdataset) &&
6122 rdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_rrsig)
6123 {
6124 isc_result_t tresult;
6125 dns_name_t *noqname = NULL;
6126 tresult = findnoqname(fctx, name,
6127 rdataset->type,
6128 &noqname);
6129 if (tresult == ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
6130 noqname != NULL)
6131 {
6132 (void) dns_rdataset_addnoqname(
6133 rdataset, noqname);
6134 }
6135 }
6136 if ((fctx->options &
6137 DNS_FETCHOPT_PREFETCH) != 0)
6138 {
6139 options = DNS_DBADD_PREFETCH;
6140 }
6141 if ((fctx->options &
6142 DNS_FETCHOPT_NOCACHED) != 0)
6143 {
6144 options |= DNS_DBADD_FORCE;
6145 }
6146 addedrdataset = ardataset;
6147 result = dns_db_addrdataset(fctx->cache, node,
6148 NULL, now, rdataset,
6149 options,
6150 addedrdataset);
6151 if (result == DNS_R_UNCHANGED) {
6152 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
6153 if (!need_validation &&
6154 ardataset != NULL &&
6155 NEGATIVE(ardataset))
6156 {
6157 /*
6158 * The answer in the cache is
6159 * better than the answer we
6160 * found, and is a negative
6161 * cache entry, so we must set
6162 * eresult appropriately.
6163 */
6164 if (NXDOMAIN(ardataset)) {
6165 eresult =
6166 DNS_R_NCACHENXDOMAIN;
6167 } else {
6168 eresult =
6169 DNS_R_NCACHENXRRSET;
6170 }
6171 /*
6172 * We have a negative response
6173 * from the cache so don't
6174 * attempt to add the RRSIG
6175 * rrset.
6176 */
6177 continue;
6178 }
6179 }
6180 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
6181 break;
6182 }
6183 if (sigrdataset != NULL) {
6184 addedrdataset = asigrdataset;
6185 result = dns_db_addrdataset(fctx->cache,
6186 node, NULL, now,
6187 sigrdataset,
6188 options,
6189 addedrdataset);
6190 if (result == DNS_R_UNCHANGED) {
6191 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
6192 }
6193 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
6194 break;
6195 }
6196 } else if (!ANSWER(rdataset)) {
6197 continue;
6198 }
6199 }
6200
6201 if (ANSWER(rdataset) && need_validation) {
6202 if (fctx->type != dns_rdatatype_any &&
6203 fctx->type != dns_rdatatype_rrsig &&
6204 fctx->type != dns_rdatatype_sig)
6205 {
6206 /*
6207 * This is The Answer. We will
6208 * validate it, but first we cache
6209 * the rest of the response - it may
6210 * contain useful keys.
6211 */
6212 INSIST(valrdataset == NULL &&
6213 valsigrdataset == NULL);
6214 valrdataset = rdataset;
6215 valsigrdataset = sigrdataset;
6216 } else {
6217 /*
6218 * This is one of (potentially)
6219 * multiple answers to an ANY
6220 * or SIG query. To keep things
6221 * simple, we just start the
6222 * validator right away rather
6223 * than caching first and
6224 * having to remember which
6225 * rdatasets needed validation.
6226 */
6227 result = valcreate(fctx, addrinfo,
6228 name, rdataset->type,
6229 rdataset,
6230 sigrdataset,
6231 valoptions, task);
6232 }
6233 } else if (CHAINING(rdataset)) {
6234 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_cname) {
6235 eresult = DNS_R_CNAME;
6236 } else {
6237 INSIST(rdataset->type ==
6238 dns_rdatatype_dname);
6239 eresult = DNS_R_DNAME;
6240 }
6241 }
6242 } else if (!EXTERNAL(rdataset)) {
6243 /*
6244 * It's OK to cache this rdataset now.
6245 */
6246 if (ANSWER(rdataset)) {
6247 addedrdataset = ardataset;
6248 } else if (ANSWERSIG(rdataset)) {
6249 addedrdataset = asigrdataset;
6250 } else {
6251 addedrdataset = NULL;
6252 }
6253 if (CHAINING(rdataset)) {
6254 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_cname) {
6255 eresult = DNS_R_CNAME;
6256 } else {
6257 INSIST(rdataset->type ==
6258 dns_rdatatype_dname);
6259 eresult = DNS_R_DNAME;
6260 }
6261 }
6262 if (rdataset->trust == dns_trust_glue &&
6263 (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_ns ||
6264 (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig &&
6265 rdataset->covers == dns_rdatatype_ns)))
6266 {
6267 /*
6268 * If the trust level is 'dns_trust_glue'
6269 * then we are adding data from a referral
6270 * we got while executing the search algorithm.
6271 * New referral data always takes precedence
6272 * over the existing cache contents.
6273 */
6274 options = DNS_DBADD_FORCE;
6275 } else if ((fctx->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_PREFETCH) != 0)
6276 {
6277 options = DNS_DBADD_PREFETCH;
6278 } else {
6279 options = 0;
6280 }
6281
6282 if (ANSWER(rdataset) &&
6283 rdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_rrsig)
6284 {
6285 isc_result_t tresult;
6286 dns_name_t *noqname = NULL;
6287 tresult = findnoqname(fctx, name,
6288 rdataset->type, &noqname);
6289 if (tresult == ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
6290 noqname != NULL)
6291 {
6292 (void) dns_rdataset_addnoqname(
6293 rdataset, noqname);
6294 }
6295 }
6296
6297 /*
6298 * Now we can add the rdataset.
6299 */
6300 result = dns_db_addrdataset(fctx->cache,
6301 node, NULL, now,
6302 rdataset,
6303 options,
6304 addedrdataset);
6305
6306 if (result == DNS_R_UNCHANGED) {
6307 if (ANSWER(rdataset) &&
6308 ardataset != NULL &&
6309 NEGATIVE(ardataset))
6310 {
6311 /*
6312 * The answer in the cache is better
6313 * than the answer we found, and is
6314 * a negative cache entry, so we
6315 * must set eresult appropriately.
6316 */
6317 if (NXDOMAIN(ardataset)) {
6318 eresult = DNS_R_NCACHENXDOMAIN;
6319 } else {
6320 eresult = DNS_R_NCACHENXRRSET;
6321 }
6322 }
6323 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
6324 } else if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
6325 break;
6326 }
6327 }
6328 }
6329
6330 if (valrdataset != NULL) {
6331 dns_rdatatype_t vtype = fctx->type;
6332 if (CHAINING(valrdataset)) {
6333 if (valrdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_cname) {
6334 vtype = dns_rdatatype_cname;
6335 } else {
6336 vtype = dns_rdatatype_dname;
6337 }
6338 }
6339 result = valcreate(fctx, addrinfo, name, vtype, valrdataset,
6340 valsigrdataset, valoptions, task);
6341 }
6342
6343 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && have_answer) {
6344 fctx->attributes |= FCTX_ATTR_HAVEANSWER;
6345 if (event != NULL) {
6346 /*
6347 * Negative results must be indicated in event->result.
6348 */
6349 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(event->rdataset) &&
6350 NEGATIVE(event->rdataset))
6351 {
6352 INSIST(eresult == DNS_R_NCACHENXDOMAIN ||
6353 eresult == DNS_R_NCACHENXRRSET);
6354 }
6355 event->result = eresult;
6356 if (adbp != NULL && *adbp != NULL) {
6357 if (anodep != NULL && *anodep != NULL) {
6358 dns_db_detachnode(*adbp, anodep);
6359 }
6360 dns_db_detach(adbp);
6361 }
6362 dns_db_attach(fctx->cache, adbp);
6363 dns_db_transfernode(fctx->cache, &node, anodep);
6364 clone_results(fctx);
6365 }
6366 }
6367
6368 if (node != NULL) {
6369 dns_db_detachnode(fctx->cache, &node);
6370 }
6371
6372 return (result);
6373}
6374
6375static inline isc_result_t
6376cache_message(fetchctx_t *fctx, dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo, isc_stdtime_t now)
6377{
6378 isc_result_t result;
6379 dns_section_t section;
6380 dns_name_t *name;
6381
6382 FCTXTRACE("cache_message");
6383
6384 fctx->attributes &= ~FCTX_ATTR_WANTCACHE;
6385
6386 LOCK(&fctx->res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
6387
6388 for (section = DNS_SECTION_ANSWER;
6389 section <= DNS_SECTION_ADDITIONAL;
6390 section++) {
6391 result = dns_message_firstname(fctx->rmessage, section);
6392 while (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
6393 name = NULL;
6394 dns_message_currentname(fctx->rmessage, section,
6395 &name);
6396 if ((name->attributes & DNS_NAMEATTR_CACHE) != 0) {
6397 result = cache_name(fctx, name, addrinfo, now);
6398 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
6399 break;
6400 }
6401 result = dns_message_nextname(fctx->rmessage, section);
6402 }
6403 if (result != ISC_R_NOMORE)
6404 break;
6405 }
6406 if (result == ISC_R_NOMORE)
6407 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
6408
6409 UNLOCK(&fctx->res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
6410
6411 return (result);
6412}
6413
6414/*
6415 * Do what dns_ncache_addoptout() does, and then compute an appropriate eresult.
6416 */
6417static isc_result_t
6418ncache_adderesult(dns_message_t *message, dns_db_t *cache, dns_dbnode_t *node,
6419 dns_rdatatype_t covers, isc_stdtime_t now,
6420 dns_ttl_t minttl, dns_ttl_t maxttl,
6421 bool optout, bool secure,
6422 dns_rdataset_t *ardataset, isc_result_t *eresultp)
6423{
6424 isc_result_t result;
6425 dns_rdataset_t rdataset;
6426
6427 if (ardataset == NULL) {
6428 dns_rdataset_init(&rdataset);
6429 ardataset = &rdataset;
6430 }
6431 if (secure)
6432 result = dns_ncache_addoptout(message, cache, node, covers,
6433 now, minttl, maxttl, optout, ardataset);
6434 else
6435 result = dns_ncache_add(message, cache, node, covers, now,
6436 minttl, maxttl, ardataset);
6437 if (result == DNS_R_UNCHANGED || result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
6438 /*
6439 * If the cache now contains a negative entry and we
6440 * care about whether it is DNS_R_NCACHENXDOMAIN or
6441 * DNS_R_NCACHENXRRSET then extract it.
6442 */
6443 if (NEGATIVE(ardataset)) {
6444 /*
6445 * The cache data is a negative cache entry.
6446 */
6447 if (NXDOMAIN(ardataset))
6448 *eresultp = DNS_R_NCACHENXDOMAIN;
6449 else
6450 *eresultp = DNS_R_NCACHENXRRSET;
6451 } else {
6452 /*
6453 * Either we don't care about the nature of the
6454 * cache rdataset (because no fetch is interested
6455 * in the outcome), or the cache rdataset is not
6456 * a negative cache entry. Whichever case it is,
6457 * we can return success.
6458 *
6459 * XXXRTH There's a CNAME/DNAME problem here.
6460 */
6461 *eresultp = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
6462 }
6463 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
6464 }
6465 if (ardataset == &rdataset && dns_rdataset_isassociated(ardataset))
6466 dns_rdataset_disassociate(ardataset);
6467
6468 return (result);
6469}
6470
6471static inline isc_result_t
6472ncache_message(fetchctx_t *fctx, dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo,
6473 dns_rdatatype_t covers, isc_stdtime_t now)
6474{
6475 isc_result_t result, eresult;
6476 dns_name_t *name;
6477 dns_resolver_t *res;
6478 dns_db_t **adbp;
6479 dns_dbnode_t *node, **anodep;
6480 dns_rdataset_t *ardataset;
6481 bool need_validation, secure_domain;
6482 dns_name_t *aname;
6483 dns_fetchevent_t *event;
6484 uint32_t ttl;
6485 unsigned int valoptions = 0;
6486 bool checknta = true;
6487
6488 FCTXTRACE("ncache_message");
6489
6490 fctx->attributes &= ~FCTX_ATTR_WANTNCACHE;
6491
6492 res = fctx->res;
6493 need_validation = false;
6494 POST(need_validation);
6495 secure_domain = false;
6496 eresult = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
6497 name = &fctx->name;
6498 node = NULL;
6499
6500 /*
6501 * XXXMPA remove when we follow cnames and adjust the setting
6502 * of FCTX_ATTR_WANTNCACHE in rctx_answer_none().
6503 */
6504 INSIST(fctx->rmessage->counts[DNS_SECTION_ANSWER] == 0);
6505
6506 /*
6507 * Is DNSSEC validation required for this name?
6508 */
6509 if ((fctx->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_NONTA) != 0) {
6510 valoptions |= DNS_VALIDATOR_NONTA;
6511 checknta = false;
6512 }
6513
6514 if (fctx->res->view->enablevalidation) {
6515 result = issecuredomain(res->view, name, fctx->type,
6516 now, checknta, &secure_domain);
6517 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
6518 return (result);
6519
6520 if (!secure_domain && res->view->dlv != NULL) {
6521 valoptions |= DNS_VALIDATOR_DLV;
6522 secure_domain = true;
6523 }
6524 }
6525
6526 if ((fctx->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOCDFLAG) != 0)
6527 valoptions |= DNS_VALIDATOR_NOCDFLAG;
6528
6529 if ((fctx->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOVALIDATE) != 0)
6530 need_validation = false;
6531 else
6532 need_validation = secure_domain;
6533
6534 if (secure_domain) {
6535 /*
6536 * Mark all rdatasets as pending.
6537 */
6538 dns_rdataset_t *trdataset;
6539 dns_name_t *tname;
6540
6541 result = dns_message_firstname(fctx->rmessage,
6542 DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY);
6543 while (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
6544 tname = NULL;
6545 dns_message_currentname(fctx->rmessage,
6546 DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY,
6547 &tname);
6548 for (trdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(tname->list);
6549 trdataset != NULL;
6550 trdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(trdataset, link))
6551 trdataset->trust = dns_trust_pending_answer;
6552 result = dns_message_nextname(fctx->rmessage,
6553 DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY);
6554 }
6555 if (result != ISC_R_NOMORE)
6556 return (result);
6557
6558 }
6559
6560 if (need_validation) {
6561 /*
6562 * Do negative response validation.
6563 */
6564 result = valcreate(fctx, addrinfo, name, fctx->type,
6565 NULL, NULL, valoptions,
6566 res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].task);
6567 /*
6568 * If validation is necessary, return now. Otherwise continue
6569 * to process the message, letting the validation complete
6570 * in its own good time.
6571 */
6572 return (result);
6573 }
6574
6575 LOCK(&res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
6576
6577 adbp = NULL;
6578 aname = NULL;
6579 anodep = NULL;
6580 ardataset = NULL;
6581 if (!HAVE_ANSWER(fctx)) {
6582 event = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->events);
6583 if (event != NULL) {
6584 adbp = &event->db;
6585 aname = dns_fixedname_name(&event->foundname);
6586 result = dns_name_copy(name, aname, NULL);
6587 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
6588 goto unlock;
6589 anodep = &event->node;
6590 ardataset = event->rdataset;
6591 }
6592 } else
6593 event = NULL;
6594
6595 result = dns_db_findnode(fctx->cache, name, true, &node);
6596 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
6597 goto unlock;
6598
6599 /*
6600 * If we are asking for a SOA record set the cache time
6601 * to zero to facilitate locating the containing zone of
6602 * a arbitrary zone.
6603 */
6604 ttl = fctx->res->view->maxncachettl;
6605 if (fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_soa &&
6606 covers == dns_rdatatype_any &&
6607 fctx->res->zero_no_soa_ttl)
6608 ttl = 0;
6609
6610 result = ncache_adderesult(fctx->rmessage, fctx->cache, node,
6611 covers, now,
6612 fctx->res->view->minncachettl, ttl,
6613 false, false, ardataset, &eresult);
6614 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
6615 goto unlock;
6616
6617 if (!HAVE_ANSWER(fctx)) {
6618 fctx->attributes |= FCTX_ATTR_HAVEANSWER;
6619 if (event != NULL) {
6620 event->result = eresult;
6621 if (adbp != NULL && *adbp != NULL) {
6622 if (anodep != NULL && *anodep != NULL)
6623 dns_db_detachnode(*adbp, anodep);
6624 dns_db_detach(adbp);
6625 }
6626 dns_db_attach(fctx->cache, adbp);
6627 dns_db_transfernode(fctx->cache, &node, anodep);
6628 clone_results(fctx);
6629 }
6630 }
6631
6632 unlock:
6633 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
6634
6635 if (node != NULL)
6636 dns_db_detachnode(fctx->cache, &node);
6637
6638 return (result);
6639}
6640
6641static inline void
6642mark_related(dns_name_t *name, dns_rdataset_t *rdataset,
6643 bool external, bool gluing)
6644{
6645 name->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_CACHE;
6646 if (gluing) {
6647 rdataset->trust = dns_trust_glue;
6648 /*
6649 * Glue with 0 TTL causes problems. We force the TTL to
6650 * 1 second to prevent this.
6651 */
6652 if (rdataset->ttl == 0)
6653 rdataset->ttl = 1;
6654 } else
6655 rdataset->trust = dns_trust_additional;
6656 /*
6657 * Avoid infinite loops by only marking new rdatasets.
6658 */
6659 if (!CACHE(rdataset)) {
6660 name->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_CHASE;
6661 rdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CHASE;
6662 }
6663 rdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE;
6664 if (external)
6665 rdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_EXTERNAL;
6666}
6667
6668static isc_result_t
6669check_section(void *arg, const dns_name_t *addname, dns_rdatatype_t type,
6670 dns_section_t section)
6671{
6672 fetchctx_t *fctx = arg;
6673 isc_result_t result;
6674 dns_name_t *name = NULL;
6675 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset = NULL;
6676 bool external;
6677 dns_rdatatype_t rtype;
6678 bool gluing;
6679
6680 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
6681
6682#if CHECK_FOR_GLUE_IN_ANSWER
6683 if (section == DNS_SECTION_ANSWER && type != dns_rdatatype_a)
6684 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
6685#endif
6686
6687 gluing = (GLUING(fctx) ||
6688 (fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_ns &&
6689 dns_name_equal(&fctx->name, dns_rootname)));
6690
6691 result = dns_message_findname(fctx->rmessage, section, addname,
6692 dns_rdatatype_any, 0, &name, NULL);
6693 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
6694 external = !dns_name_issubdomain(name, &fctx->domain);
6695 if (type == dns_rdatatype_a) {
6696 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
6697 rdataset != NULL;
6698 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link)) {
6699 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig)
6700 rtype = rdataset->covers;
6701 else
6702 rtype = rdataset->type;
6703 if (rtype == dns_rdatatype_a ||
6704 rtype == dns_rdatatype_aaaa)
6705 mark_related(name, rdataset, external,
6706 gluing);
6707 }
6708 } else {
6709 result = dns_message_findtype(name, type, 0,
6710 &rdataset);
6711 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
6712 mark_related(name, rdataset, external, gluing);
6713 /*
6714 * Do we have its SIG too?
6715 */
6716 rdataset = NULL;
6717 result = dns_message_findtype(name,
6718 dns_rdatatype_rrsig,
6719 type, &rdataset);
6720 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
6721 mark_related(name, rdataset, external,
6722 gluing);
6723 }
6724 }
6725 }
6726
6727 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
6728}
6729
6730static isc_result_t
6731check_related(void *arg, const dns_name_t *addname, dns_rdatatype_t type) {
6732 return (check_section(arg, addname, type, DNS_SECTION_ADDITIONAL));
6733}
6734
6735#ifndef CHECK_FOR_GLUE_IN_ANSWER
6736#define CHECK_FOR_GLUE_IN_ANSWER 0
6737#endif
6738
6739#if CHECK_FOR_GLUE_IN_ANSWER
6740static isc_result_t
6741check_answer(void *arg, const dns_name_t *addname, dns_rdatatype_t type) {
6742 return (check_section(arg, addname, type, DNS_SECTION_ANSWER));
6743}
6744#endif
6745
6746static bool
6747is_answeraddress_allowed(dns_view_t *view, dns_name_t *name,
6748 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset)
6749{
6750 isc_result_t result;
6751 dns_rdata_t rdata = DNS_RDATA_INIT;
6752 struct in_addr ina;
6753 struct in6_addr in6a;
6754 isc_netaddr_t netaddr;
6755 char addrbuf[ISC_NETADDR_FORMATSIZE];
6756 char namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
6757 char classbuf[64];
6758 char typebuf[64];
6759 int match;
6760
6761 /* By default, we allow any addresses. */
6762 if (view->denyansweracl == NULL)
6763 return (true);
6764
6765 /*
6766 * If the owner name matches one in the exclusion list, either exactly
6767 * or partially, allow it.
6768 */
6769 if (view->answeracl_exclude != NULL) {
6770 dns_rbtnode_t *node = NULL;
6771
6772 result = dns_rbt_findnode(view->answeracl_exclude, name, NULL,
6773 &node, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL);
6774
6775 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == DNS_R_PARTIALMATCH)
6776 return (true);
6777 }
6778
6779 /*
6780 * Otherwise, search the filter list for a match for each address
6781 * record. If a match is found, the address should be filtered,
6782 * so should the entire answer.
6783 */
6784 for (result = dns_rdataset_first(rdataset);
6785 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS;
6786 result = dns_rdataset_next(rdataset)) {
6787 dns_rdata_reset(&rdata);
6788 dns_rdataset_current(rdataset, &rdata);
6789 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_a) {
6790 INSIST(rdata.length == sizeof(ina.s_addr));
6791 memmove(&ina.s_addr, rdata.data, sizeof(ina.s_addr));
6792 isc_netaddr_fromin(&netaddr, &ina);
6793 } else {
6794 INSIST(rdata.length == sizeof(in6a.s6_addr));
6795 memmove(in6a.s6_addr, rdata.data, sizeof(in6a.s6_addr));
6796 isc_netaddr_fromin6(&netaddr, &in6a);
6797 }
6798
6799 result = dns_acl_match(&netaddr, NULL, view->denyansweracl,
6800 &view->aclenv, &match, NULL);
6801 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && match > 0) {
6802 isc_netaddr_format(&netaddr, addrbuf, sizeof(addrbuf));
6803 dns_name_format(name, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
6804 dns_rdatatype_format(rdataset->type, typebuf,
6805 sizeof(typebuf));
6806 dns_rdataclass_format(rdataset->rdclass, classbuf,
6807 sizeof(classbuf));
6808 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
6809 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
6810 "answer address %s denied for %s/%s/%s",
6811 addrbuf, namebuf, typebuf, classbuf);
6812 return (false);
6813 }
6814 }
6815
6816 return (true);
6817}
6818
6819static bool
6820is_answertarget_allowed(fetchctx_t *fctx, dns_name_t *qname, dns_name_t *rname,
6821 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset, bool *chainingp)
6822{
6823 isc_result_t result;
6824 dns_rbtnode_t *node = NULL;
6825 char qnamebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
6826 char tnamebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
6827 char classbuf[64];
6828 char typebuf[64];
6829 dns_name_t *tname = NULL;
6830 dns_rdata_cname_t cname;
6831 dns_rdata_dname_t dname;
6832 dns_view_t *view = fctx->res->view;
6833 dns_rdata_t rdata = DNS_RDATA_INIT;
6834 unsigned int nlabels;
6835 dns_fixedname_t fixed;
6836 dns_name_t prefix;
6837 int order;
6838
6839 REQUIRE(rdataset != NULL);
6840 REQUIRE(rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_cname ||
6841 rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_dname);
6842
6843 /*
6844 * By default, we allow any target name.
6845 * If newqname != NULL we also need to extract the newqname.
6846 */
6847 if (chainingp == NULL && view->denyanswernames == NULL)
6848 return (true);
6849
6850 result = dns_rdataset_first(rdataset);
6851 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
6852 dns_rdataset_current(rdataset, &rdata);
6853 switch (rdataset->type) {
6854 case dns_rdatatype_cname:
6855 result = dns_rdata_tostruct(&rdata, &cname, NULL);
6856 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
6857 tname = &cname.cname;
6858 break;
6859 case dns_rdatatype_dname:
6860 if (dns_name_fullcompare(qname, rname, &order, &nlabels) !=
6861 dns_namereln_subdomain)
6862 {
6863 return (true);
6864 }
6865 result = dns_rdata_tostruct(&rdata, &dname, NULL);
6866 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
6867 dns_name_init(&prefix, NULL);
6868 tname = dns_fixedname_initname(&fixed);
6869 nlabels = dns_name_countlabels(rname);
6870 dns_name_split(qname, nlabels, &prefix, NULL);
6871 result = dns_name_concatenate(&prefix, &dname.dname, tname,
6872 NULL);
6873 if (result == DNS_R_NAMETOOLONG) {
6874 if (chainingp != NULL) {
6875 *chainingp = true;
6876 }
6877 return (true);
6878 }
6879 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
6880 break;
6881 default:
6882 INSIST(0);
6883 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
6884 }
6885
6886 if (chainingp != NULL)
6887 *chainingp = true;
6888
6889 if (view->denyanswernames == NULL)
6890 return (true);
6891
6892 /*
6893 * If the owner name matches one in the exclusion list, either exactly
6894 * or partially, allow it.
6895 */
6896 if (view->answernames_exclude != NULL) {
6897 result = dns_rbt_findnode(view->answernames_exclude, qname,
6898 NULL, &node, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL);
6899 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == DNS_R_PARTIALMATCH)
6900 return (true);
6901 }
6902
6903 /*
6904 * If the target name is a subdomain of the search domain, allow it.
6905 */
6906 if (dns_name_issubdomain(tname, &fctx->domain))
6907 return (true);
6908
6909 /*
6910 * Otherwise, apply filters.
6911 */
6912 result = dns_rbt_findnode(view->denyanswernames, tname, NULL, &node,
6913 NULL, 0, NULL, NULL);
6914 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == DNS_R_PARTIALMATCH) {
6915 dns_name_format(qname, qnamebuf, sizeof(qnamebuf));
6916 dns_name_format(tname, tnamebuf, sizeof(tnamebuf));
6917 dns_rdatatype_format(rdataset->type, typebuf, sizeof(typebuf));
6918 dns_rdataclass_format(view->rdclass, classbuf,
6919 sizeof(classbuf));
6920 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
6921 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
6922 "%s target %s denied for %s/%s",
6923 typebuf, tnamebuf, qnamebuf, classbuf);
6924 return (false);
6925 }
6926
6927 return (true);
6928}
6929
6930static void
6931trim_ns_ttl(fetchctx_t *fctx, dns_name_t *name, dns_rdataset_t *rdataset) {
6932 char ns_namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
6933 char namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
6934 char tbuf[DNS_RDATATYPE_FORMATSIZE];
6935
6936 if (fctx->ns_ttl_ok && rdataset->ttl > fctx->ns_ttl) {
6937 dns_name_format(name, ns_namebuf, sizeof(ns_namebuf));
6938 dns_name_format(&fctx->name, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
6939 dns_rdatatype_format(fctx->type, tbuf, sizeof(tbuf));
6940
6941 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
6942 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_DEBUG(10),
6943 "fctx %p: trimming ttl of %s/NS for %s/%s: "
6944 "%u -> %u", fctx, ns_namebuf, namebuf, tbuf,
6945 rdataset->ttl, fctx->ns_ttl);
6946 rdataset->ttl = fctx->ns_ttl;
6947 }
6948}
6949
6950static bool
6951validinanswer(dns_rdataset_t *rdataset, fetchctx_t *fctx) {
6952 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_nsec3) {
6953 /*
6954 * NSEC3 records are not allowed to
6955 * appear in the answer section.
6956 */
6957 log_formerr(fctx, "NSEC3 in answer");
6958 return (false);
6959 }
6960 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_tkey) {
6961 /*
6962 * TKEY is not a valid record in a
6963 * response to any query we can make.
6964 */
6965 log_formerr(fctx, "TKEY in answer");
6966 return (false);
6967 }
6968 if (rdataset->rdclass != fctx->res->rdclass) {
6969 log_formerr(fctx, "Mismatched class in answer");
6970 return (false);
6971 }
6972 return (true);
6973}
6974
6975static void
6976fctx_increference(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
6977 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
6978
6979 LOCK(&fctx->res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
6980 fctx->references++;
6981 UNLOCK(&fctx->res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
6982}
6983
6984static bool
6985fctx_decreference(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
6986 bool bucket_empty = false;
6987
6988 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
6989
6990 INSIST(fctx->references > 0);
6991 fctx->references--;
6992 if (fctx->references == 0) {
6993 /*
6994 * No one cares about the result of this fetch anymore.
6995 */
6996 if (fctx->pending == 0 && fctx->nqueries == 0 &&
6997 ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->validators) && SHUTTINGDOWN(fctx)) {
6998 /*
6999 * This fctx is already shutdown; we were just
7000 * waiting for the last reference to go away.
7001 */
7002 bucket_empty = fctx_unlink(fctx);
7003 fctx_destroy(fctx);
7004 } else {
7005 /*
7006 * Initiate shutdown.
7007 */
7008 fctx_shutdown(fctx);
7009 }
7010 }
7011 return (bucket_empty);
7012}
7013
7014static void
7015resume_dslookup(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
7016 dns_fetchevent_t *fevent;
7017 dns_resolver_t *res;
7018 fetchctx_t *fctx;
7019 isc_result_t result;
7020 bool bucket_empty;
7021 bool locked = false;
7022 unsigned int bucketnum;
7023 dns_rdataset_t nameservers;
7024 dns_fixedname_t fixed;
7025 dns_name_t *domain;
7026
7027 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_FETCHDONE);
7028 fevent = (dns_fetchevent_t *)event;
7029 fctx = event->ev_arg;
7030 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
7031 res = fctx->res;
7032
7033 UNUSED(task);
7034 FCTXTRACE("resume_dslookup");
7035
7036 if (fevent->node != NULL)
7037 dns_db_detachnode(fevent->db, &fevent->node);
7038 if (fevent->db != NULL)
7039 dns_db_detach(&fevent->db);
7040
7041 dns_rdataset_init(&nameservers);
7042
7043 bucketnum = fctx->bucketnum;
7044
7045 /*
7046 * Note: fevent->rdataset must be disassociated and
7047 * isc_event_free(&event) be called before resuming
7048 * processing of the 'fctx' to prevent use-after-free.
7049 * 'fevent' is set to NULL so as to not have a dangling
7050 * pointer.
7051 */
7052 if (fevent->result == ISC_R_CANCELED) {
7053 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(fevent->rdataset)) {
7054 dns_rdataset_disassociate(fevent->rdataset);
7055 }
7056 fevent = NULL;
7057 isc_event_free(&event);
7058
7059 dns_resolver_destroyfetch(&fctx->nsfetch);
7060 fctx_done(fctx, ISC_R_CANCELED, __LINE__);
7061 } else if (fevent->result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
7062 FCTXTRACE("resuming DS lookup");
7063
7064 dns_resolver_destroyfetch(&fctx->nsfetch);
7065 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(&fctx->nameservers)) {
7066 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&fctx->nameservers);
7067 }
7068 dns_rdataset_clone(fevent->rdataset, &fctx->nameservers);
7069 fctx->ns_ttl = fctx->nameservers.ttl;
7070 fctx->ns_ttl_ok = true;
7071 log_ns_ttl(fctx, "resume_dslookup");
7072
7073 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(fevent->rdataset)) {
7074 dns_rdataset_disassociate(fevent->rdataset);
7075 }
7076 fevent = NULL;
7077 isc_event_free(&event);
7078
7079 fcount_decr(fctx);
7080 dns_name_free(&fctx->domain, fctx->mctx);
7081 dns_name_init(&fctx->domain, NULL);
7082 result = dns_name_dup(&fctx->nsname, fctx->mctx, &fctx->domain);
7083 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
7084 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
7085 goto cleanup;
7086 }
7087 result = fcount_incr(fctx, true);
7088 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
7089 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
7090 goto cleanup;
7091 }
7092 /*
7093 * Try again.
7094 */
7095 fctx_try(fctx, true, false);
7096 } else {
7097 unsigned int n;
7098 dns_rdataset_t *nsrdataset = NULL;
7099
7100 /*
7101 * Retrieve state from fctx->nsfetch before we destroy it.
7102 */
7103 domain = dns_fixedname_initname(&fixed);
7104 dns_name_copy(&fctx->nsfetch->private->domain, domain, NULL);
7105 if (dns_name_equal(&fctx->nsname, domain)) {
7106 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(fevent->rdataset)) {
7107 dns_rdataset_disassociate(fevent->rdataset);
7108 }
7109 fevent = NULL;
7110 isc_event_free(&event);
7111
7112 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
7113 dns_resolver_destroyfetch(&fctx->nsfetch);
7114 goto cleanup;
7115 }
7116 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(
7117 &fctx->nsfetch->private->nameservers)) {
7118 dns_rdataset_clone(
7119 &fctx->nsfetch->private->nameservers,
7120 &nameservers);
7121 nsrdataset = &nameservers;
7122 } else
7123 domain = NULL;
7124 dns_resolver_destroyfetch(&fctx->nsfetch);
7125 n = dns_name_countlabels(&fctx->nsname);
7126 dns_name_getlabelsequence(&fctx->nsname, 1, n - 1,
7127 &fctx->nsname);
7128
7129 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(fevent->rdataset))
7130 dns_rdataset_disassociate(fevent->rdataset);
7131 fevent = NULL;
7132 isc_event_free(&event);
7133
7134 FCTXTRACE("continuing to look for parent's NS records");
7135
7136 result = dns_resolver_createfetch(fctx->res, &fctx->nsname,
7137 dns_rdatatype_ns, domain,
7138 nsrdataset, NULL, NULL, 0,
7139 fctx->options, 0, NULL, task,
7140 resume_dslookup, fctx,
7141 &fctx->nsrrset, NULL,
7142 &fctx->nsfetch);
7143 /*
7144 * fevent->rdataset (a.k.a. fctx->nsrrset) must not be
7145 * accessed below this point to prevent races with
7146 * another thread concurrently processing the fetch.
7147 */
7148 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
7149 if (result == DNS_R_DUPLICATE) {
7150 result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL;
7151 }
7152 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
7153 } else {
7154 LOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
7155 locked = true;
7156 fctx->references++;
7157 }
7158 }
7159
7160 cleanup:
7161 INSIST(event == NULL);
7162 INSIST(fevent == NULL);
7163 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(&nameservers))
7164 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&nameservers);
7165 if (!locked)
7166 LOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
7167 bucket_empty = fctx_decreference(fctx);
7168 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
7169 if (bucket_empty)
7170 empty_bucket(res);
7171}
7172
7173static inline void
7174checknamessection(dns_message_t *message, dns_section_t section) {
7175 isc_result_t result;
7176 dns_name_t *name;
7177 dns_rdata_t rdata = DNS_RDATA_INIT;
7178 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
7179
7180 for (result = dns_message_firstname(message, section);
7181 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS;
7182 result = dns_message_nextname(message, section))
7183 {
7184 name = NULL;
7185 dns_message_currentname(message, section, &name);
7186 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
7187 rdataset != NULL;
7188 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link)) {
7189 for (result = dns_rdataset_first(rdataset);
7190 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS;
7191 result = dns_rdataset_next(rdataset)) {
7192 dns_rdataset_current(rdataset, &rdata);
7193 if (!dns_rdata_checkowner(name, rdata.rdclass,
7194 rdata.type,
7195 false) ||
7196 !dns_rdata_checknames(&rdata, name, NULL))
7197 {
7198 rdataset->attributes |=
7199 DNS_RDATASETATTR_CHECKNAMES;
7200 }
7201 dns_rdata_reset(&rdata);
7202 }
7203 }
7204 }
7205}
7206
7207static void
7208checknames(dns_message_t *message) {
7209 checknamessection(message, DNS_SECTION_ANSWER);
7210 checknamessection(message, DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY);
7211 checknamessection(message, DNS_SECTION_ADDITIONAL);
7212}
7213
7214/*
7215 * Log server NSID at log level 'level'
7216 */
7217static void
7218log_nsid(isc_buffer_t *opt, size_t nsid_len, resquery_t *query,
7219 int level, isc_mem_t *mctx)
7220{
7221 static const char hex[17] = "0123456789abcdef";
7222 char addrbuf[ISC_SOCKADDR_FORMATSIZE];
7223 uint16_t buflen, i;
7224 unsigned char *p, *nsid;
7225 unsigned char *buf = NULL, *pbuf = NULL;
7226
7227 /* Allocate buffer for storing hex version of the NSID */
7228 buflen = (uint16_t)nsid_len * 2 + 1;
7229 buf = isc_mem_get(mctx, buflen);
7230 if (buf == NULL)
7231 goto cleanup;
7232 pbuf = isc_mem_get(mctx, nsid_len + 1);
7233 if (pbuf == NULL)
7234 goto cleanup;
7235
7236 /* Convert to hex */
7237 p = buf;
7238 nsid = isc_buffer_current(opt);
7239 for (i = 0; i < nsid_len; i++) {
7240 *p++ = hex[(nsid[i] >> 4) & 0xf];
7241 *p++ = hex[nsid[i] & 0xf];
7242 }
7243 *p = '\0';
7244
7245 /* Make printable version */
7246 p = pbuf;
7247 for (i = 0; i < nsid_len; i++) {
7248 if (isprint(nsid[i]))
7249 *p++ = nsid[i];
7250 else
7251 *p++ = '.';
7252 }
7253 *p = '\0';
7254
7255 isc_sockaddr_format(&query->addrinfo->sockaddr, addrbuf,
7256 sizeof(addrbuf));
7257 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_NSID,
7258 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, level,
7259 "received NSID %s (\"%s\") from %s", buf, pbuf, addrbuf);
7260 cleanup:
7261 if (pbuf != NULL)
7262 isc_mem_put(mctx, pbuf, nsid_len + 1);
7263 if (buf != NULL)
7264 isc_mem_put(mctx, buf, buflen);
7265}
7266
7267static bool
7268iscname(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
7269 isc_result_t result;
7270
7271 result = dns_message_findname(fctx->rmessage, DNS_SECTION_ANSWER,
7272 &fctx->name, dns_rdatatype_cname, 0,
7273 NULL, NULL);
7274 return (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS ? true : false);
7275}
7276
7277static bool
7278betterreferral(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
7279 isc_result_t result;
7280 dns_name_t *name;
7281 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
7282 dns_message_t *message = fctx->rmessage;
7283
7284 for (result = dns_message_firstname(message, DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY);
7285 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS;
7286 result = dns_message_nextname(message, DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY)) {
7287 name = NULL;
7288 dns_message_currentname(message, DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY, &name);
7289 if (!isstrictsubdomain(name, &fctx->domain))
7290 continue;
7291 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
7292 rdataset != NULL;
7293 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link))
7294 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_ns)
7295 return (true);
7296 }
7297 return (false);
7298}
7299
7300/*
7301 * resquery_response():
7302 * Handles responses received in response to iterative queries sent by
7303 * resquery_send(). Sets up a response context (respctx_t).
7304 */
7305static void
7306resquery_response(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
7307 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
7308 resquery_t *query = event->ev_arg;
7309 dns_dispatchevent_t *devent = (dns_dispatchevent_t *)event;
7310 fetchctx_t *fctx;
7311 respctx_t rctx;
7312
7313 REQUIRE(VALID_QUERY(query));
7314 fctx = query->fctx;
7315 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
7316 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_DISPATCH);
7317
7318 QTRACE("response");
7319
7320 if (isc_sockaddr_pf(&query->addrinfo->sockaddr) == PF_INET)
7321 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_responsev4);
7322 else
7323 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_responsev6);
7324
7325 (void)isc_timer_touch(fctx->timer);
7326
7327 rctx_respinit(task, devent, query, fctx, &rctx);
7328
7329 if (fctx->res->exiting) {
7330 result = ISC_R_SHUTTINGDOWN;
7331 FCTXTRACE("resolver shutting down");
7332 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7333 return;
7334 }
7335
7336 fctx->timeouts = 0;
7337 fctx->timeout = false;
7338 fctx->addrinfo = query->addrinfo;
7339
7340 /*
7341 * Check whether the dispatcher has failed; if so we're done
7342 */
7343 result = rctx_dispfail(&rctx);
7344 if (result == ISC_R_COMPLETE) {
7345 return;
7346 }
7347
7348 if (query->tsig != NULL) {
7349 result = dns_message_setquerytsig(fctx->rmessage, query->tsig);
7350 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
7351 FCTXTRACE3("unable to set query tsig", result);
7352 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7353 return;
7354 }
7355 }
7356
7357 if (query->tsigkey) {
7358 result = dns_message_settsigkey(fctx->rmessage, query->tsigkey);
7359 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
7360 FCTXTRACE3("unable to set tsig key", result);
7361 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7362 return;
7363 }
7364 }
7365
7366 dns_message_setclass(fctx->rmessage, fctx->res->rdclass);
7367
7368 if ((rctx.retryopts & DNS_FETCHOPT_TCP) == 0) {
7369 if ((rctx.retryopts & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0) == 0) {
7370 dns_adb_setudpsize(fctx->adb, query->addrinfo,
7371 isc_buffer_usedlength(&devent->buffer));
7372 } else {
7373 dns_adb_plainresponse(fctx->adb, query->addrinfo);
7374 }
7375 }
7376
7377 /*
7378 * Parse response message.
7379 */
7380 result = rctx_parse(&rctx);
7381 if (result == ISC_R_COMPLETE) {
7382 return;
7383 }
7384
7385 /*
7386 * Log the incoming packet.
7387 */
7388 rctx_logpacket(&rctx);
7389
7390 if (fctx->rmessage->rdclass != fctx->res->rdclass) {
7391 rctx.resend = true;
7392 FCTXTRACE("bad class");
7393 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7394 return;
7395 }
7396
7397 /*
7398 * Process receive opt record.
7399 */
7400 rctx.opt = dns_message_getopt(fctx->rmessage);
7401 if (rctx.opt != NULL) {
7402 rctx_opt(&rctx);
7403 }
7404
7405 if (fctx->rmessage->cc_bad && (rctx.retryopts & DNS_FETCHOPT_TCP) == 0)
7406 {
7407 /*
7408 * If the COOKIE is bad, assume it is an attack and
7409 * keep listening for a good answer.
7410 */
7411 rctx.nextitem = true;
7412 if (isc_log_wouldlog(dns_lctx, ISC_LOG_INFO)) {
7413 char addrbuf[ISC_SOCKADDR_FORMATSIZE];
7414 isc_sockaddr_format(&query->addrinfo->sockaddr,
7415 addrbuf, sizeof(addrbuf));
7416 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
7417 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_INFO,
7418 "bad cookie from %s", addrbuf);
7419 }
7420 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7421 return;
7422 }
7423
7424 /*
7425 * Is the question the same as the one we asked?
7426 * NOERROR/NXDOMAIN/YXDOMAIN/REFUSED/SERVFAIL/BADCOOKIE must have
7427 * the same question.
7428 * FORMERR/NOTIMP if they have a question section then it must match.
7429 */
7430 switch (fctx->rmessage->rcode) {
7431 case dns_rcode_notimp:
7432 case dns_rcode_formerr:
7433 if (fctx->rmessage->counts[DNS_SECTION_QUESTION] == 0)
7434 break;
7435 /* FALLTHROUGH */
7436 case dns_rcode_nxrrset: /* Not expected. */
7437 case dns_rcode_badcookie:
7438 case dns_rcode_noerror:
7439 case dns_rcode_nxdomain:
7440 case dns_rcode_yxdomain:
7441 case dns_rcode_refused:
7442 case dns_rcode_servfail:
7443 default:
7444 result = same_question(fctx);
7445 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
7446 FCTXTRACE3("response did not match question", result);
7447 rctx.nextitem = true;
7448 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7449 return;
7450 }
7451 break;
7452 }
7453
7454 /*
7455 * If the message is signed, check the signature. If not, this
7456 * returns success anyway.
7457 */
7458 result = dns_message_checksig(fctx->rmessage, fctx->res->view);
7459 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
7460 FCTXTRACE3("signature check failed", result);
7461 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7462 return;
7463 }
7464
7465 /*
7466 * The dispatcher should ensure we only get responses with QR set.
7467 */
7468 INSIST((fctx->rmessage->flags & DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_QR) != 0);
7469 /*
7470 * INSIST() that the message comes from the place we sent it to,
7471 * since the dispatch code should ensure this.
7472 *
7473 * INSIST() that the message id is correct (this should also be
7474 * ensured by the dispatch code).
7475 */
7476
7477 rctx_edns(&rctx);
7478
7479 /*
7480 * Deal with truncated responses by retrying using TCP.
7481 */
7482 if ((fctx->rmessage->flags & DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_TC) != 0) {
7483 rctx.truncated = true;
7484 }
7485
7486 if (rctx.truncated) {
7487 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_truncated);
7488 if ((rctx.retryopts & DNS_FETCHOPT_TCP) != 0) {
7489 rctx.broken_server = DNS_R_TRUNCATEDTCP;
7490 rctx.next_server = true;
7491 } else {
7492 rctx.retryopts |= DNS_FETCHOPT_TCP;
7493 rctx.resend = true;
7494 }
7495 FCTXTRACE3("message truncated", result);
7496 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7497 return;
7498 }
7499
7500 /*
7501 * Is it a query response?
7502 */
7503 if (fctx->rmessage->opcode != dns_opcode_query) {
7504 rctx.broken_server = DNS_R_UNEXPECTEDOPCODE;
7505 rctx.next_server = true;
7506 FCTXTRACE("invalid message opcode");
7507 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7508 return;
7509 }
7510
7511 /*
7512 * Update statistics about erroneous responses.
7513 */
7514 switch (fctx->rmessage->rcode) {
7515 case dns_rcode_noerror:
7516 /* no error */
7517 break;
7518 case dns_rcode_nxdomain:
7519 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_nxdomain);
7520 break;
7521 case dns_rcode_servfail:
7522 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_servfail);
7523 break;
7524 case dns_rcode_formerr:
7525 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_formerr);
7526 break;
7527 case dns_rcode_refused:
7528 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_refused);
7529 break;
7530 case dns_rcode_badvers:
7531 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_badvers);
7532 break;
7533 case dns_rcode_badcookie:
7534 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_badcookie);
7535 break;
7536 default:
7537 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_othererror);
7538 break;
7539 }
7540
7541 /*
7542 * Bad server?
7543 */
7544 result = rctx_badserver(&rctx, result);
7545 if (result == ISC_R_COMPLETE) {
7546 return;
7547 }
7548
7549 /*
7550 * Lame server?
7551 */
7552 result = rctx_lameserver(&rctx);
7553 if (result == ISC_R_COMPLETE) {
7554 return;
7555 }
7556
7557 /*
7558 * Handle delegation-only zones like NET or COM.
7559 */
7560 rctx_delonly_zone(&rctx);
7561
7562 /*
7563 * Optionally call dns_rdata_checkowner() and dns_rdata_checknames()
7564 * to validate the names in the response message.
7565 */
7566 if ((fctx->res->options & DNS_RESOLVER_CHECKNAMES) != 0) {
7567 checknames(fctx->rmessage);
7568 }
7569
7570 /*
7571 * Clear cache bits.
7572 */
7573 fctx->attributes &= ~(FCTX_ATTR_WANTNCACHE | FCTX_ATTR_WANTCACHE);
7574
7575 /*
7576 * Did we get any answers?
7577 */
7578 if (fctx->rmessage->counts[DNS_SECTION_ANSWER] > 0 &&
7579 (fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_noerror ||
7580 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_yxdomain ||
7581 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_nxdomain))
7582 {
7583 result = rctx_answer(&rctx);
7584 if (result == ISC_R_COMPLETE) {
7585 return;
7586 }
7587 } else if (fctx->rmessage->counts[DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY] > 0 ||
7588 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_noerror ||
7589 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_nxdomain)
7590 {
7591 /*
7592 * This might be an NXDOMAIN, NXRRSET, or referral.
7593 * Call rctx_answer_none() to determine which it is.
7594 */
7595 result = rctx_answer_none(&rctx);
7596 switch (result) {
7597 case ISC_R_SUCCESS:
7598 case DNS_R_CHASEDSSERVERS:
7599 break;
7600 case DNS_R_DELEGATION:
7601 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
7602 break;
7603 default:
7604 /*
7605 * Something has gone wrong.
7606 */
7607 if (result == DNS_R_FORMERR)
7608 rctx.next_server = true;
7609 FCTXTRACE3("rctx_answer_none", result);
7610 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7611 return;
7612 }
7613 } else {
7614 /*
7615 * The server is insane.
7616 */
7617 /* XXXRTH Log */
7618 rctx.broken_server = DNS_R_UNEXPECTEDRCODE;
7619 rctx.next_server = true;
7620 FCTXTRACE("broken server: unexpected rcode");
7621 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7622 return;
7623 }
7624
7625 /*
7626 * Follow additional section data chains.
7627 */
7628 rctx_additional(&rctx);
7629
7630 /*
7631 * Cache the cacheable parts of the message. This may also cause
7632 * work to be queued to the DNSSEC validator.
7633 */
7634 if (WANTCACHE(fctx)) {
7635 result = cache_message(fctx, query->addrinfo, rctx.now);
7636 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
7637 FCTXTRACE3("cache_message complete", result);
7638 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7639 return;
7640 }
7641 }
7642
7643 /*
7644 * Negative caching
7645 */
7646 rctx_ncache(&rctx);
7647
7648 rctx_done(&rctx, result);
7649}
7650
7651/*
7652 * rctx_respinit():
7653 * Initialize the response context structure 'rctx' to all zeroes, then set
7654 * the task, event, query and fctx information from resquery_response().
7655 */
7656static void
7657rctx_respinit(isc_task_t *task, dns_dispatchevent_t *devent,
7658 resquery_t *query, fetchctx_t *fctx, respctx_t *rctx)
7659{
7660 memset(rctx, 0, sizeof(*rctx));
7661
7662 rctx->task = task;
7663 rctx->devent = devent;
7664 rctx->query = query;
7665 rctx->fctx = fctx;
7666 rctx->broken_type = badns_response;
7667 rctx->retryopts = query->options;
7668
7669 /*
7670 * XXXRTH We should really get the current time just once. We
7671 * need a routine to convert from an isc_time_t to an
7672 * isc_stdtime_t.
7673 */
7674 TIME_NOW(&rctx->tnow);
7675 rctx->finish = &rctx->tnow;
7676 isc_stdtime_get(&rctx->now);
7677}
7678
7679/*
7680 * rctx_answer_init():
7681 * Clear and reinitialize those portions of 'rctx' that will be needed
7682 * when scanning the answer section of the response message. This can be
7683 * called more than once if scanning needs to be restarted (though currently
7684 * there are no cases in which this occurs).
7685 */
7686static void
7687rctx_answer_init(respctx_t *rctx) {
7688 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
7689
7690 rctx->aa = ((fctx->rmessage->flags & DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_AA) != 0);
7691 if (rctx->aa) {
7692 rctx->trust = dns_trust_authanswer;
7693 } else {
7694 rctx->trust = dns_trust_answer;
7695 }
7696
7697 /*
7698 * There can be multiple RRSIG and SIG records at a name so
7699 * we treat these types as a subset of ANY.
7700 */
7701 rctx->type = fctx->type;
7702 if (rctx->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig ||
7703 rctx->type == dns_rdatatype_sig)
7704 {
7705 rctx->type = dns_rdatatype_any;
7706 }
7707
7708 /*
7709 * Bigger than any valid DNAME label count.
7710 */
7711 rctx->dname_labels = dns_name_countlabels(&fctx->name);
7712 rctx->domain_labels = dns_name_countlabels(&fctx->domain);
7713
7714 rctx->found_type = dns_rdatatype_none;
7715
7716 rctx->aname = NULL;
7717 rctx->ardataset = NULL;
7718
7719 rctx->cname = NULL;
7720 rctx->crdataset = NULL;
7721
7722 rctx->dname = NULL;
7723 rctx->drdataset = NULL;
7724
7725 rctx->ns_name = NULL;
7726 rctx->ns_rdataset = NULL;
7727
7728 rctx->soa_name = NULL;
7729 rctx->ds_name = NULL;
7730 rctx->found_name = NULL;
7731}
7732
7733/*
7734 * rctx_dispfail():
7735 * Handle the case where the dispatcher failed
7736 */
7737static isc_result_t
7738rctx_dispfail(respctx_t *rctx) {
7739 dns_dispatchevent_t *devent = rctx->devent;
7740 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
7741 resquery_t *query = rctx->query;
7742
7743 if (devent->result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
7744 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
7745 }
7746
7747 if (devent->result == ISC_R_EOF &&
7748 (rctx->retryopts & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0) == 0) {
7749 /*
7750 * The problem might be that they don't understand EDNS0.
7751 * Turn it off and try again.
7752 */
7753 rctx->retryopts |= DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0;
7754 rctx->resend = true;
7755 add_bad_edns(fctx, &query->addrinfo->sockaddr);
7756 } else {
7757 /*
7758 * There's no hope for this response.
7759 */
7760 rctx->next_server = true;
7761
7762 /*
7763 * If this is a network error on an exclusive query
7764 * socket, mark the server as bad so that we won't try
7765 * it for this fetch again. Also adjust finish and
7766 * no_response so that we penalize this address in SRTT
7767 * adjustment later.
7768 */
7769 if (query->exclusivesocket &&
7770 (devent->result == ISC_R_HOSTUNREACH ||
7771 devent->result == ISC_R_NETUNREACH ||
7772 devent->result == ISC_R_CONNREFUSED ||
7773 devent->result == ISC_R_CANCELED))
7774 {
7775 rctx->broken_server = devent->result;
7776 rctx->broken_type = badns_unreachable;
7777 rctx->finish = NULL;
7778 rctx->no_response = true;
7779 }
7780 }
7781 FCTXTRACE3("dispatcher failure", devent->result);
7782 rctx_done(rctx, ISC_R_SUCCESS);
7783 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
7784}
7785
7786/*
7787 * rctx_parse():
7788 * Parse the response message.
7789 */
7790static isc_result_t
7791rctx_parse(respctx_t *rctx) {
7792 isc_result_t result;
7793 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
7794 resquery_t *query = rctx->query;
7795
7796 result = dns_message_parse(fctx->rmessage, &rctx->devent->buffer, 0);
7797 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
7798 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
7799 }
7800
7801 FCTXTRACE3("message failed to parse", result);
7802
7803 switch (result) {
7804 case ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDEND:
7805 if (fctx->rmessage->question_ok &&
7806 (fctx->rmessage->flags & DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_TC) != 0 &&
7807 (rctx->retryopts & DNS_FETCHOPT_TCP) == 0)
7808 {
7809 /*
7810 * We defer retrying via TCP for a bit so we can
7811 * check out this message further.
7812 */
7813 rctx->truncated = true;
7814 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
7815 }
7816
7817 /*
7818 * Either the message ended prematurely,
7819 * and/or wasn't marked as being truncated,
7820 * and/or this is a response to a query we
7821 * sent over TCP. In all of these cases,
7822 * something is wrong with the remote
7823 * server and we don't want to retry using
7824 * TCP.
7825 */
7826 if ((rctx->retryopts & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0) == 0) {
7827 /*
7828 * The problem might be that they
7829 * don't understand EDNS0. Turn it
7830 * off and try again.
7831 */
7832 rctx->retryopts |= DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0;
7833 rctx->resend = true;
7834 add_bad_edns(fctx, &query->addrinfo->sockaddr);
7835 inc_stats(fctx->res,
7836 dns_resstatscounter_edns0fail);
7837 } else {
7838 rctx->broken_server = result;
7839 rctx->next_server = true;
7840 }
7841
7842 rctx_done(rctx, result);
7843 break;
7844 case DNS_R_FORMERR:
7845 if ((rctx->retryopts & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0) == 0) {
7846 /*
7847 * The problem might be that they
7848 * don't understand EDNS0. Turn it
7849 * off and try again.
7850 */
7851 rctx->retryopts |= DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0;
7852 rctx->resend = true;
7853 add_bad_edns(fctx, &query->addrinfo->sockaddr);
7854 inc_stats(fctx->res,
7855 dns_resstatscounter_edns0fail);
7856 } else {
7857 rctx->broken_server = DNS_R_UNEXPECTEDRCODE;
7858 rctx->next_server = true;
7859 }
7860
7861 rctx_done(rctx, result);
7862 break;
7863 default:
7864 /*
7865 * Something bad has happened.
7866 */
7867 rctx_done(rctx, result);
7868 break;
7869 }
7870
7871 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
7872}
7873
7874/*
7875 * rctx_opt():
7876 * Process the OPT record in the response.
7877 */
7878static void
7879rctx_opt(respctx_t *rctx) {
7880 resquery_t *query = rctx->query;
7881 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
7882 dns_rdata_t rdata;
7883 isc_buffer_t optbuf;
7884 isc_result_t result;
7885 uint16_t optcode;
7886 uint16_t optlen;
7887 unsigned char *optvalue;
7888 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo;
7889 unsigned char cookie[8];
7890 bool seen_cookie = false;
7891 bool seen_nsid = false;
7892
7893 result = dns_rdataset_first(rctx->opt);
7894 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
7895 dns_rdata_init(&rdata);
7896 dns_rdataset_current(rctx->opt, &rdata);
7897 isc_buffer_init(&optbuf, rdata.data, rdata.length);
7898 isc_buffer_add(&optbuf, rdata.length);
7899 while (isc_buffer_remaininglength(&optbuf) >= 4) {
7900 optcode = isc_buffer_getuint16(&optbuf);
7901 optlen = isc_buffer_getuint16(&optbuf);
7902 INSIST(optlen <= isc_buffer_remaininglength(&optbuf));
7903 switch (optcode) {
7904 case DNS_OPT_NSID:
7905 if (!seen_nsid &&
7906 (query->options &
7907 DNS_FETCHOPT_WANTNSID) != 0)
7908 {
7909 log_nsid(&optbuf, optlen, query,
7910 ISC_LOG_INFO,
7911 fctx->res->mctx);
7912 }
7913 isc_buffer_forward(&optbuf, optlen);
7914 seen_nsid = true;
7915 break;
7916 case DNS_OPT_COOKIE:
7917 /*
7918 * Only process the first cookie option.
7919 */
7920 if (seen_cookie) {
7921 isc_buffer_forward(&optbuf, optlen);
7922 break;
7923 }
7924 optvalue = isc_buffer_current(&optbuf);
7925 compute_cc(query, cookie, sizeof(cookie));
7926 INSIST(fctx->rmessage->cc_bad == 0 &&
7927 fctx->rmessage->cc_ok == 0);
7928 if (optlen >= 8U &&
7929 memcmp(cookie, optvalue, 8) == 0) {
7930 fctx->rmessage->cc_ok = 1;
7931 inc_stats(fctx->res,
7932 dns_resstatscounter_cookieok);
7933 addrinfo = query->addrinfo;
7934 dns_adb_setcookie(fctx->adb,
7935 addrinfo, optvalue,
7936 optlen);
7937 } else
7938 fctx->rmessage->cc_bad = 1;
7939 isc_buffer_forward(&optbuf, optlen);
7940 inc_stats(fctx->res,
7941 dns_resstatscounter_cookiein);
7942 seen_cookie = true;
7943 break;
7944 default:
7945 isc_buffer_forward(&optbuf, optlen);
7946 break;
7947 }
7948 }
7949 INSIST(isc_buffer_remaininglength(&optbuf) == 0U);
7950 }
7951}
7952
7953/*
7954 * rctx_edns():
7955 * Determine whether the remote server is using EDNS correctly or
7956 * incorrectly and record that information if needed.
7957 */
7958static void
7959rctx_edns(respctx_t *rctx) {
7960 resquery_t *query = rctx->query;
7961 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
7962
7963 /*
7964 * We have an affirmative response to the query and we have
7965 * previously got a response from this server which indicated
7966 * EDNS may not be supported so we can now cache the lack of
7967 * EDNS support.
7968 */
7969 if (rctx->opt == NULL && !EDNSOK(query->addrinfo) &&
7970 (fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_noerror ||
7971 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_nxdomain ||
7972 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_refused ||
7973 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_yxdomain) &&
7974 bad_edns(fctx, &query->addrinfo->sockaddr))
7975 {
7976 dns_message_logpacket(fctx->rmessage,
7977 "received packet (bad edns) from",
7978 &query->addrinfo->sockaddr,
7979 DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
7980 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER,
7981 ISC_LOG_DEBUG(3),
7982 fctx->res->mctx);
7983 dns_adb_changeflags(fctx->adb, query->addrinfo,
7984 DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0,
7985 DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0);
7986 } else if (rctx->opt == NULL &&
7987 (fctx->rmessage->flags & DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_TC) == 0 &&
7988 !EDNSOK(query->addrinfo) &&
7989 (fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_noerror ||
7990 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_nxdomain) &&
7991 (rctx->retryopts & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0) == 0)
7992 {
7993 /*
7994 * We didn't get a OPT record in response to a EDNS query.
7995 *
7996 * Old versions of named incorrectly drop the OPT record
7997 * when there is a signed, truncated response so we check
7998 * that TC is not set.
7999 *
8000 * Record that the server is not talking EDNS. While this
8001 * should be safe to do for any rcode we limit it to NOERROR
8002 * and NXDOMAIN.
8003 */
8004 dns_message_logpacket(fctx->rmessage,
8005 "received packet (no opt) from",
8006 &query->addrinfo->sockaddr,
8007 DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
8008 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER,
8009 ISC_LOG_DEBUG(3), fctx->res->mctx);
8010 dns_adb_changeflags(fctx->adb, query->addrinfo,
8011 DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0,
8012 DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0);
8013 }
8014
8015 /*
8016 * If we get a non error EDNS response record the fact so we
8017 * won't fallback to plain DNS in the future for this server.
8018 */
8019 if (rctx->opt != NULL && !EDNSOK(query->addrinfo) &&
8020 (rctx->retryopts & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0) == 0 &&
8021 (fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_noerror ||
8022 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_nxdomain ||
8023 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_refused ||
8024 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_yxdomain))
8025 {
8026 dns_adb_changeflags(fctx->adb, query->addrinfo,
8027 FCTX_ADDRINFO_EDNSOK,
8028 FCTX_ADDRINFO_EDNSOK);
8029 }
8030}
8031
8032/*
8033 * rctx_answer():
8034 * We might have answers, or we might have a malformed delegation with
8035 * records in the answer section. Call rctx_answer_positive() or
8036 * rctx_answer_none() as appropriate.
8037 */
8038static isc_result_t
8039rctx_answer(respctx_t *rctx) {
8040 isc_result_t result;
8041 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
8042 resquery_t *query = rctx->query;
8043
8044 if ((fctx->rmessage->flags & DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_AA) != 0 ||
8045 ISFORWARDER(query->addrinfo))
8046 {
8047 result = rctx_answer_positive(rctx);
8048 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
8049 FCTXTRACE3("rctx_answer_positive (AA/fwd)", result);
8050 }
8051 } else if (iscname(fctx) &&
8052 fctx->type != dns_rdatatype_any &&
8053 fctx->type != dns_rdatatype_cname)
8054 {
8055 /*
8056 * A BIND8 server could return a non-authoritative
8057 * answer when a CNAME is followed. We should treat
8058 * it as a valid answer.
8059 */
8060 result = rctx_answer_positive(rctx);
8061 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
8062 FCTXTRACE3("rctx_answer_positive (!ANY/!CNAME)",
8063 result);
8064 }
8065 } else if (fctx->type != dns_rdatatype_ns && !betterreferral(fctx)) {
8066 result = rctx_answer_positive(rctx);
8067 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
8068 FCTXTRACE3("rctx_answer_positive (!NS)", result);
8069 }
8070 } else {
8071 /*
8072 * This may be a delegation. First let's check for
8073 */
8074
8075 if (fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_ns) {
8076 /*
8077 * A BIND 8 server could incorrectly return a
8078 * non-authoritative answer to an NS query
8079 * instead of a referral. Since this answer
8080 * lacks the SIGs necessary to do DNSSEC
8081 * validation, we must invoke the following
8082 * special kludge to treat it as a referral.
8083 */
8084 rctx->ns_in_answer = true;
8085 result = rctx_answer_none(rctx);
8086 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
8087 FCTXTRACE3("rctx_answer_none (NS)", result);
8088 }
8089 } else {
8090 /*
8091 * Some other servers may still somehow include
8092 * an answer when it should return a referral
8093 * with an empty answer. Check to see if we can
8094 * treat this as a referral by ignoring the
8095 * answer. Further more, there may be an
8096 * implementation that moves A/AAAA glue records
8097 * to the answer section for that type of
8098 * delegation when the query is for that glue
8099 * record. glue_in_answer will handle
8100 * such a corner case.
8101 */
8102 rctx->glue_in_answer = true;
8103 result = rctx_answer_none(rctx);
8104 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
8105 FCTXTRACE3("rctx_answer_none", result);
8106 }
8107 }
8108
8109 if (result == DNS_R_DELEGATION) {
8110 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
8111 } else {
8112 /*
8113 * At this point, AA is not set, the response
8114 * is not a referral, and the server is not a
8115 * forwarder. It is technically lame and it's
8116 * easier to treat it as such than to figure out
8117 * some more elaborate course of action.
8118 */
8119 rctx->broken_server = DNS_R_LAME;
8120 rctx->next_server = true;
8121 rctx_done(rctx, result);
8122 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8123 }
8124 }
8125
8126 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
8127 if (result == DNS_R_FORMERR) {
8128 rctx->next_server = true;
8129 }
8130 rctx_done(rctx, result);
8131 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8132 }
8133
8134 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
8135}
8136
8137/*
8138 * rctx_answer_positive():
8139 * Handles positive responses. Depending which type of answer this is
8140 * (matching QNAME/QTYPE, CNAME, DNAME, ANY) calls the proper routine
8141 * to handle it (rctx_answer_match(), rctx_answer_cname(),
8142 * rctx_answer_dname(), rctx_answer_any()).
8143 */
8144static isc_result_t
8145rctx_answer_positive(respctx_t *rctx) {
8146 isc_result_t result;
8147 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
8148
8149 FCTXTRACE("rctx_answer");
8150
8151 rctx_answer_init(rctx);
8152 rctx_answer_scan(rctx);
8153
8154 /*
8155 * Determine which type of positive answer this is:
8156 * type ANY, CNAME, DNAME, or an answer matching QNAME/QTYPE.
8157 * Call the appropriate routine to handle the answer type.
8158 */
8159 if (rctx->aname != NULL && rctx->type == dns_rdatatype_any) {
8160 result = rctx_answer_any(rctx);
8161 if (result == ISC_R_COMPLETE) {
8162 return (rctx->result);
8163 }
8164 } else if (rctx->aname != NULL) {
8165 result = rctx_answer_match(rctx);
8166 if (result == ISC_R_COMPLETE) {
8167 return (rctx->result);
8168 }
8169 } else if (rctx->cname != NULL) {
8170 result = rctx_answer_cname(rctx);
8171 if (result == ISC_R_COMPLETE) {
8172 return (rctx->result);
8173 }
8174 } else if (rctx->dname != NULL) {
8175 result = rctx_answer_dname(rctx);
8176 if (result == ISC_R_COMPLETE) {
8177 return (rctx->result);
8178 }
8179 } else {
8180 log_formerr(fctx, "reply has no answer");
8181 return (DNS_R_FORMERR);
8182 }
8183
8184 /*
8185 * This response is now potentially cacheable.
8186 */
8187 fctx->attributes |= FCTX_ATTR_WANTCACHE;
8188
8189 /*
8190 * Did chaining end before we got the final answer?
8191 */
8192 if (rctx->chaining) {
8193 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
8194 }
8195
8196 /*
8197 * We didn't end with an incomplete chain, so the rcode should be
8198 * "no error".
8199 */
8200 if (fctx->rmessage->rcode != dns_rcode_noerror) {
8201 log_formerr(fctx, "CNAME/DNAME chain complete, but RCODE "
8202 "indicates error");
8203 return (DNS_R_FORMERR);
8204 }
8205
8206 /*
8207 * Cache records in the authority section, if
8208 * there are any suitable for caching.
8209 */
8210 rctx_authority_positive(rctx);
8211
8212 log_ns_ttl(fctx, "rctx_answer");
8213
8214 if (rctx->ns_rdataset != NULL &&
8215 dns_name_equal(&fctx->domain, rctx->ns_name) &&
8216 !dns_name_equal(rctx->ns_name, dns_rootname))
8217 {
8218 trim_ns_ttl(fctx, rctx->ns_name, rctx->ns_rdataset);
8219 }
8220
8221 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
8222}
8223
8224/*
8225 * rctx_answer_scan():
8226 * Perform a single pass over the answer section of a response, looking
8227 * for an answer that matches QNAME/QTYPE, or a CNAME matching QNAME, or a
8228 * covering DNAME. If more than one rdataset is found matching these
8229 * criteria, then only one is kept. Order of preference is 1) the
8230 * shortest DNAME, 2) the first matching answer, or 3) the first CNAME.
8231 */
8232static void
8233rctx_answer_scan(respctx_t *rctx) {
8234 isc_result_t result;
8235 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
8236 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset = NULL;
8237
8238 for (result = dns_message_firstname(fctx->rmessage, DNS_SECTION_ANSWER);
8239 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS;
8240 result = dns_message_nextname(fctx->rmessage, DNS_SECTION_ANSWER))
8241 {
8242 int order;
8243 unsigned int nlabels;
8244 dns_namereln_t namereln;
8245 dns_name_t *name = NULL;
8246
8247 dns_message_currentname(fctx->rmessage, DNS_SECTION_ANSWER,
8248 &name);
8249 namereln = dns_name_fullcompare(&fctx->name, name, &order,
8250 &nlabels);
8251 switch (namereln) {
8252 case dns_namereln_equal:
8253 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
8254 rdataset != NULL;
8255 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link))
8256 {
8257 if (rdataset->type == rctx->type ||
8258 rctx->type == dns_rdatatype_any)
8259 {
8260 rctx->aname = name;
8261 if (rctx->type != dns_rdatatype_any) {
8262 rctx->ardataset = rdataset;
8263 }
8264 break;
8265 }
8266 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_cname) {
8267 rctx->cname = name;
8268 rctx->crdataset = rdataset;
8269 break;
8270 }
8271 }
8272 break;
8273
8274 case dns_namereln_subdomain:
8275 /*
8276 * In-scope DNAME records must have at least
8277 * as many labels as the domain being queried.
8278 * They also must be less that qname's labels
8279 * and any previously found dname.
8280 */
8281 if (nlabels >= rctx->dname_labels ||
8282 nlabels < rctx->domain_labels)
8283 {
8284 continue;
8285 }
8286
8287 /*
8288 * We are looking for the shortest DNAME if there
8289 * are multiple ones (which there shouldn't be).
8290 */
8291 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
8292 rdataset != NULL;
8293 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link))
8294 {
8295 if (rdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_dname) {
8296 continue;
8297 }
8298 rctx->dname = name;
8299 rctx->drdataset = rdataset;
8300 rctx->dname_labels = nlabels;
8301 break;
8302 }
8303 break;
8304 default:
8305 break;
8306 }
8307 }
8308
8309 /*
8310 * If a DNAME was found, then any CNAME or other answer matching
