8311 * QNAME that may also have been found must be ignored. Similarly,
8312 * if a matching answer was found along with a CNAME, the CNAME
8313 * must be ignored.
8314 */
8315 if (rctx->dname != NULL) {
8316 rctx->aname = NULL;
8317 rctx->ardataset = NULL;
8318 rctx->cname = NULL;
8319 rctx->crdataset = NULL;
8320 } else if (rctx->aname != NULL) {
8321 rctx->cname = NULL;
8322 rctx->crdataset = NULL;
8323 }
8324}
8325
8326/*
8327 * rctx_answer_any():
8328 * Handle responses to queries of type ANY. Scan the answer section,
8329 * and as long as each RRset is of a type that is valid in the answer
8330 * section, and the rdata isn't filtered, cache it.
8331 */
8332static isc_result_t
8333rctx_answer_any(respctx_t *rctx) {
8334 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset = NULL;
8335 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
8336
8337 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(rctx->aname->list);
8338 rdataset != NULL;
8339 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link))
8340 {
8341 if (!validinanswer(rdataset, fctx)) {
8342 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
8343 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8344 }
8345
8346 if ((fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_sig ||
8347 fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig) &&
8348 rdataset->type != fctx->type)
8349 {
8350 continue;
8351 }
8352
8353 if ((rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_a ||
8354 rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_aaaa) &&
8355 !is_answeraddress_allowed(fctx->res->view,
8356 rctx->aname, rdataset))
8357 {
8358 rctx->result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL;
8359 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8360 }
8361
8362 if ((rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_cname ||
8363 rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_dname) &&
8364 !is_answertarget_allowed(fctx, &fctx->name, rctx->aname,
8365 rdataset, NULL))
8366 {
8367 rctx->result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL;
8368 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8369 }
8370
8371 rctx->aname->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_CACHE;
8372 rctx->aname->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_ANSWER;
8373 rdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_ANSWER;
8374 rdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE;
8375 rdataset->trust = rctx->trust;
8376
8377 (void)dns_rdataset_additionaldata(rdataset, check_related,
8378 fctx);
8379 }
8380
8381 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
8382}
8383
8384/*
8385 * rctx_answer_match():
8386 * Handle responses that match the QNAME/QTYPE of the resolver query.
8387 * If QTYPE is valid in the answer section and the rdata isn't filtered,
8388 * the answer can be cached. If there is additional section data related
8389 * to the answer, it can be cached as well.
8390 */
8391static isc_result_t
8392rctx_answer_match(respctx_t *rctx) {
8393 dns_rdataset_t *sigrdataset = NULL;
8394 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
8395
8396 if (!validinanswer(rctx->ardataset, fctx)) {
8397 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
8398 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8399 }
8400
8401 if ((rctx->ardataset->type == dns_rdatatype_a ||
8402 rctx->ardataset->type == dns_rdatatype_aaaa) &&
8403 !is_answeraddress_allowed(fctx->res->view, rctx->aname,
8404 rctx->ardataset))
8405 {
8406 rctx->result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL;
8407 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8408 }
8409 if ((rctx->ardataset->type == dns_rdatatype_cname ||
8410 rctx->ardataset->type == dns_rdatatype_dname) &&
8411 rctx->type != rctx->ardataset->type &&
8412 rctx->type != dns_rdatatype_any &&
8413 !is_answertarget_allowed(fctx, &fctx->name, rctx->aname,
8414 rctx->ardataset, NULL))
8415 {
8416 rctx->result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL;
8417 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8418 }
8419
8420 rctx->aname->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_CACHE;
8421 rctx->aname->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_ANSWER;
8422 rctx->ardataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_ANSWER;
8423 rctx->ardataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE;
8424 rctx->ardataset->trust = rctx->trust;
8425 (void)dns_rdataset_additionaldata(rctx->ardataset, check_related, fctx);
8426
8427 for (sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(rctx->aname->list);
8428 sigrdataset != NULL;
8429 sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(sigrdataset, link))
8430 {
8431 if (!validinanswer(sigrdataset, fctx)) {
8432 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
8433 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8434 }
8435
8436 if (sigrdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_rrsig ||
8437 sigrdataset->covers != rctx->type)
8438 {
8439 continue;
8440 }
8441
8442 sigrdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_ANSWERSIG;
8443 sigrdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE;
8444 sigrdataset->trust = rctx->trust;
8445 break;
8446 }
8447
8448 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
8449}
8450
8451/*
8452 * rctx_answer_cname():
8453 * Handle answers containing a CNAME. Cache the CNAME, and flag that
8454 * there may be additional chain answers to find.
8455 */
8456static isc_result_t
8457rctx_answer_cname(respctx_t *rctx) {
8458 dns_rdataset_t *sigrdataset = NULL;
8459 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
8460
8461 if (!validinanswer(rctx->crdataset, fctx)) {
8462 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
8463 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8464 }
8465
8466 if (rctx->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig ||
8467 rctx->type == dns_rdatatype_key ||
8468 rctx->type == dns_rdatatype_nsec)
8469 {
8470 char buf[DNS_RDATATYPE_FORMATSIZE];
8471 dns_rdatatype_format(rctx->type, buf, sizeof(buf));
8472 log_formerr(fctx, "CNAME response for %s RR", buf);
8473 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
8474 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8475 }
8476
8477 if (!is_answertarget_allowed(fctx, &fctx->name,
8478 rctx->cname, rctx->crdataset, NULL))
8479 {
8480 rctx->result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL;
8481 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8482 }
8483
8484 rctx->cname->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_CACHE;
8485 rctx->cname->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_ANSWER;
8486 rctx->cname->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_CHAINING;
8487 rctx->crdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_ANSWER;
8488 rctx->crdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE;
8489 rctx->crdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CHAINING;
8490 rctx->crdataset->trust = rctx->trust;
8491
8492 for (sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(rctx->cname->list);
8493 sigrdataset != NULL;
8494 sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(sigrdataset, link))
8495 {
8496 if (!validinanswer(sigrdataset, fctx)) {
8497 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
8498 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8499 }
8500
8501 if (sigrdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_rrsig ||
8502 sigrdataset->covers != dns_rdatatype_cname)
8503 {
8504 continue;
8505 }
8506
8507 sigrdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_ANSWERSIG;
8508 sigrdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE;
8509 sigrdataset->trust = rctx->trust;
8510 break;
8511 }
8512
8513 rctx->chaining = true;
8514 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
8515}
8516
8517/*
8518 * rctx_answer_dname():
8519 * Handle responses with covering DNAME records.
8520 */
8521static isc_result_t
8522rctx_answer_dname(respctx_t *rctx) {
8523 dns_rdataset_t *sigrdataset = NULL;
8524 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
8525
8526 if (!validinanswer(rctx->drdataset, fctx)) {
8527 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
8528 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8529
8530 }
8531
8532 if (!is_answertarget_allowed(fctx, &fctx->name, rctx->dname,
8533 rctx->drdataset, &rctx->chaining))
8534 {
8535 rctx->result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL;
8536 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8537 }
8538
8539 rctx->dname->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_CACHE;
8540 rctx->dname->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_ANSWER;
8541 rctx->dname->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_CHAINING;
8542 rctx->drdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_ANSWER;
8543 rctx->drdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE;
8544 rctx->drdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CHAINING;
8545 rctx->drdataset->trust = rctx->trust;
8546
8547 for (sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(rctx->dname->list);
8548 sigrdataset != NULL;
8549 sigrdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(sigrdataset, link))
8550 {
8551 if (!validinanswer(sigrdataset, fctx)) {
8552 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
8553 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8554 }
8555
8556 if (sigrdataset->type != dns_rdatatype_rrsig ||
8557 sigrdataset->covers != dns_rdatatype_dname)
8558 {
8559 continue;
8560 }
8561
8562 sigrdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_ANSWERSIG;
8563 sigrdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE;
8564 sigrdataset->trust = rctx->trust;
8565 break;
8566 }
8567
8568 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
8569}
8570
8571/*
8572 * rctx_authority_positive():
8573 * Examine the records in the authority section (if there are any) for a
8574 * positive answer. We expect the names for all rdatasets in this section
8575 * to be subdomains of the domain being queried; any that are not are
8576 * skipped. We expect to find only *one* owner name; any names
8577 * after the first one processed are ignored. We expect to find only
8578 * rdatasets of type NS, RRSIG, or SIG; all others are ignored. Whatever
8579 * remains can be cached at trust level authauthority or additional
8580 * (depending on whether the AA bit was set on the answer).
8581 */
8582static void
8583rctx_authority_positive(respctx_t *rctx) {
8584 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
8585 bool done = false;
8586 isc_result_t result;
8587
8588 result = dns_message_firstname(fctx->rmessage, DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY);
8589 while (!done && result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
8590 dns_name_t *name = NULL;
8591 bool external;
8592
8593 dns_message_currentname(fctx->rmessage, DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY,
8594 &name);
8595 external = !dns_name_issubdomain(name, &fctx->domain);
8596
8597 if (!external) {
8598 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset = NULL;
8599
8600 /*
8601 * We expect to find NS or SIG NS rdatasets, and
8602 * nothing else.
8603 */
8604 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
8605 rdataset != NULL;
8606 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link))
8607 {
8608 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_ns ||
8609 (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig &&
8610 rdataset->covers == dns_rdatatype_ns))
8611 {
8612 name->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_CACHE;
8613 rdataset->attributes |=
8614 DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE;
8615
8616 if (rctx->aa) {
8617 rdataset->trust =
8618 dns_trust_authauthority;
8619 } else {
8620 rdataset->trust =
8621 dns_trust_additional;
8622 }
8623
8624 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_ns)
8625 {
8626 rctx->ns_name = name;
8627 rctx->ns_rdataset = rdataset;
8628 }
8629 /*
8630 * Mark any additional data related
8631 * to this rdataset.
8632 */
8633 (void)dns_rdataset_additionaldata(
8634 rdataset,
8635 check_related,
8636 fctx);
8637 done = true;
8638 }
8639 }
8640 }
8641
8642 result = dns_message_nextname(fctx->rmessage,
8643 DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY);
8644 }
8645}
8646
8647/*
8648 * rctx_answer_none():
8649 * Handles a response without an answer: this is either a negative
8650 * response (NXDOMAIN or NXRRSET) or a referral. Determine which it is,
8651 * then either scan the authority section for negative caching and
8652 * DNSSEC proof of nonexistence, or else call rctx_referral().
8653 */
8654static isc_result_t
8655rctx_answer_none(respctx_t *rctx) {
8656 isc_result_t result;
8657 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
8658
8659 FCTXTRACE("rctx_answer_none");
8660
8661 rctx_answer_init(rctx);
8662
8663 /*
8664 * Sometimes we can tell if its a negative response by looking at
8665 * the message header.
8666 */
8667 if (fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_nxdomain ||
8668 (fctx->rmessage->counts[DNS_SECTION_ANSWER] == 0 &&
8669 fctx->rmessage->counts[DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY] == 0))
8670 {
8671 rctx->negative = true;
8672 }
8673
8674 /*
8675 * Process the authority section
8676 */
8677 result = rctx_authority_negative(rctx);
8678 if (result == ISC_R_COMPLETE) {
8679 return (rctx->result);
8680 }
8681
8682 log_ns_ttl(fctx, "rctx_answer_none");
8683
8684 if (rctx->ns_rdataset != NULL &&
8685 dns_name_equal(&fctx->domain, rctx->ns_name) &&
8686 !dns_name_equal(rctx->ns_name, dns_rootname))
8687 {
8688 trim_ns_ttl(fctx, rctx->ns_name, rctx->ns_rdataset);
8689 }
8690
8691 /*
8692 * A negative response has a SOA record (Type 2)
8693 * and a optional NS RRset (Type 1) or it has neither
8694 * a SOA or a NS RRset (Type 3, handled above) or
8695 * rcode is NXDOMAIN (handled above) in which case
8696 * the NS RRset is allowed (Type 4).
8697 */
8698 if (rctx->soa_name != NULL) {
8699 rctx->negative = true;
8700 }
8701
8702 /*
8703 * Process DNSSEC records in the authority section.
8704 */
8705 result = rctx_authority_dnssec(rctx);
8706 if (result == ISC_R_COMPLETE) {
8707 return (rctx->result);
8708 }
8709
8710 /*
8711 * Trigger lookups for DNS nameservers.
8712 */
8713 if (rctx->negative && fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_noerror &&
8714 fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_ds && rctx->soa_name != NULL &&
8715 dns_name_equal(rctx->soa_name, &fctx->name) &&
8716 !dns_name_equal(&fctx->name, dns_rootname))
8717 {
8718 return (DNS_R_CHASEDSSERVERS);
8719 }
8720
8721 /*
8722 * Did we find anything?
8723 */
8724 if (!rctx->negative && rctx->ns_name == NULL) {
8725 /*
8726 * The responder is insane.
8727 */
8728 if (rctx->found_name == NULL) {
8729 log_formerr(fctx, "invalid response");
8730 return (DNS_R_FORMERR);
8731 }
8732 if (!dns_name_issubdomain(rctx->found_name, &fctx->domain)) {
8733 char nbuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
8734 char dbuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
8735 char tbuf[DNS_RDATATYPE_FORMATSIZE];
8736
8737 dns_rdatatype_format(rctx->found_type, tbuf,
8738 sizeof(tbuf));
8739 dns_name_format(rctx->found_name, nbuf, sizeof(nbuf));
8740 dns_name_format(&fctx->domain, dbuf,
8741 sizeof(dbuf));
8742
8743 log_formerr(fctx, "Name %s (%s) not subdomain"
8744 " of zone %s -- invalid response",
8745 nbuf, tbuf, dbuf);
8746 } else {
8747 log_formerr(fctx, "invalid response");
8748 }
8749 return (DNS_R_FORMERR);
8750 }
8751
8752 /*
8753 * If we found both NS and SOA, they should be the same name.
8754 */
8755 if (rctx->ns_name != NULL && rctx->soa_name != NULL &&
8756 rctx->ns_name != rctx->soa_name)
8757 {
8758 log_formerr(fctx, "NS/SOA mismatch");
8759 return (DNS_R_FORMERR);
8760 }
8761
8762 /*
8763 * Handle a referral.
8764 */
8765 result = rctx_referral(rctx);
8766 if (result == ISC_R_COMPLETE) {
8767 return (rctx->result);
8768 }
8769
8770 /*
8771 * Since we're not doing a referral, we don't want to cache any
8772 * NS RRs we may have found.
8773 */
8774 if (rctx->ns_name != NULL) {
8775 rctx->ns_name->attributes &= ~DNS_NAMEATTR_CACHE;
8776 }
8777
8778 if (rctx->negative) {
8779 fctx->attributes |= FCTX_ATTR_WANTNCACHE;
8780 }
8781
8782 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
8783}
8784
8785/*
8786 * rctx_authority_negative():
8787 * Scan the authority section of a negative answer, handling
8788 * NS and SOA records. (Note that this function does *not* handle
8789 * DNSSEC records; those are addressed separately in
8790 * rctx_authority_dnssec() below.)
8791 */
8792static isc_result_t
8793rctx_authority_negative(respctx_t *rctx) {
8794 isc_result_t result;
8795 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
8796 dns_section_t section;
8797 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset = NULL;
8798 bool finished = false;
8799
8800 if (rctx->ns_in_answer) {
8801 INSIST(fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_ns);
8802 section = DNS_SECTION_ANSWER;
8803 } else {
8804 section = DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY;
8805 }
8806
8807 result = dns_message_firstname(fctx->rmessage, section);
8808 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
8809 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
8810 }
8811
8812 while (!finished) {
8813 dns_name_t *name = NULL;
8814
8815 dns_message_currentname(fctx->rmessage, section, &name);
8816 result = dns_message_nextname(fctx->rmessage, section);
8817 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
8818 finished = true;
8819 }
8820
8821 if (!dns_name_issubdomain(name, &fctx->domain)) {
8822 continue;
8823 }
8824
8825 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
8826 rdataset != NULL;
8827 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link))
8828 {
8829 dns_rdatatype_t type = rdataset->type;
8830 if (type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig) {
8831 type = rdataset->covers;
8832 }
8833 if (((type == dns_rdatatype_ns ||
8834 type == dns_rdatatype_soa) &&
8835 !dns_name_issubdomain(&fctx->name, name)))
8836 {
8837 char qbuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
8838 char nbuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
8839 char tbuf[DNS_RDATATYPE_FORMATSIZE];
8840 dns_rdatatype_format(type, tbuf, sizeof(tbuf));
8841 dns_name_format(name, nbuf, sizeof(nbuf));
8842 dns_name_format(&fctx->name, qbuf,
8843 sizeof(qbuf));
8844 log_formerr(fctx,
8845 "unrelated %s %s in "
8846 "%s authority section",
8847 tbuf, nbuf, qbuf);
8848 break;
8849 }
8850
8851 switch (type) {
8852 case dns_rdatatype_ns:
8853 /*
8854 * NS or RRSIG NS.
8855 *
8856 * Only one set of NS RRs is allowed.
8857 */
8858 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_ns) {
8859 if (rctx->ns_name != NULL &&
8860 name != rctx->ns_name)
8861 {
8862 log_formerr(fctx,
8863 "multiple NS RRsets "
8864 "in authority section");
8865 rctx->result =
8866 DNS_R_FORMERR;
8867 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8868 }
8869 rctx->ns_name = name;
8870 rctx->ns_rdataset = rdataset;
8871 }
8872 name->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_CACHE;
8873 rdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE;
8874 rdataset->trust = dns_trust_glue;
8875 break;
8876 case dns_rdatatype_soa:
8877 /*
8878 * SOA, or RRSIG SOA.
8879 *
8880 * Only one SOA is allowed.
8881 */
8882 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_soa) {
8883 if (rctx->soa_name != NULL &&
8884 name != rctx->soa_name)
8885 {
8886 log_formerr(fctx,
8887 "multiple SOA RRs "
8888 "in authority "
8889 "section");
8890 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
8891 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
8892 }
8893 rctx->soa_name = name;
8894 }
8895 name->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_NCACHE;
8896 rdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_NCACHE;
8897 if (rctx->aa) {
8898 rdataset->trust =
8899 dns_trust_authauthority;
8900 } else if (ISFORWARDER(fctx->addrinfo)) {
8901 rdataset->trust = dns_trust_answer;
8902 } else {
8903 rdataset->trust = dns_trust_additional;
8904 }
8905 break;
8906 default:
8907 continue;
8908 }
8909 }
8910 }
8911
8912 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
8913}
8914
8915/*
8916 * rctx_ncache():
8917 * Cache the negatively cacheable parts of the message. This may
8918 * also cause work to be queued to the DNSSEC validator.
8919 */
8920static void
8921rctx_ncache(respctx_t *rctx) {
8922 isc_result_t result;
8923 dns_rdatatype_t covers;
8924 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
8925
8926 if (!WANTNCACHE(fctx)) {
8927 return;
8928 }
8929
8930 /*
8931 * Cache DS NXDOMAIN seperately to other types.
8932 */
8933 if (fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_nxdomain &&
8934 fctx->type != dns_rdatatype_ds)
8935 {
8936 covers = dns_rdatatype_any;
8937 } else {
8938 covers = fctx->type;
8939 }
8940
8941 /*
8942 * Cache any negative cache entries in the message.
8943 */
8944 result = ncache_message(fctx, rctx->query->addrinfo, covers, rctx->now);
8945 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
8946 FCTXTRACE3("ncache_message complete", result);
8947 }
8948}
8949
8950/*
8951 * rctx_authority_dnssec():
8952 *
8953 * Scan the authority section of a negative answer or referral,
8954 * handling DNSSEC records (i.e. NSEC, NSEC3, DS).
8955 */
8956static isc_result_t
8957rctx_authority_dnssec(respctx_t *rctx) {
8958 isc_result_t result;
8959 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
8960 dns_section_t section;
8961 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset = NULL;
8962 bool finished = false;
8963
8964 if (rctx->ns_in_answer) {
8965 INSIST(fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_ns);
8966 section = DNS_SECTION_ANSWER;
8967 } else {
8968 section = DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY;
8969 }
8970
8971 result = dns_message_firstname(fctx->rmessage, section);
8972 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
8973 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
8974 }
8975
8976 while (!finished) {
8977 dns_name_t *name = NULL;
8978
8979 dns_message_currentname(fctx->rmessage, section, &name);
8980 result = dns_message_nextname(fctx->rmessage, section);
8981 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
8982 finished = true;
8983 }
8984
8985 if (!dns_name_issubdomain(name, &fctx->domain)) {
8986 /* Invalid name found; preserve it for logging later */
8987 rctx->found_name = name;
8988 rctx->found_type = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list)->type;
8989 continue;
8990 }
8991
8992 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
8993 rdataset != NULL;
8994 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link))
8995 {
8996 dns_rdatatype_t type = rdataset->type;
8997 if (type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig) {
8998 type = rdataset->covers;
8999 }
9000
9001 switch (type) {
9002 case dns_rdatatype_nsec:
9003 case dns_rdatatype_nsec3:
9004 if (rctx->negative) {
9005 name->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_NCACHE;
9006 rdataset->attributes |=
9007 DNS_RDATASETATTR_NCACHE;
9008 } else if (type == dns_rdatatype_nsec) {
9009 name->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_CACHE;
9010 rdataset->attributes |=
9011 DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE;
9012 }
9013
9014 if (rctx->aa) {
9015 rdataset->trust =
9016 dns_trust_authauthority;
9017 } else if (ISFORWARDER(fctx->addrinfo)) {
9018 rdataset->trust = dns_trust_answer;
9019 } else {
9020 rdataset->trust = dns_trust_additional;
9021 }
9022 /*
9023 * No additional data needs to be marked.
9024 */
9025 break;
9026 case dns_rdatatype_ds:
9027 /*
9028 * DS or SIG DS.
9029 *
9030 * These should only be here if this is a
9031 * referral, and there should only be one
9032 * DS RRset.
9033 */
9034 if (rctx->ns_name == NULL) {
9035 log_formerr(fctx,
9036 "DS with no referral");
9037 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
9038 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
9039 }
9040
9041 if (rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_ds) {
9042 if (rctx->ds_name != NULL &&
9043 name != rctx->ds_name)
9044 {
9045 log_formerr(fctx,
9046 "DS doesn't match "
9047 "referral (NS)");
9048 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
9049 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
9050 }
9051 rctx->ds_name = name;
9052 }
9053
9054 name->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_CACHE;
9055 rdataset->attributes |= DNS_RDATASETATTR_CACHE;
9056 if (rctx->aa) {
9057 rdataset->trust =
9058 dns_trust_authauthority;
9059 } else if (ISFORWARDER(fctx->addrinfo)) {
9060 rdataset->trust = dns_trust_answer;
9061 } else {
9062 rdataset->trust = dns_trust_additional;
9063 }
9064 break;
9065 default:
9066 continue;
9067 }
9068 }
9069 }
9070
9071 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
9072}
9073
9074/*
9075 * rctx_referral():
9076 * Handles referral responses. Check for sanity, find glue as needed,
9077 * and update the fetch context to follow the delegation.
9078 */
9079static isc_result_t
9080rctx_referral(respctx_t *rctx) {
9081 isc_result_t result;
9082 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
9083
9084 if (rctx->negative || rctx->ns_name == NULL) {
9085 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
9086 }
9087
9088 /*
9089 * We already know ns_name is a subdomain of fctx->domain.
9090 * If ns_name is equal to fctx->domain, we're not making
9091 * progress. We return DNS_R_FORMERR so that we'll keep
9092 * trying other servers.
9093 */
9094 if (dns_name_equal(rctx->ns_name, &fctx->domain)) {
9095 log_formerr(fctx, "non-improving referral");
9096 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
9097 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
9098 }
9099
9100 /*
9101 * If the referral name is not a parent of the query
9102 * name, consider the responder insane.
9103 */
9104 if (!dns_name_issubdomain(&fctx->name, rctx->ns_name)) {
9105 /* Logged twice */
9106 log_formerr(fctx, "referral to non-parent");
9107 FCTXTRACE("referral to non-parent");
9108 rctx->result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
9109 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
9110 }
9111
9112 /*
9113 * Mark any additional data related to this rdataset.
9114 * It's important that we do this before we change the
9115 * query domain.
9116 */
9117 INSIST(rctx->ns_rdataset != NULL);
9118 fctx->attributes |= FCTX_ATTR_GLUING;
9119 (void)dns_rdataset_additionaldata(rctx->ns_rdataset,
9120 check_related, fctx);
9121#if CHECK_FOR_GLUE_IN_ANSWER
9122 /*
9123 * Look in the answer section for "glue" that is incorrectly
9124 * returned as a answer. This is needed if the server also
9125 * minimizes the response size by not adding records to the
9126 * additional section that are in the answer section or if
9127 * the record gets dropped due to message size constraints.
9128 */
9129 if (rctx->glue_in_answer &&
9130 (fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_aaaa ||
9131 fctx->type == dns_rdatatype_a))
9132 {
9133 (void)dns_rdataset_additionaldata(rctx->ns_rdataset,
9134 check_answer, fctx);
9135 }
9136#endif
9137 fctx->attributes &= ~FCTX_ATTR_GLUING;
9138
9139 /*
9140 * NS rdatasets with 0 TTL cause problems.
9141 * dns_view_findzonecut() will not find them when we
9142 * try to follow the referral, and we'll SERVFAIL
9143 * because the best nameservers are now above QDOMAIN.
9144 * We force the TTL to 1 second to prevent this.
9145 */
9146 if (rctx->ns_rdataset->ttl == 0) {
9147 rctx->ns_rdataset->ttl = 1;
9148 }
9149
9150 /*
9151 * Set the current query domain to the referral name.
9152 *
9153 * XXXRTH We should check if we're in forward-only mode, and
9154 * if so we should bail out.
9155 */
9156 INSIST(dns_name_countlabels(&fctx->domain) > 0);
9157 fcount_decr(fctx);
9158
9159 dns_name_free(&fctx->domain, fctx->mctx);
9160 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(&fctx->nameservers)) {
9161 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&fctx->nameservers);
9162 }
9163
9164 dns_name_init(&fctx->domain, NULL);
9165 result = dns_name_dup(rctx->ns_name, fctx->mctx, &fctx->domain);
9166 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9167 rctx->result = result;
9168 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
9169 }
9170
9171 result = fcount_incr(fctx, true);
9172 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9173 rctx->result = result;
9174 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
9175 }
9176
9177 fctx->attributes |= FCTX_ATTR_WANTCACHE;
9178 fctx->ns_ttl_ok = false;
9179 log_ns_ttl(fctx, "DELEGATION");
9180 rctx->result = DNS_R_DELEGATION;
9181
9182 /*
9183 * Reinitialize 'rctx' to prepare for following the delegation:
9184 * set the get_nameservers and next_server flags appropriately and
9185 * reset the fetch context counters.
9186 *
9187 */
9188 rctx->get_nameservers = true;
9189 rctx->next_server = true;
9190 rctx->fctx->restarts = 0;
9191 rctx->fctx->referrals++;
9192 rctx->fctx->querysent = 0;
9193 rctx->fctx->lamecount = 0;
9194 rctx->fctx->quotacount = 0;
9195 rctx->fctx->neterr = 0;
9196 rctx->fctx->badresp = 0;
9197 rctx->fctx->adberr = 0;
9198
9199 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
9200}
9201
9202/*
9203 * rctx_additional():
9204 * Scan the additional section of a response to find records related
9205 * to answers we were interested in.
9206 */
9207static void
9208rctx_additional(respctx_t *rctx) {
9209 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
9210 bool rescan;
9211 dns_section_t section = DNS_SECTION_ADDITIONAL;
9212 isc_result_t result;
9213
9214 again:
9215 rescan = false;
9216
9217 for (result = dns_message_firstname(fctx->rmessage, section);
9218 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS;
9219 result = dns_message_nextname(fctx->rmessage, section)) {
9220 dns_name_t *name = NULL;
9221 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
9222 dns_message_currentname(fctx->rmessage, DNS_SECTION_ADDITIONAL,
9223 &name);
9224 if ((name->attributes & DNS_NAMEATTR_CHASE) == 0)
9225 continue;
9226 name->attributes &= ~DNS_NAMEATTR_CHASE;
9227 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
9228 rdataset != NULL;
9229 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link)) {
9230 if (CHASE(rdataset)) {
9231 rdataset->attributes &= ~DNS_RDATASETATTR_CHASE;
9232 (void)dns_rdataset_additionaldata(rdataset,
9233 check_related,
9234 fctx);
9235 rescan = true;
9236 }
9237 }
9238 }
9239 if (rescan)
9240 goto again;
9241}
9242
9243/*
9244 * rctx_nextserver():
9245 * We found something wrong with the remote server, but it may be
9246 * useful to try another one.
9247 */
9248static void
9249rctx_nextserver(respctx_t *rctx, dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo,
9250 isc_result_t result)
9251{
9252 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
9253
9254 if (result == DNS_R_FORMERR)
9255 rctx->broken_server = DNS_R_FORMERR;
9256 if (rctx->broken_server != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9257 /*
9258 * Add this server to the list of bad servers for
9259 * this fctx.
9260 */
9261 add_bad(fctx, addrinfo, rctx->broken_server,
9262 rctx->broken_type);
9263 }
9264
9265 if (rctx->get_nameservers) {
9266 dns_fixedname_t foundname, founddc;
9267 dns_name_t *name, *fname, *dcname;
9268 unsigned int findoptions = 0;
9269
9270 fname = dns_fixedname_initname(&foundname);
9271 dcname = dns_fixedname_initname(&founddc);
9272
9273 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9274 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
9275 return;
9276 }
9277 if (dns_rdatatype_atparent(fctx->type))
9278 findoptions |= DNS_DBFIND_NOEXACT;
9279 if ((rctx->retryopts & DNS_FETCHOPT_UNSHARED) == 0) {
9280 name = &fctx->name;
9281 } else {
9282 name = &fctx->domain;
9283 }
9284 result = dns_view_findzonecut(fctx->res->view, name, fname,
9285 dcname, fctx->now, findoptions,
9286 true, true, &fctx->nameservers,
9287 NULL);
9288 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9289 FCTXTRACE("couldn't find a zonecut");
9290 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
9291 return;
9292 }
9293 if (!dns_name_issubdomain(fname, &fctx->domain)) {
9294 /*
9295 * The best nameservers are now above our QDOMAIN.
9296 */
9297 FCTXTRACE("nameservers now above QDOMAIN");
9298 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
9299 return;
9300 }
9301
9302 fcount_decr(fctx);
9303
9304 dns_name_free(&fctx->domain, fctx->mctx);
9305 dns_name_init(&fctx->domain, NULL);
9306 result = dns_name_dup(fname, fctx->mctx, &fctx->domain);
9307 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9308 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
9309 return;
9310 }
9311 dns_name_free(&fctx->qmindcname, fctx->mctx);
9312 dns_name_init(&fctx->qmindcname, NULL);
9313 result = dns_name_dup(dcname, fctx->mctx, &fctx->qmindcname);
9314 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9315 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
9316 return;
9317 }
9318
9319 result = fcount_incr(fctx, true);
9320 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9321 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
9322 return;
9323 }
9324 fctx->ns_ttl = fctx->nameservers.ttl;
9325 fctx->ns_ttl_ok = true;
9326 fctx_cancelqueries(fctx, true, false);
9327 fctx_cleanupall(fctx);
9328 }
9329
9330 /*
9331 * Try again.
9332 */
9333 fctx_try(fctx, !rctx->get_nameservers, false);
9334}
9335
9336/*
9337 * rctx_resend():
9338 *
9339 * Resend the query, probably with the options changed. Calls fctx_query(),
9340 * passing rctx->retryopts (which is based on query->options, but may have been
9341 * updated since the last time fctx_query() was called).
9342 */
9343static void
9344rctx_resend(respctx_t *rctx, dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo) {
9345 isc_result_t result;
9346 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
9347 bool bucket_empty;
9348
9349 FCTXTRACE("resend");
9350 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_retry);
9351 fctx_increference(fctx);
9352 result = fctx_query(fctx, addrinfo, rctx->retryopts);
9353 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9354 return;
9355 }
9356
9357 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
9358 LOCK(&fctx->res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
9359 bucket_empty = fctx_decreference(fctx);
9360 UNLOCK(&fctx->res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
9361 if (bucket_empty) {
9362 empty_bucket(fctx->res);
9363 }
9364}
9365
9366/*
9367 * rctx_next():
9368 * We got what appeared to be a response but it didn't match the question
9369 * or the cookie; it may have been meant for someone else, or it may be a
9370 * spoofing attack. Drop it and continue listening for the response we
9371 * wanted.
9372 */
9373static void
9374rctx_next(respctx_t *rctx) {
9375#ifdef WANT_QUERYTRACE
9376 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
9377#endif
9378 isc_result_t result;
9379
9380 FCTXTRACE("nextitem");
9381 inc_stats(rctx->fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_nextitem);
9382 INSIST(rctx->query->dispentry != NULL);
9383 dns_message_reset(rctx->fctx->rmessage, DNS_MESSAGE_INTENTPARSE);
9384 result = dns_dispatch_getnext(rctx->query->dispentry, &rctx->devent);
9385 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9386 fctx_done(rctx->fctx, result, __LINE__);
9387 }
9388}
9389
9390/*
9391 * rctx_chaseds():
9392 * Look up the parent zone's NS records so that DS records can be fetched.
9393 */
9394static void
9395rctx_chaseds(respctx_t *rctx, dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo, isc_result_t result)
9396{
9397 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
9398 unsigned int n;
9399
9400 add_bad(fctx, addrinfo, result, rctx->broken_type);
9401 fctx_cancelqueries(fctx, true, false);
9402 fctx_cleanupfinds(fctx);
9403 fctx_cleanupforwaddrs(fctx);
9404
9405 n = dns_name_countlabels(&fctx->name);
9406 dns_name_getlabelsequence(&fctx->name, 1, n - 1, &fctx->nsname);
9407
9408 FCTXTRACE("suspending DS lookup to find parent's NS records");
9409
9410 result = dns_resolver_createfetch(fctx->res, &fctx->nsname,
9411 dns_rdatatype_ns,
9412 NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0,
9413 fctx->options, 0, NULL, rctx->task,
9414 resume_dslookup, fctx,
9415 &fctx->nsrrset, NULL,
9416 &fctx->nsfetch);
9417 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9418 if (result == DNS_R_DUPLICATE) {
9419 result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL;
9420 }
9421 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
9422 } else {
9423 fctx_increference(fctx);
9424 result = fctx_stopidletimer(fctx);
9425 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
9426 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
9427 }
9428}
9429
9430/*
9431 * rctx_done():
9432 * This resolver query response is finished, either because we encountered
9433 * a problem or because we've gotten all the information from it that we
9434 * can. We either wait for another response, resend the query to the
9435 * same server, resend to a new server, or clean up and shut down the fetch.
9436 */
9437static void
9438rctx_done(respctx_t *rctx, isc_result_t result) {
9439 resquery_t *query = rctx->query;
9440 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
9441 dns_adbaddrinfo_t *addrinfo = query->addrinfo;
9442
9443 FCTXTRACE4("query canceled in response(); ",
9444 rctx->no_response ? "no response" : "responding",
9445 result);
9446
9447 /*
9448 * Cancel the query.
9449 *
9450 * XXXRTH Don't cancel the query if waiting for validation?
9451 */
9452 if (!rctx->nextitem) {
9453 fctx_cancelquery(&query, &rctx->devent, rctx->finish,
9454 rctx->no_response, false);
9455 }
9456
9457#ifdef ENABLE_AFL
9458 if (dns_fuzzing_resolver &&
9459 (rctx->next_server || rctx->resend || rctx->nextitem))
9460 {
9461 if (rctx->nextitem) {
9462 fctx_cancelquery(&query, &rctx->devent, rctx->finish,
9463 rctx->no_response, false);
9464 }
9465 fctx_done(fctx, DNS_R_SERVFAIL, __LINE__);
9466 return;
9467 } else
9468#endif
9469 if (rctx->next_server) {
9470 rctx_nextserver(rctx, addrinfo, result);
9471 } else if (rctx->resend) {
9472 rctx_resend(rctx, addrinfo);
9473 } else if (rctx->nextitem) {
9474 rctx_next(rctx);
9475 } else if (result == DNS_R_CHASEDSSERVERS) {
9476 rctx_chaseds(rctx, addrinfo, result);
9477 } else if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && !HAVE_ANSWER(fctx)) {
9478 /*
9479 * All has gone well so far, but we are waiting for the
9480 * DNSSEC validator to validate the answer.
9481 */
9482 FCTXTRACE("wait for validator");
9483 fctx_cancelqueries(fctx, true, false);
9484 /*
9485 * We must not retransmit while the validator is working;
9486 * it has references to the current rmessage.
9487 */
9488 result = fctx_stopidletimer(fctx);
9489 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
9490 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
9491 } else {
9492 /*
9493 * We're done.
9494 */
9495 fctx_done(fctx, result, __LINE__);
9496 }
9497
9498}
9499
9500/*
9501 * rctx_logpacket():
9502 * Log the incoming packet; also log to DNSTAP if configured.
9503 */
9504static void
9505rctx_logpacket(respctx_t *rctx) {
9506#ifdef HAVE_DNSTAP
9507 isc_result_t result;
9508 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
9509 isc_socket_t *sock = NULL;
9510 isc_sockaddr_t localaddr, *la = NULL;
9511 unsigned char zone[DNS_NAME_MAXWIRE];
9512 dns_dtmsgtype_t dtmsgtype;
9513 dns_compress_t cctx;
9514 isc_region_t zr;
9515 isc_buffer_t zb;
9516#endif /* HAVE_DNSTAP */
9517
9518 dns_message_logfmtpacket(rctx->fctx->rmessage,
9519 "received packet from",
9520 &rctx->query->addrinfo->sockaddr,
9521 DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
9522 DNS_LOGMODULE_PACKETS,
9523 &dns_master_style_comment,
9524 ISC_LOG_DEBUG(10),
9525 rctx->fctx->res->mctx);
9526
9527#ifdef HAVE_DNSTAP
9528 /*
9529 * Log the response via dnstap.
9530 */
9531 memset(&zr, 0, sizeof(zr));
9532 result = dns_compress_init(&cctx, -1, fctx->res->mctx);
9533 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9534 isc_buffer_init(&zb, zone, sizeof(zone));
9535 dns_compress_setmethods(&cctx, DNS_COMPRESS_NONE);
9536 result = dns_name_towire(&fctx->domain, &cctx, &zb);
9537 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
9538 isc_buffer_usedregion(&zb, &zr);
9539 dns_compress_invalidate(&cctx);
9540 }
9541
9542 if ((fctx->qmessage->flags & DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_RD) != 0) {
9543 dtmsgtype = DNS_DTTYPE_FR;
9544 } else {
9545 dtmsgtype = DNS_DTTYPE_RR;
9546 }
9547
9548 if (rctx->query->exclusivesocket) {
9549 sock = dns_dispatch_getentrysocket(rctx->query->dispentry);
9550 } else {
9551 sock = dns_dispatch_getsocket(rctx->query->dispatch);
9552 }
9553
9554 if (sock != NULL) {
9555 result = isc_socket_getsockname(sock, &localaddr);
9556 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9557 la = &localaddr;
9558 }
9559 }
9560
9561 dns_dt_send(fctx->res->view, dtmsgtype, la,
9562 &rctx->query->addrinfo->sockaddr,
9563 ((rctx->query->options & DNS_FETCHOPT_TCP) != 0),
9564 &zr, &rctx->query->start, NULL, &rctx->devent->buffer);
9565#endif /* HAVE_DNSTAP */
9566}
9567
9568/*
9569 * rctx_badserver():
9570 * Is the remote server broken, or does it dislike us?
9571 */
9572static isc_result_t
9573rctx_badserver(respctx_t *rctx, isc_result_t result) {
9574 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
9575 resquery_t *query = rctx->query;
9576 isc_buffer_t b;
9577 char code[64];
9578
9579 if (fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_noerror ||
9580 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_yxdomain ||
9581 fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_nxdomain)
9582 {
9583 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
9584 }
9585
9586 if ((fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_formerr) &&
9587 (rctx->retryopts & DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0) == 0)
9588 {
9589 /*
9590 * It's very likely they don't like EDNS0.
9591 * If the response code is SERVFAIL, also check if the
9592 * response contains an OPT RR and don't cache the
9593 * failure since it can be returned for various other
9594 * reasons.
9595 *
9596 * XXXRTH We should check if the question
9597 * we're asking requires EDNS0, and
9598 * if so, we should bail out.
9599 */
9600 rctx->retryopts |= DNS_FETCHOPT_NOEDNS0;
9601 rctx->resend = true;
9602 /*
9603 * Remember that they may not like EDNS0.
9604 */
9605 add_bad_edns(fctx, &query->addrinfo->sockaddr);
9606 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_edns0fail);
9607 } else if (fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_formerr) {
9608 if (ISFORWARDER(query->addrinfo)) {
9609 /*
9610 * This forwarder doesn't understand us,
9611 * but other forwarders might. Keep trying.
9612 */
9613 rctx->broken_server = DNS_R_REMOTEFORMERR;
9614 rctx->next_server = true;
9615 } else {
9616 /*
9617 * The server doesn't understand us. Since
9618 * all servers for a zone need similar
9619 * capabilities, we assume that we will get
9620 * FORMERR from all servers, and thus we
9621 * cannot make any more progress with this
9622 * fetch.
9623 */
9624 log_formerr(fctx, "server sent FORMERR");
9625 result = DNS_R_FORMERR;
9626 }
9627 } else if (fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_badvers) {
9628 unsigned int version;
9629#if DNS_EDNS_VERSION > 0
9630 unsigned int flags, mask;
9631#endif
9632
9633 INSIST(rctx->opt != NULL);
9634 version = (rctx->opt->ttl >> 16) & 0xff;
9635#if DNS_EDNS_VERSION > 0
9636 flags = (version << DNS_FETCHOPT_EDNSVERSIONSHIFT) |
9637 DNS_FETCHOPT_EDNSVERSIONSET;
9638 mask = DNS_FETCHOPT_EDNSVERSIONMASK |
9639 DNS_FETCHOPT_EDNSVERSIONSET;
9640#endif
9641
9642 /*
9643 * Record that we got a good EDNS response.
9644 */
9645 if (query->ednsversion > (int)version &&
9646 !EDNSOK(query->addrinfo)) {
9647 dns_adb_changeflags(fctx->adb, query->addrinfo,
9648 FCTX_ADDRINFO_EDNSOK,
9649 FCTX_ADDRINFO_EDNSOK);
9650 }
9651
9652 /*
9653 * RFC 2671 was not clear that unknown options should
9654 * be ignored. RFC 6891 is clear that that they
9655 * should be ignored. If we are supporting the
9656 * experimental EDNS > 0 then perform strict
9657 * version checking of badvers responses. We won't
9658 * be sending COOKIE etc. in that case.
9659 */
9660#if DNS_EDNS_VERSION > 0
9661 if ((int)version < query->ednsversion) {
9662 dns_adb_changeflags(fctx->adb, query->addrinfo,
9663 flags, mask);
9664 rctx->resend = true;
9665 } else {
9666 rctx->broken_server = DNS_R_BADVERS;
9667 rctx->next_server = true;
9668 }
9669#else
9670 rctx->broken_server = DNS_R_BADVERS;
9671 rctx->next_server = true;
9672#endif
9673 } else if (fctx->rmessage->rcode == dns_rcode_badcookie &&
9674 fctx->rmessage->cc_ok)
9675 {
9676 /*
9677 * We have recorded the new cookie.
9678 */
9679 if (BADCOOKIE(query->addrinfo)) {
9680 rctx->retryopts |= DNS_FETCHOPT_TCP;
9681 }
9682 query->addrinfo->flags |= FCTX_ADDRINFO_BADCOOKIE;
9683 rctx->resend = true;
9684 } else {
9685 rctx->broken_server = DNS_R_UNEXPECTEDRCODE;
9686 rctx->next_server = true;
9687 }
9688
9689 isc_buffer_init(&b, code, sizeof(code) - 1);
9690 dns_rcode_totext(fctx->rmessage->rcode, &b);
9691 code[isc_buffer_usedlength(&b)] = '\0';
9692 FCTXTRACE2("remote server broken: returned ", code);
9693 rctx_done(rctx, result);
9694
9695 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
9696}
9697
9698/*
9699 * rctx_lameserver():
9700 * Is the server lame?
9701 */
9702static isc_result_t
9703rctx_lameserver(respctx_t *rctx) {
9704 isc_result_t result;
9705 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
9706 resquery_t *query = rctx->query;
9707
9708 if (fctx->res->lame_ttl == 0 || ISFORWARDER(query->addrinfo) ||
9709 !is_lame(fctx))
9710 {
9711 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
9712 }
9713
9714 inc_stats(fctx->res, dns_resstatscounter_lame);
9715 log_lame(fctx, query->addrinfo);
9716 result = dns_adb_marklame(fctx->adb, query->addrinfo,
9717 &fctx->name, fctx->type,
9718 rctx->now + fctx->res->lame_ttl);
9719 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
9720 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
9721 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
9722 "could not mark server as lame: %s",
9723 isc_result_totext(result));
9724 rctx->broken_server = DNS_R_LAME;
9725 rctx->next_server = true;
9726 FCTXTRACE("lame server");
9727 rctx_done(rctx, result);
9728
9729 return (ISC_R_COMPLETE);
9730}
9731
9732/*
9733 * rctx_delonly_zone():
9734 * Handle delegation-only zones like NET and COM.
9735 */
9736static void
9737rctx_delonly_zone(respctx_t *rctx) {
9738 fetchctx_t *fctx = rctx->fctx;
9739 char namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
9740 char domainbuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
9741 char addrbuf[ISC_SOCKADDR_FORMATSIZE];
9742 char classbuf[64];
9743 char typebuf[64];
9744
9745 if (ISFORWARDER(rctx->query->addrinfo) ||
9746 !dns_view_isdelegationonly(fctx->res->view, &fctx->domain) ||
9747 dns_name_equal(&fctx->domain, &fctx->name) ||
9748 !fix_mustbedelegationornxdomain(fctx->rmessage, fctx))
9749 {
9750 return;
9751 }
9752
9753 dns_name_format(&fctx->name, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
9754 dns_name_format(&fctx->domain, domainbuf, sizeof(domainbuf));
9755 dns_rdatatype_format(fctx->type, typebuf, sizeof(typebuf));
9756 dns_rdataclass_format(fctx->res->rdclass, classbuf,
9757 sizeof(classbuf));
9758 isc_sockaddr_format(&rctx->query->addrinfo->sockaddr, addrbuf,
9759 sizeof(addrbuf));
9760
9761 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_DELEGATION_ONLY,
9762 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
9763 "enforced delegation-only for '%s' (%s/%s/%s) from %s",
9764 domainbuf, namebuf, typebuf, classbuf, addrbuf);
9765}
9766
9767/***
9768 *** Resolver Methods
9769 ***/
9770static void
9771destroy(dns_resolver_t *res) {
9772 unsigned int i;
9773 alternate_t *a;
9774
9775 REQUIRE(res->references == 0);
9776 REQUIRE(!res->priming);
9777 REQUIRE(res->primefetch == NULL);
9778
9779 RTRACE("destroy");
9780
9781 INSIST(res->nfctx == 0);
9782
9783 isc_mutex_destroy(&res->primelock);
9784 isc_mutex_destroy(&res->nlock);
9785 isc_mutex_destroy(&res->lock);
9786 for (i = 0; i < res->nbuckets; i++) {
9787 INSIST(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(res->buckets[i].fctxs));
9788 isc_task_shutdown(res->buckets[i].task);
9789 isc_task_detach(&res->buckets[i].task);
9790 isc_mutex_destroy(&res->buckets[i].lock);
9791 isc_mem_detach(&res->buckets[i].mctx);
9792 }
9793 isc_mem_put(res->mctx, res->buckets,
9794 res->nbuckets * sizeof(fctxbucket_t));
9795 for (i = 0; i < RES_DOMAIN_BUCKETS; i++) {
9796 INSIST(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(res->dbuckets[i].list));
9797 isc_mem_detach(&res->dbuckets[i].mctx);
9798 isc_mutex_destroy(&res->dbuckets[i].lock);
9799 }
9800 isc_mem_put(res->mctx, res->dbuckets,
9801 RES_DOMAIN_BUCKETS * sizeof(zonebucket_t));
9802 if (res->dispatches4 != NULL)
9803 dns_dispatchset_destroy(&res->dispatches4);
9804 if (res->dispatches6 != NULL)
9805 dns_dispatchset_destroy(&res->dispatches6);
9806 while ((a = ISC_LIST_HEAD(res->alternates)) != NULL) {
9807 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(res->alternates, a, link);
9808 if (!a->isaddress)
9809 dns_name_free(&a->_u._n.name, res->mctx);
9810 isc_mem_put(res->mctx, a, sizeof(*a));
9811 }
9812 dns_resolver_reset_algorithms(res);
9813 dns_resolver_reset_ds_digests(res);
9814 dns_badcache_destroy(&res->badcache);
9815 dns_resolver_resetmustbesecure(res);
9816#if USE_ALGLOCK
9817 isc_rwlock_destroy(&res->alglock);
9818#endif
9819#if USE_MBSLOCK
9820 isc_rwlock_destroy(&res->mbslock);
9821#endif
9822 isc_timer_detach(&res->spillattimer);
9823 res->magic = 0;
9824 isc_mem_put(res->mctx, res, sizeof(*res));
9825}
9826
9827static void
9828send_shutdown_events(dns_resolver_t *res) {
9829 isc_event_t *event, *next_event;
9830 isc_task_t *etask;
9831
9832 /*
9833 * Caller must be holding the resolver lock.
9834 */
9835
9836 for (event = ISC_LIST_HEAD(res->whenshutdown);
9837 event != NULL;
9838 event = next_event) {
9839 next_event = ISC_LIST_NEXT(event, ev_link);
9840 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(res->whenshutdown, event, ev_link);
9841 etask = event->ev_sender;
9842 event->ev_sender = res;
9843 isc_task_sendanddetach(&etask, &event);
9844 }
9845}
9846
9847static void
9848empty_bucket(dns_resolver_t *res) {
9849 RTRACE("empty_bucket");
9850
9851 LOCK(&res->lock);
9852
9853 INSIST(res->activebuckets > 0);
9854 res->activebuckets--;
9855 if (res->activebuckets == 0)
9856 send_shutdown_events(res);
9857
9858 UNLOCK(&res->lock);
9859}
9860
9861static void
9862spillattimer_countdown(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
9863 dns_resolver_t *res = event->ev_arg;
9864 isc_result_t result;
9865 unsigned int count;
9866 bool logit = false;
9867
9868 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(res));
9869
9870 UNUSED(task);
9871
9872 LOCK(&res->lock);
9873 INSIST(!res->exiting);
9874 if (res->spillat > res->spillatmin) {
9875 res->spillat--;
9876 logit = true;
9877 }
9878 if (res->spillat <= res->spillatmin) {
9879 result = isc_timer_reset(res->spillattimer,
9880 isc_timertype_inactive, NULL,
9881 NULL, true);
9882 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
9883 }
9884 count = res->spillat;
9885 UNLOCK(&res->lock);
9886 if (logit)
9887 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
9888 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
9889 "clients-per-query decreased to %u", count);
9890
9891 isc_event_free(&event);
9892}
9893
9894isc_result_t
9895dns_resolver_create(dns_view_t *view,
9896 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr,
9897 unsigned int ntasks, unsigned int ndisp,
9898 isc_socketmgr_t *socketmgr,
9899 isc_timermgr_t *timermgr,
9900 unsigned int options,
9901 dns_dispatchmgr_t *dispatchmgr,
9902 dns_dispatch_t *dispatchv4,
9903 dns_dispatch_t *dispatchv6,
9904 dns_resolver_t **resp)
9905{
9906 dns_resolver_t *res;
9907 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
9908 unsigned int i, buckets_created = 0, dbuckets_created = 0;
9909 isc_task_t *task = NULL;
9910 char name[16];
9911 unsigned dispattr;
9912
9913 /*
9914 * Create a resolver.
9915 */
9916
9917 REQUIRE(DNS_VIEW_VALID(view));
9918 REQUIRE(ntasks > 0);
9919 REQUIRE(ndisp > 0);
9920 REQUIRE(resp != NULL && *resp == NULL);
9921 REQUIRE(dispatchmgr != NULL);
9922 REQUIRE(dispatchv4 != NULL || dispatchv6 != NULL);
9923
9924 res = isc_mem_get(view->mctx, sizeof(*res));
9925 if (res == NULL)
9926 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
9927 RTRACE("create");
9928 res->mctx = view->mctx;
9929 res->rdclass = view->rdclass;
9930 res->socketmgr = socketmgr;
9931 res->timermgr = timermgr;
9932 res->taskmgr = taskmgr;
9933 res->dispatchmgr = dispatchmgr;
9934 res->view = view;
9935 res->options = options;
9936 res->lame_ttl = 0;
9937 ISC_LIST_INIT(res->alternates);
9938 res->udpsize = RECV_BUFFER_SIZE;
9939 res->algorithms = NULL;
9940 res->digests = NULL;
9941 res->badcache = NULL;
9942 result = dns_badcache_init(res->mctx, DNS_RESOLVER_BADCACHESIZE,
9943 &res->badcache);
9944 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9945 goto cleanup_res;
9946 }
9947 res->mustbesecure = NULL;
9948 res->spillatmin = res->spillat = 10;
9949 res->spillatmax = 100;
9950 res->spillattimer = NULL;
9951 res->zspill = 0;
9952 res->zero_no_soa_ttl = false;
9953 res->retryinterval = 30000;
9954 res->nonbackofftries = 3;
9955 res->query_timeout = DEFAULT_QUERY_TIMEOUT;
9956 res->maxdepth = DEFAULT_RECURSION_DEPTH;
9957 res->maxqueries = DEFAULT_MAX_QUERIES;
9958 res->quotaresp[dns_quotatype_zone] = DNS_R_DROP;
9959 res->quotaresp[dns_quotatype_server] = DNS_R_SERVFAIL;
9960 res->nbuckets = ntasks;
9961 if (view->resstats != NULL)
9962 isc_stats_set(view->resstats, ntasks,
9963 dns_resstatscounter_buckets);
9964 res->activebuckets = ntasks;
9965 res->buckets = isc_mem_get(view->mctx,
9966 ntasks * sizeof(fctxbucket_t));
9967 if (res->buckets == NULL) {
9968 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
9969 goto cleanup_badcache;
9970 }
9971 for (i = 0; i < ntasks; i++) {
9972 isc_mutex_init(&res->buckets[i].lock);
9973
9974 res->buckets[i].task = NULL;
9975 /*
9976 * Since we have a pool of tasks we bind them to task queues
9977 * to spread the load evenly
9978 */
9979 result = isc_task_create_bound(taskmgr, 0,
9980 &res->buckets[i].task, i);
9981 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9982 isc_mutex_destroy(&res->buckets[i].lock);
9983 goto cleanup_buckets;
9984 }
9985 res->buckets[i].mctx = NULL;
9986 snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "res%u", i);
9987 /*
9988 * Use a separate memory context for each bucket to reduce
9989 * contention among multiple threads. Do this only when
9990 * enabling threads because it will be require more memory.
9991 */
9992 result = isc_mem_create(0, 0, &res->buckets[i].mctx);
9993 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
9994 isc_task_detach(&res->buckets[i].task);
9995 isc_mutex_destroy(&res->buckets[i].lock);
9996 goto cleanup_buckets;
9997 }
9998 isc_mem_setname(res->buckets[i].mctx, name, NULL);
9999 isc_task_setname(res->buckets[i].task, name, res);
10000 ISC_LIST_INIT(res->buckets[i].fctxs);
10001 res->buckets[i].exiting = false;
10002 buckets_created++;
10003 }
10004
10005 res->dbuckets = isc_mem_get(view->mctx,
10006 RES_DOMAIN_BUCKETS * sizeof(zonebucket_t));
10007 if (res->dbuckets == NULL) {
10008 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
10009 goto cleanup_buckets;
10010 }
10011 for (i = 0; i < RES_DOMAIN_BUCKETS; i++) {
10012 ISC_LIST_INIT(res->dbuckets[i].list);
10013 res->dbuckets[i].mctx = NULL;
10014 isc_mem_attach(view->mctx, &res->dbuckets[i].mctx);
10015 isc_mutex_init(&res->dbuckets[i].lock);
10016 dbuckets_created++;
10017 }
10018
10019 res->dispatches4 = NULL;
10020 if (dispatchv4 != NULL) {
10021 dns_dispatchset_create(view->mctx, socketmgr, taskmgr,
10022 dispatchv4, &res->dispatches4, ndisp);
10023 dispattr = dns_dispatch_getattributes(dispatchv4);
10024 res->exclusivev4 = (dispattr & DNS_DISPATCHATTR_EXCLUSIVE);
10025 }
10026
10027 res->dispatches6 = NULL;
10028 if (dispatchv6 != NULL) {
10029 dns_dispatchset_create(view->mctx, socketmgr, taskmgr,
10030 dispatchv6, &res->dispatches6, ndisp);
10031 dispattr = dns_dispatch_getattributes(dispatchv6);
10032 res->exclusivev6 = (dispattr & DNS_DISPATCHATTR_EXCLUSIVE);
10033 }
10034
10035 res->querydscp4 = -1;
10036 res->querydscp6 = -1;
10037 res->references = 1;
10038 res->exiting = false;
10039 res->frozen = false;
10040 ISC_LIST_INIT(res->whenshutdown);
10041 res->priming = false;
10042 res->primefetch = NULL;
10043 res->nfctx = 0;
10044
10045 isc_mutex_init(&res->lock);
10046 isc_mutex_init(&res->nlock);
10047 isc_mutex_init(&res->primelock);
10048
10049 task = NULL;
10050 result = isc_task_create(taskmgr, 0, &task);
10051 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
10052 goto cleanup_primelock;
10053 isc_task_setname(task, "resolver_task", NULL);
10054
10055 result = isc_timer_create(timermgr, isc_timertype_inactive, NULL, NULL,
10056 task, spillattimer_countdown, res,
10057 &res->spillattimer);
10058 isc_task_detach(&task);
10059 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
10060 goto cleanup_primelock;
10061
10062#if USE_ALGLOCK
10063 result = isc_rwlock_init(&res->alglock, 0, 0);
10064 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
10065 goto cleanup_spillattimer;
10066#endif
10067#if USE_MBSLOCK
10068 result = isc_rwlock_init(&res->mbslock, 0, 0);
10069 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
10070#if USE_ALGLOCK
10071 goto cleanup_alglock;
10072#else
10073 goto cleanup_spillattimer;
10074#endif
10075#endif
10076
10077 res->magic = RES_MAGIC;
10078
10079 *resp = res;
10080
10081 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
10082
10083#if USE_ALGLOCK && USE_MBSLOCK
10084 cleanup_alglock:
10085 isc_rwlock_destroy(&res->alglock);
10086#endif
10087
10088#if USE_ALGLOCK || USE_MBSLOCK
10089 cleanup_spillattimer:
10090 isc_timer_detach(&res->spillattimer);
10091#endif
10092
10093 cleanup_primelock:
10094 isc_mutex_destroy(&res->primelock);
10095 isc_mutex_destroy(&res->nlock);
10096 isc_mutex_destroy(&res->lock);
10097
10098 if (res->dispatches6 != NULL)
10099 dns_dispatchset_destroy(&res->dispatches6);
10100 if (res->dispatches4 != NULL)
10101 dns_dispatchset_destroy(&res->dispatches4);
10102
10103 for (i = 0; i < dbuckets_created; i++) {
10104 isc_mutex_destroy(&res->dbuckets[i].lock);
10105 isc_mem_detach(&res->dbuckets[i].mctx);
10106 }
10107 isc_mem_put(view->mctx, res->dbuckets,
10108 RES_DOMAIN_BUCKETS * sizeof(zonebucket_t));
10109
10110 cleanup_buckets:
10111 for (i = 0; i < buckets_created; i++) {
10112 isc_mem_detach(&res->buckets[i].mctx);
10113 isc_mutex_destroy(&res->buckets[i].lock);
10114 isc_task_shutdown(res->buckets[i].task);
10115 isc_task_detach(&res->buckets[i].task);
10116 }
10117 isc_mem_put(view->mctx, res->buckets,
10118 res->nbuckets * sizeof(fctxbucket_t));
10119
10120 cleanup_badcache:
10121 dns_badcache_destroy(&res->badcache);
10122
10123 cleanup_res:
10124 isc_mem_put(view->mctx, res, sizeof(*res));
10125
10126 return (result);
10127}
10128
10129static void
10130prime_done(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
10131 dns_resolver_t *res;
10132 dns_fetchevent_t *fevent;
10133 dns_fetch_t *fetch;
10134 dns_db_t *db = NULL;
10135
10136 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_FETCHDONE);
10137 fevent = (dns_fetchevent_t *)event;
10138 res = event->ev_arg;
10139 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(res));
10140
10141 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
10142 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, ISC_LOG_INFO,
10143 "resolver priming query complete");
10144
10145 UNUSED(task);
10146
10147 LOCK(&res->lock);
10148
10149 INSIST(res->priming);
10150 res->priming = false;
10151 LOCK(&res->primelock);
10152 fetch = res->primefetch;
10153 res->primefetch = NULL;
10154 UNLOCK(&res->primelock);
10155
10156 UNLOCK(&res->lock);
10157
10158 if (fevent->result == ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
10159 res->view->cache != NULL && res->view->hints != NULL) {
10160 dns_cache_attachdb(res->view->cache, &db);
10161 dns_root_checkhints(res->view, res->view->hints, db);
10162 dns_db_detach(&db);
10163 }
10164
10165 if (fevent->node != NULL)
10166 dns_db_detachnode(fevent->db, &fevent->node);
10167 if (fevent->db != NULL)
10168 dns_db_detach(&fevent->db);
10169 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(fevent->rdataset))
10170 dns_rdataset_disassociate(fevent->rdataset);
10171 INSIST(fevent->sigrdataset == NULL);
10172
10173 isc_mem_put(res->mctx, fevent->rdataset, sizeof(*fevent->rdataset));
10174
10175 isc_event_free(&event);
10176 dns_resolver_destroyfetch(&fetch);
10177}
10178
10179void
10180dns_resolver_prime(dns_resolver_t *res) {
10181 bool want_priming = false;
10182 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
10183 isc_result_t result;
10184
10185 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(res));
10186 REQUIRE(res->frozen);
10187
10188 RTRACE("dns_resolver_prime");
10189
10190 LOCK(&res->lock);
10191
10192 if (!res->exiting && !res->priming) {
10193 INSIST(res->primefetch == NULL);
10194 res->priming = true;
10195 want_priming = true;
10196 }
10197
10198 UNLOCK(&res->lock);
10199
10200 if (want_priming) {
10201 /*
10202 * To avoid any possible recursive locking problems, we
10203 * start the priming fetch like any other fetch, and holding
10204 * no resolver locks. No one else will try to start it
10205 * because we're the ones who set res->priming to true.
10206 * Any other callers of dns_resolver_prime() while we're
10207 * running will see that res->priming is already true and
10208 * do nothing.
10209 */
10210 RTRACE("priming");
10211 rdataset = isc_mem_get(res->mctx, sizeof(*rdataset));
10212 if (rdataset == NULL) {
10213 LOCK(&res->lock);
10214 INSIST(res->priming);
10215 INSIST(res->primefetch == NULL);
10216 res->priming = false;
10217 UNLOCK(&res->lock);
10218 return;
10219 }
10220 dns_rdataset_init(rdataset);
10221 LOCK(&res->primelock);
10222 result = dns_resolver_createfetch(res, dns_rootname,
10223 dns_rdatatype_ns,
10224 NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0,
10225 DNS_FETCHOPT_NOFORWARD, 0,
10226 NULL, res->buckets[0].task,
10227 prime_done, res, rdataset,
10228 NULL, &res->primefetch);
10229 UNLOCK(&res->primelock);
10230 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
10231 isc_mem_put(res->mctx, rdataset, sizeof(*rdataset));
10232 LOCK(&res->lock);
10233 INSIST(res->priming);
10234 res->priming = false;
10235 UNLOCK(&res->lock);
10236 }
10237 inc_stats(res, dns_resstatscounter_priming);
10238 }
10239}
10240
10241void
10242dns_resolver_freeze(dns_resolver_t *res) {
10243 /*
10244 * Freeze resolver.
10245 */
10246
10247 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(res));
10248
10249 res->frozen = true;
10250}
10251
10252void
10253dns_resolver_attach(dns_resolver_t *source, dns_resolver_t **targetp) {
10254 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(source));
10255 REQUIRE(targetp != NULL && *targetp == NULL);
10256
10257 RRTRACE(source, "attach");
10258 LOCK(&source->lock);
10259 REQUIRE(!source->exiting);
10260
10261 INSIST(source->references > 0);
10262 source->references++;
10263 INSIST(source->references != 0);
10264 UNLOCK(&source->lock);
10265
10266 *targetp = source;
10267}
10268
10269void
10270dns_resolver_whenshutdown(dns_resolver_t *res, isc_task_t *task,
10271 isc_event_t **eventp)
10272{
10273 isc_task_t *tclone;
10274 isc_event_t *event;
10275
10276 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(res));
10277 REQUIRE(eventp != NULL);
10278
10279 event = *eventp;
10280 *eventp = NULL;
10281
10282 LOCK(&res->lock);
10283
10284 if (res->exiting && res->activebuckets == 0) {
10285 /*
10286 * We're already shutdown. Send the event.
10287 */
10288 event->ev_sender = res;
10289 isc_task_send(task, &event);
10290 } else {
10291 tclone = NULL;
10292 isc_task_attach(task, &tclone);
10293 event->ev_sender = tclone;
10294 ISC_LIST_APPEND(res->whenshutdown, event, ev_link);
10295 }
10296
10297 UNLOCK(&res->lock);
10298}
10299
10300void
10301dns_resolver_shutdown(dns_resolver_t *res) {
10302 unsigned int i;
10303 fetchctx_t *fctx;
10304 isc_result_t result;
10305
10306 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(res));
10307
10308 RTRACE("shutdown");
10309
10310 LOCK(&res->lock);
10311
10312 if (!res->exiting) {
10313 RTRACE("exiting");
10314 res->exiting = true;
10315
10316 for (i = 0; i < res->nbuckets; i++) {
10317 LOCK(&res->buckets[i].lock);
10318 for (fctx = ISC_LIST_HEAD(res->buckets[i].fctxs);
10319 fctx != NULL;
10320 fctx = ISC_LIST_NEXT(fctx, link))
10321 fctx_shutdown(fctx);
10322 if (res->dispatches4 != NULL && !res->exclusivev4) {
10323 dns_dispatchset_cancelall(res->dispatches4,
10324 res->buckets[i].task);
10325 }
10326 if (res->dispatches6 != NULL && !res->exclusivev6) {
10327 dns_dispatchset_cancelall(res->dispatches6,
10328 res->buckets[i].task);
10329 }
10330 res->buckets[i].exiting = true;
10331 if (ISC_LIST_EMPTY(res->buckets[i].fctxs)) {
10332 INSIST(res->activebuckets > 0);
10333 res->activebuckets--;
10334 }
10335 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[i].lock);
10336 }
10337 if (res->activebuckets == 0)
10338 send_shutdown_events(res);
10339 result = isc_timer_reset(res->spillattimer,
10340 isc_timertype_inactive, NULL,
10341 NULL, true);
10342 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
10343 }
10344
10345 UNLOCK(&res->lock);
10346}
10347
10348void
10349dns_resolver_detach(dns_resolver_t **resp) {
10350 dns_resolver_t *res;
10351 bool need_destroy = false;
10352
10353 REQUIRE(resp != NULL);
10354 res = *resp;
10355 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(res));
10356
10357 RTRACE("detach");
10358
10359 LOCK(&res->lock);
10360
10361 INSIST(res->references > 0);
10362 res->references--;
10363 if (res->references == 0) {
10364 INSIST(res->exiting && res->activebuckets == 0);
10365 need_destroy = true;
10366 }
10367
10368 UNLOCK(&res->lock);
10369
10370 if (need_destroy)
10371 destroy(res);
10372
10373 *resp = NULL;
10374}
10375
10376static inline bool
10377fctx_match(fetchctx_t *fctx, const dns_name_t *name, dns_rdatatype_t type,
10378 unsigned int options)
10379{
10380 /*
10381 * Don't match fetch contexts that are shutting down.
10382 */
10383 if (fctx->cloned || fctx->state == fetchstate_done ||
10384 ISC_LIST_EMPTY(fctx->events))
10385 return (false);
10386
10387 if (fctx->type != type || fctx->options != options)
10388 return (false);
10389 return (dns_name_equal(&fctx->name, name));
10390}
10391
10392static inline void
10393log_fetch(const dns_name_t *name, dns_rdatatype_t type) {
10394 char namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
10395 char typebuf[DNS_RDATATYPE_FORMATSIZE];
10396 int level = ISC_LOG_DEBUG(1);
10397
10398 /*
10399 * If there's no chance of logging it, don't render (format) the
10400 * name and RDATA type (further below), and return early.
10401 */
10402 if (! isc_log_wouldlog(dns_lctx, level))
10403 return;
10404
10405 dns_name_format(name, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
10406 dns_rdatatype_format(type, typebuf, sizeof(typebuf));
10407
10408 isc_log_write(dns_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_RESOLVER,
10409 DNS_LOGMODULE_RESOLVER, level,
10410 "fetch: %s/%s", namebuf, typebuf);
10411}
10412
10413static isc_result_t
10414fctx_minimize_qname(fetchctx_t *fctx) {
10415 isc_result_t result;
10416 unsigned int dlabels, nlabels;
10417
10418 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
10419
10420 dlabels = dns_name_countlabels(&fctx->qmindcname);
10421 nlabels = dns_name_countlabels(&fctx->name);
10422 dns_name_free(&fctx->qminname, fctx->mctx);
10423 dns_name_init(&fctx->qminname, NULL);
10424
10425 if (dlabels > fctx->qmin_labels) {
10426 fctx->qmin_labels = dlabels + 1;
10427 } else {
10428 fctx->qmin_labels++;
10429 }
10430
10431 if (fctx->ip6arpaskip) {
10432 /*
10433 * For ip6.arpa we want to skip some of the labels, with
10434 * boundaries at /16, /32, /48, /56, /64 and /128
10435 * In 'label count' terms that's equal to
10436 * 7 11 15 17 19 35
10437 * We fix fctx->qmin_labels to point to the nearest boundary
10438 */
10439 if (fctx->qmin_labels < 7) {
10440 fctx->qmin_labels = 7;
10441 } else if (fctx->qmin_labels < 11) {
10442 fctx->qmin_labels = 11;
10443 } else if (fctx->qmin_labels < 15) {
10444 fctx->qmin_labels = 15;
10445 } else if (fctx->qmin_labels < 17) {
10446 fctx->qmin_labels = 17;
10447 } else if (fctx->qmin_labels < 19) {
10448 fctx->qmin_labels = 19;
10449 } else if (fctx->qmin_labels > 19) {
10450 fctx->qmin_labels = 35;
10451 }
10452 } else if (fctx->qmin_labels > DNS_QMIN_MAXLABELS) {
10453 fctx->qmin_labels = DNS_MAX_LABELS + 1;
10454 }
10455
10456 if (fctx->qmin_labels < nlabels) {
10457 /*
10458 * We want to query for qmin_labels from fctx->name
10459 */
10460 dns_fixedname_t fname;
10461 dns_fixedname_init(&fname);
10462 dns_name_split(&fctx->name,
10463 fctx->qmin_labels,
10464 NULL, dns_fixedname_name(&fname));
10465 result = dns_name_dup(dns_fixedname_name(&fname), fctx->mctx,
10466 &fctx->qminname);
10467 fctx->qmintype = dns_rdatatype_ns;
10468 fctx->minimized = true;
10469 } else {
10470 /* Minimization is done, we'll ask for whole qname */
10471 fctx->qmintype = fctx->type;
10472 result = dns_name_dup(&fctx->name, fctx->mctx, &fctx->qminname);
10473 fctx->minimized = false;
10474 }
10475
10476 return (result);
10477}
10478
10479isc_result_t
10480dns_resolver_createfetch(dns_resolver_t *res, const dns_name_t *name,
10481 dns_rdatatype_t type,
10482 const dns_name_t *domain, dns_rdataset_t *nameservers,
10483 dns_forwarders_t *forwarders,
10484 const isc_sockaddr_t *client, dns_messageid_t id,
10485 unsigned int options, unsigned int depth,
10486 isc_counter_t *qc, isc_task_t *task,
10487 isc_taskaction_t action, void *arg,
10488 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset,
10489 dns_rdataset_t *sigrdataset,
10490 dns_fetch_t **fetchp)
10491{
10492 dns_fetch_t *fetch;
10493 fetchctx_t *fctx = NULL;
10494 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
10495 unsigned int bucketnum;
10496 bool new_fctx = false;
10497 isc_event_t *event;
10498 unsigned int count = 0;
10499 unsigned int spillat;
10500 unsigned int spillatmin;
10501 bool dodestroy = false;
10502
10503 UNUSED(forwarders);
10504
10505 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(res));
10506 REQUIRE(res->frozen);
10507 /* XXXRTH Check for meta type */
10508 if (domain != NULL) {
10509 REQUIRE(DNS_RDATASET_VALID(nameservers));
10510 REQUIRE(nameservers->type == dns_rdatatype_ns);
10511 } else
10512 REQUIRE(nameservers == NULL);
10513 REQUIRE(forwarders == NULL);
10514 REQUIRE(!dns_rdataset_isassociated(rdataset));
10515 REQUIRE(sigrdataset == NULL ||
10516 !dns_rdataset_isassociated(sigrdataset));
10517 REQUIRE(fetchp != NULL && *fetchp == NULL);
10518
10519 log_fetch(name, type);
10520
10521 /*
10522 * XXXRTH use a mempool?
10523 */
10524 fetch = isc_mem_get(res->mctx, sizeof(*fetch));
10525 if (fetch == NULL)
10526 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
10527 fetch->mctx = NULL;
10528 isc_mem_attach(res->mctx, &fetch->mctx);
10529
10530 bucketnum = dns_name_fullhash(name, false) % res->nbuckets;
10531
10532 LOCK(&res->lock);
10533 spillat = res->spillat;
10534 spillatmin = res->spillatmin;
10535 UNLOCK(&res->lock);
10536 LOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
10537
10538 if (res->buckets[bucketnum].exiting) {
10539 result = ISC_R_SHUTTINGDOWN;
10540 goto unlock;
10541 }
10542
10543 if ((options & DNS_FETCHOPT_UNSHARED) == 0) {
10544 for (fctx = ISC_LIST_HEAD(res->buckets[bucketnum].fctxs);
10545 fctx != NULL;
10546 fctx = ISC_LIST_NEXT(fctx, link)) {
10547 if (fctx_match(fctx, name, type, options))
10548 break;
10549 }
10550 }
10551
10552 /*
10553 * Is this a duplicate?
10554 */
10555 if (fctx != NULL && client != NULL) {
10556 dns_fetchevent_t *fevent;
10557 for (fevent = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->events);
10558 fevent != NULL;
10559 fevent = ISC_LIST_NEXT(fevent, ev_link)) {
10560 if (fevent->client != NULL && fevent->id == id &&
10561 isc_sockaddr_equal(fevent->client, client)) {
10562 result = DNS_R_DUPLICATE;
10563 goto unlock;
10564 }
10565 count++;
10566 }
10567 }
10568 if (count >= spillatmin && spillatmin != 0) {
10569 INSIST(fctx != NULL);
10570 if (count >= spillat)
10571 fctx->spilled = true;
10572 if (fctx->spilled) {
10573 result = DNS_R_DROP;
10574 goto unlock;
10575 }
10576 }
10577
10578 if (fctx == NULL) {
10579 result = fctx_create(res, name, type, domain, nameservers,
10580 options, bucketnum, depth, qc, &fctx);
10581 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
10582 goto unlock;
10583 new_fctx = true;
10584 } else if (fctx->depth > depth)
10585 fctx->depth = depth;
10586
10587 result = fctx_join(fctx, task, client, id, action, arg,
10588 rdataset, sigrdataset, fetch);
10589 if (new_fctx) {
10590 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
10591 /*
10592 * Launch this fctx.
10593 */
10594 event = &fctx->control_event;
10595 ISC_EVENT_INIT(event, sizeof(*event), 0, NULL,
10596 DNS_EVENT_FETCHCONTROL,
10597 fctx_start, fctx, NULL,
10598 NULL, NULL);
10599 isc_task_send(res->buckets[bucketnum].task, &event);
10600 } else {
10601 /*
10602 * We don't care about the result of fctx_unlink()
10603 * since we know we're not exiting.
10604 */
10605 (void)fctx_unlink(fctx);
10606 dodestroy = true;
10607 }
10608 }
10609
10610 unlock:
10611 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
10612
10613 if (dodestroy)
10614 fctx_destroy(fctx);
10615
10616 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
10617 FTRACE("created");
10618 *fetchp = fetch;
10619 } else
10620 isc_mem_putanddetach(&fetch->mctx, fetch, sizeof(*fetch));
10621
10622 return (result);
10623}
10624
10625void
10626dns_resolver_cancelfetch(dns_fetch_t *fetch) {
10627 fetchctx_t *fctx;
10628 dns_resolver_t *res;
10629 dns_fetchevent_t *event, *next_event;
10630 isc_task_t *etask;
10631
10632 REQUIRE(DNS_FETCH_VALID(fetch));
10633 fctx = fetch->private;
10634 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
10635 res = fctx->res;
10636
10637 FTRACE("cancelfetch");
10638
10639 LOCK(&res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
10640
10641 /*
10642 * Find the completion event for this fetch (as opposed
10643 * to those for other fetches that have joined the same
10644 * fctx) and send it with result = ISC_R_CANCELED.
10645 */
10646 event = NULL;
10647 if (fctx->state != fetchstate_done) {
10648 for (event = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->events);
10649 event != NULL;
10650 event = next_event) {
10651 next_event = ISC_LIST_NEXT(event, ev_link);
10652 if (event->fetch == fetch) {
10653 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(fctx->events, event, ev_link);
10654 break;
10655 }
10656 }
10657 }
10658 if (event != NULL) {
10659 etask = event->ev_sender;
10660 event->ev_sender = fctx;
10661 event->result = ISC_R_CANCELED;
10662 isc_task_sendanddetach(&etask, ISC_EVENT_PTR(&event));
10663 }
10664 /*
10665 * The fctx continues running even if no fetches remain;
10666 * the answer is still cached.
10667 */
10668
10669 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
10670}
10671
10672void
10673dns_resolver_destroyfetch(dns_fetch_t **fetchp) {
10674 dns_fetch_t *fetch;
10675 dns_resolver_t *res;
10676 dns_fetchevent_t *event, *next_event;
10677 fetchctx_t *fctx;
10678 unsigned int bucketnum;
10679 bool bucket_empty;
10680
10681 REQUIRE(fetchp != NULL);
10682 fetch = *fetchp;
10683 REQUIRE(DNS_FETCH_VALID(fetch));
10684 fctx = fetch->private;
10685 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
10686 res = fctx->res;
10687
10688 FTRACE("destroyfetch");
10689
10690 bucketnum = fctx->bucketnum;
10691 LOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
10692
10693 /*
10694 * Sanity check: the caller should have gotten its event before
10695 * trying to destroy the fetch.
10696 */
10697 event = NULL;
10698 if (fctx->state != fetchstate_done) {
10699 for (event = ISC_LIST_HEAD(fctx->events);
10700 event != NULL;
10701 event = next_event) {
10702 next_event = ISC_LIST_NEXT(event, ev_link);
10703 RUNTIME_CHECK(event->fetch != fetch);
10704 }
10705 }
10706
10707 bucket_empty = fctx_decreference(fctx);
10708
10709 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[bucketnum].lock);
10710
10711 isc_mem_putanddetach(&fetch->mctx, fetch, sizeof(*fetch));
10712 *fetchp = NULL;
10713
10714 if (bucket_empty)
10715 empty_bucket(res);
10716}
10717
10718void
10719dns_resolver_logfetch(dns_fetch_t *fetch, isc_log_t *lctx,
10720 isc_logcategory_t *category, isc_logmodule_t *module,
10721 int level, bool duplicateok)
10722{
10723 fetchctx_t *fctx;
10724 dns_resolver_t *res;
10725 char domainbuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
10726
10727 REQUIRE(DNS_FETCH_VALID(fetch));
10728 fctx = fetch->private;
10729 REQUIRE(VALID_FCTX(fctx));
10730 res = fctx->res;
10731
10732 LOCK(&res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
10733
10734 INSIST(fctx->exitline >= 0);
10735 if (!fctx->logged || duplicateok) {
10736 dns_name_format(&fctx->domain, domainbuf, sizeof(domainbuf));
10737 isc_log_write(lctx, category, module, level,
10738 "fetch completed at %s:%d for %s in "
10739 "%" PRIu64 "."
10740 "%06" PRIu64 ": %s/%s "
10741 "[domain:%s,referral:%u,restart:%u,qrysent:%u,"
10742 "timeout:%u,lame:%u,quota:%u,neterr:%u,"
10743 "badresp:%u,adberr:%u,findfail:%u,valfail:%u]",
10744 __FILE__, fctx->exitline, fctx->info,
10745 fctx->duration / US_PER_SEC,
10746 fctx->duration % US_PER_SEC,
10747 isc_result_totext(fctx->result),
10748 isc_result_totext(fctx->vresult), domainbuf,
10749 fctx->referrals, fctx->restarts,
10750 fctx->querysent, fctx->timeouts,
10751 fctx->lamecount, fctx->quotacount,
10752 fctx->neterr, fctx->badresp, fctx->adberr,
10753 fctx->findfail, fctx->valfail);
10754 fctx->logged = true;
10755 }
10756
10757 UNLOCK(&res->buckets[fctx->bucketnum].lock);
10758}
10759
10760dns_dispatchmgr_t *
10761dns_resolver_dispatchmgr(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
10762 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
10763 return (resolver->dispatchmgr);
10764}
10765
10766dns_dispatch_t *
10767dns_resolver_dispatchv4(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
10768 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
10769 return (dns_dispatchset_get(resolver->dispatches4));
10770}
10771
10772dns_dispatch_t *
10773dns_resolver_dispatchv6(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
10774 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
10775 return (dns_dispatchset_get(resolver->dispatches6));
10776}
10777
