10779dns_resolver_socketmgr(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
10780 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
10781 return (resolver->socketmgr);
10782}
10783
10784isc_taskmgr_t *
10785dns_resolver_taskmgr(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
10786 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
10787 return (resolver->taskmgr);
10788}
10789
10790uint32_t
10791dns_resolver_getlamettl(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
10792 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
10793 return (resolver->lame_ttl);
10794}
10795
10796void
10797dns_resolver_setlamettl(dns_resolver_t *resolver, uint32_t lame_ttl) {
10798 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
10799 resolver->lame_ttl = lame_ttl;
10800}
10801
10802unsigned int
10803dns_resolver_nrunning(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
10804 unsigned int n;
10805 LOCK(&resolver->nlock);
10806 n = resolver->nfctx;
10807 UNLOCK(&resolver->nlock);
10808 return (n);
10809}
10810
10811isc_result_t
10812dns_resolver_addalternate(dns_resolver_t *resolver, const isc_sockaddr_t *alt,
10813 const dns_name_t *name, in_port_t port) {
10814 alternate_t *a;
10815 isc_result_t result;
10816
10817 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
10818 REQUIRE(!resolver->frozen);
10819 REQUIRE((alt == NULL) ^ (name == NULL));
10820
10821 a = isc_mem_get(resolver->mctx, sizeof(*a));
10822 if (a == NULL)
10823 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
10824 if (alt != NULL) {
10825 a->isaddress = true;
10826 a->_u.addr = *alt;
10827 } else {
10828 a->isaddress = false;
10829 a->_u._n.port = port;
10830 dns_name_init(&a->_u._n.name, NULL);
10831 result = dns_name_dup(name, resolver->mctx, &a->_u._n.name);
10832 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
10833 isc_mem_put(resolver->mctx, a, sizeof(*a));
10834 return (result);
10835 }
10836 }
10837 ISC_LINK_INIT(a, link);
10838 ISC_LIST_APPEND(resolver->alternates, a, link);
10839
10840 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
10841}
10842
10843void
10844dns_resolver_setudpsize(dns_resolver_t *resolver, uint16_t udpsize) {
10845 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
10846 resolver->udpsize = udpsize;
10847}
10848
10849uint16_t
10850dns_resolver_getudpsize(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
10851 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
10852 return (resolver->udpsize);
10853}
10854
10855void
10856dns_resolver_flushbadcache(dns_resolver_t *resolver, const dns_name_t *name) {
10857 if (name != NULL)
10858 dns_badcache_flushname(resolver->badcache, name);
10859 else
10860 dns_badcache_flush(resolver->badcache);
10861}
10862
10863void
10864dns_resolver_flushbadnames(dns_resolver_t *resolver, const dns_name_t *name) {
10865 dns_badcache_flushtree(resolver->badcache, name);
10866}
10867
10868void
10869dns_resolver_addbadcache(dns_resolver_t *resolver, const dns_name_t *name,
10870 dns_rdatatype_t type, isc_time_t *expire)
10871{
10872#ifdef ENABLE_AFL
10873 if (!dns_fuzzing_resolver)
10874#endif
10875 {
10876 dns_badcache_add(resolver->badcache, name, type,
10877 false, 0, expire);
10878 }
10879}
10880
10881bool
10882dns_resolver_getbadcache(dns_resolver_t *resolver, const dns_name_t *name,
10883 dns_rdatatype_t type, isc_time_t *now)
10884{
10885 return (dns_badcache_find(resolver->badcache, name, type, NULL, now));
10886}
10887
10888void
10889dns_resolver_printbadcache(dns_resolver_t *resolver, FILE *fp) {
10890 (void) dns_badcache_print(resolver->badcache, "Bad cache", fp);
10891}
10892
10893static void
10894free_algorithm(void *node, void *arg) {
10895 unsigned char *algorithms = node;
10896 isc_mem_t *mctx = arg;
10897
10898 isc_mem_put(mctx, algorithms, *algorithms);
10899}
10900
10901void
10902dns_resolver_reset_algorithms(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
10903
10904 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
10905
10906#if USE_ALGLOCK
10907 RWLOCK(&resolver->alglock, isc_rwlocktype_write);
10908#endif
10909 if (resolver->algorithms != NULL)
10910 dns_rbt_destroy(&resolver->algorithms);
10911#if USE_ALGLOCK
10912 RWUNLOCK(&resolver->alglock, isc_rwlocktype_write);
10913#endif
10914}
10915
10916isc_result_t
10917dns_resolver_disable_algorithm(dns_resolver_t *resolver,
10918 const dns_name_t *name,
10919 unsigned int alg)
10920{
10921 unsigned int len, mask;
10922 unsigned char *tmp;
10923 unsigned char *algorithms;
10924 isc_result_t result;
10925 dns_rbtnode_t *node = NULL;
10926
10927 /*
10928 * Whether an algorithm is disabled (or not) is stored in a
10929 * per-name bitfield that is stored as the node data of an
10930 * RBT.
10931 */
10932
10933 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
10934 if (alg > 255)
10935 return (ISC_R_RANGE);
10936
10937#if USE_ALGLOCK
10938 RWLOCK(&resolver->alglock, isc_rwlocktype_write);
10939#endif
10940 if (resolver->algorithms == NULL) {
10941 result = dns_rbt_create(resolver->mctx, free_algorithm,
10942 resolver->mctx, &resolver->algorithms);
10943 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
10944 goto cleanup;
10945 }
10946
10947 len = alg/8 + 2;
10948 mask = 1 << (alg%8);
10949
10950 result = dns_rbt_addnode(resolver->algorithms, name, &node);
10951
10952 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == ISC_R_EXISTS) {
10953 algorithms = node->data;
10954 /*
10955 * If algorithms is set, algorithms[0] contains its
10956 * length.
10957 */
10958 if (algorithms == NULL || len > *algorithms) {
10959 /*
10960 * If no bitfield exists in the node data, or if
10961 * it is not long enough, allocate a new
10962 * bitfield and copy the old (smaller) bitfield
10963 * into it if one exists.
10964 */
10965 tmp = isc_mem_get(resolver->mctx, len);
10966 if (tmp == NULL) {
10967 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
10968 goto cleanup;
10969 }
10970 memset(tmp, 0, len);
10971 if (algorithms != NULL)
10972 memmove(tmp, algorithms, *algorithms);
10973 tmp[len-1] |= mask;
10974 /* 'tmp[0]' should contain the length of 'tmp'. */
10975 *tmp = len;
10976 node->data = tmp;
10977 /* Free the older bitfield. */
10978 if (algorithms != NULL)
10979 isc_mem_put(resolver->mctx, algorithms,
10980 *algorithms);
10981 } else
10982 algorithms[len-1] |= mask;
10983 }
10984 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
10985 cleanup:
10986#if USE_ALGLOCK
10987 RWUNLOCK(&resolver->alglock, isc_rwlocktype_write);
10988#endif
10989 return (result);
10990}
10991
10992bool
10993dns_resolver_algorithm_supported(dns_resolver_t *resolver,
10994 const dns_name_t *name, unsigned int alg)
10995{
10996 unsigned int len, mask;
10997 unsigned char *algorithms;
10998 void *data = NULL;
10999 isc_result_t result;
11000 bool found = false;
11001
11002 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11003
11004 /*
11005 * DH is unsupported for DNSKEYs, see RFC 4034 sec. A.1.
11006 */
11007 if ((alg == DST_ALG_DH) || (alg == DST_ALG_INDIRECT))
11008 return (false);
11009
11010#if USE_ALGLOCK
11011 RWLOCK(&resolver->alglock, isc_rwlocktype_read);
11012#endif
11013 if (resolver->algorithms == NULL)
11014 goto unlock;
11015 result = dns_rbt_findname(resolver->algorithms, name, 0, NULL, &data);
11016 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == DNS_R_PARTIALMATCH) {
11017 len = alg/8 + 2;
11018 mask = 1 << (alg%8);
11019 algorithms = data;
11020 if (len <= *algorithms && (algorithms[len-1] & mask) != 0)
11021 found = true;
11022 }
11023 unlock:
11024#if USE_ALGLOCK
11025 RWUNLOCK(&resolver->alglock, isc_rwlocktype_read);
11026#endif
11027 if (found)
11028 return (false);
11029
11030 return (dst_algorithm_supported(alg));
11031}
11032
11033static void
11034free_digest(void *node, void *arg) {
11035 unsigned char *digests = node;
11036 isc_mem_t *mctx = arg;
11037
11038 isc_mem_put(mctx, digests, *digests);
11039}
11040
11041void
11042dns_resolver_reset_ds_digests(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
11043
11044 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11045
11046#if USE_ALGLOCK
11047 RWLOCK(&resolver->alglock, isc_rwlocktype_write);
11048#endif
11049 if (resolver->digests != NULL)
11050 dns_rbt_destroy(&resolver->digests);
11051#if USE_ALGLOCK
11052 RWUNLOCK(&resolver->alglock, isc_rwlocktype_write);
11053#endif
11054}
11055
11056isc_result_t
11057dns_resolver_disable_ds_digest(dns_resolver_t *resolver,
11058 const dns_name_t *name,
11059 unsigned int digest_type)
11060{
11061 unsigned int len, mask;
11062 unsigned char *tmp;
11063 unsigned char *digests;
11064 isc_result_t result;
11065 dns_rbtnode_t *node = NULL;
11066
11067 /*
11068 * Whether a digest is disabled (or not) is stored in a per-name
11069 * bitfield that is stored as the node data of an RBT.
11070 */
11071
11072 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11073 if (digest_type > 255)
11074 return (ISC_R_RANGE);
11075
11076#if USE_ALGLOCK
11077 RWLOCK(&resolver->alglock, isc_rwlocktype_write);
11078#endif
11079 if (resolver->digests == NULL) {
11080 result = dns_rbt_create(resolver->mctx, free_digest,
11081 resolver->mctx, &resolver->digests);
11082 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
11083 goto cleanup;
11084 }
11085
11086 len = digest_type/8 + 2;
11087 mask = 1 << (digest_type%8);
11088
11089 result = dns_rbt_addnode(resolver->digests, name, &node);
11090
11091 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == ISC_R_EXISTS) {
11092 digests = node->data;
11093 /* If digests is set, digests[0] contains its length. */
11094 if (digests == NULL || len > *digests) {
11095 /*
11096 * If no bitfield exists in the node data, or if
11097 * it is not long enough, allocate a new
11098 * bitfield and copy the old (smaller) bitfield
11099 * into it if one exists.
11100 */
11101 tmp = isc_mem_get(resolver->mctx, len);
11102 if (tmp == NULL) {
11103 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
11104 goto cleanup;
11105 }
11106 memset(tmp, 0, len);
11107 if (digests != NULL)
11108 memmove(tmp, digests, *digests);
11109 tmp[len-1] |= mask;
11110 /* tmp[0] should contain the length of 'tmp'. */
11111 *tmp = len;
11112 node->data = tmp;
11113 /* Free the older bitfield. */
11114 if (digests != NULL)
11115 isc_mem_put(resolver->mctx, digests,
11116 *digests);
11117 } else
11118 digests[len-1] |= mask;
11119 }
11120 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
11121 cleanup:
11122#if USE_ALGLOCK
11123 RWUNLOCK(&resolver->alglock, isc_rwlocktype_write);
11124#endif
11125 return (result);
11126}
11127
11128bool
11129dns_resolver_ds_digest_supported(dns_resolver_t *resolver,
11130 const dns_name_t *name,
11131 unsigned int digest_type)
11132{
11133 unsigned int len, mask;
11134 unsigned char *digests;
11135 void *data = NULL;
11136 isc_result_t result;
11137 bool found = false;
11138
11139 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11140
11141#if USE_ALGLOCK
11142 RWLOCK(&resolver->alglock, isc_rwlocktype_read);
11143#endif
11144 if (resolver->digests == NULL)
11145 goto unlock;
11146 result = dns_rbt_findname(resolver->digests, name, 0, NULL, &data);
11147 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == DNS_R_PARTIALMATCH) {
11148 len = digest_type/8 + 2;
11149 mask = 1 << (digest_type%8);
11150 digests = data;
11151 if (len <= *digests && (digests[len-1] & mask) != 0)
11152 found = true;
11153 }
11154 unlock:
11155#if USE_ALGLOCK
11156 RWUNLOCK(&resolver->alglock, isc_rwlocktype_read);
11157#endif
11158 if (found)
11159 return (false);
11160 return (dst_ds_digest_supported(digest_type));
11161}
11162
11163void
11164dns_resolver_resetmustbesecure(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
11165
11166 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11167
11168#if USE_MBSLOCK
11169 RWLOCK(&resolver->mbslock, isc_rwlocktype_write);
11170#endif
11171 if (resolver->mustbesecure != NULL)
11172 dns_rbt_destroy(&resolver->mustbesecure);
11173#if USE_MBSLOCK
11174 RWUNLOCK(&resolver->mbslock, isc_rwlocktype_write);
11175#endif
11176}
11177
11178static bool yes = true, no = false;
11179
11180isc_result_t
11181dns_resolver_setmustbesecure(dns_resolver_t *resolver, const dns_name_t *name,
11182 bool value)
11183{
11184 isc_result_t result;
11185
11186 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11187
11188#if USE_MBSLOCK
11189 RWLOCK(&resolver->mbslock, isc_rwlocktype_write);
11190#endif
11191 if (resolver->mustbesecure == NULL) {
11192 result = dns_rbt_create(resolver->mctx, NULL, NULL,
11193 &resolver->mustbesecure);
11194 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
11195 goto cleanup;
11196 }
11197 result = dns_rbt_addname(resolver->mustbesecure, name,
11198 value ? &yes : &no);
11199 cleanup:
11200#if USE_MBSLOCK
11201 RWUNLOCK(&resolver->mbslock, isc_rwlocktype_write);
11202#endif
11203 return (result);
11204}
11205
11206bool
11207dns_resolver_getmustbesecure(dns_resolver_t *resolver, const dns_name_t *name) {
11208 void *data = NULL;
11209 bool value = false;
11210 isc_result_t result;
11211
11212 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11213
11214#if USE_MBSLOCK
11215 RWLOCK(&resolver->mbslock, isc_rwlocktype_read);
11216#endif
11217 if (resolver->mustbesecure == NULL)
11218 goto unlock;
11219 result = dns_rbt_findname(resolver->mustbesecure, name, 0, NULL, &data);
11220 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == DNS_R_PARTIALMATCH)
11221 value = *(bool*)data;
11222 unlock:
11223#if USE_MBSLOCK
11224 RWUNLOCK(&resolver->mbslock, isc_rwlocktype_read);
11225#endif
11226 return (value);
11227}
11228
11229void
11230dns_resolver_getclientsperquery(dns_resolver_t *resolver, uint32_t *cur,
11231 uint32_t *min, uint32_t *max)
11232{
11233 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11234
11235 LOCK(&resolver->lock);
11236 if (cur != NULL)
11237 *cur = resolver->spillat;
11238 if (min != NULL)
11239 *min = resolver->spillatmin;
11240 if (max != NULL)
11241 *max = resolver->spillatmax;
11242 UNLOCK(&resolver->lock);
11243}
11244
11245void
11246dns_resolver_setclientsperquery(dns_resolver_t *resolver, uint32_t min,
11247 uint32_t max)
11248{
11249 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11250
11251 LOCK(&resolver->lock);
11252 resolver->spillatmin = resolver->spillat = min;
11253 resolver->spillatmax = max;
11254 UNLOCK(&resolver->lock);
11255}
11256
11257void
11258dns_resolver_setfetchesperzone(dns_resolver_t *resolver, uint32_t clients)
11259{
11260 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11261
11262 LOCK(&resolver->lock);
11263 resolver->zspill = clients;
11264 UNLOCK(&resolver->lock);
11265}
11266
11267
11268bool
11269dns_resolver_getzeronosoattl(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
11270 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11271
11272 return (resolver->zero_no_soa_ttl);
11273}
11274
11275void
11276dns_resolver_setzeronosoattl(dns_resolver_t *resolver, bool state) {
11277 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11278
11279 resolver->zero_no_soa_ttl = state;
11280}

11282unsigned int
11283dns_resolver_getoptions(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
11284 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11285
11286 return (resolver->options);
11287}
11288
11289unsigned int
11290dns_resolver_gettimeout(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
11291 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11292
11293 return (resolver->query_timeout);
11294}
11295
11296void
11297dns_resolver_settimeout(dns_resolver_t *resolver, unsigned int timeout) {
11298 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11299
11300 if (timeout <= 300)
11301 timeout *= 1000;
11302
11303 if (timeout == 0)
11304 timeout = DEFAULT_QUERY_TIMEOUT;
11305 if (timeout > MAXIMUM_QUERY_TIMEOUT)
11306 timeout = MAXIMUM_QUERY_TIMEOUT;
11307 if (timeout < MINIMUM_QUERY_TIMEOUT)
11308 timeout = MINIMUM_QUERY_TIMEOUT;
11309
11310 resolver->query_timeout = timeout;
11311}
11312

11314dns_resolver_setquerydscp4(dns_resolver_t *resolver, isc_dscp_t dscp) {
11315 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11316
11317 resolver->querydscp4 = dscp;
11318}

11322 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));

11324}

11349}

11357unsigned int

11359 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11360 return (resolver->maxqueries);
11361}
11362
11363void
11364dns_resolver_dumpfetches(dns_resolver_t *resolver,
11365 isc_statsformat_t format, FILE *fp)
11366{
11367 int i;
11368
11369 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11370 REQUIRE(fp != NULL);
11371 REQUIRE(format == isc_statsformat_file);
11372
11373 for (i = 0; i < RES_DOMAIN_BUCKETS; i++) {
11374 fctxcount_t *fc;
11375 LOCK(&resolver->dbuckets[i].lock);
11376 for (fc = ISC_LIST_HEAD(resolver->dbuckets[i].list);
11377 fc != NULL;
11378 fc = ISC_LIST_NEXT(fc, link))
11379 {
11380 dns_name_print(fc->domain, fp);
11381 fprintf(fp, ": %u active (%u spilled, %u allowed)\n",
11382 fc->count, fc->dropped, fc->allowed);
11383 }
11384 UNLOCK(&resolver->dbuckets[i].lock);
11385 }
11386}
11387
11388void
11389dns_resolver_setquotaresponse(dns_resolver_t *resolver,
11390 dns_quotatype_t which, isc_result_t resp)
11391{
11392 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11393 REQUIRE(which == dns_quotatype_zone || which == dns_quotatype_server);
11394 REQUIRE(resp == DNS_R_DROP || resp == DNS_R_SERVFAIL);
11395
11396 resolver->quotaresp[which] = resp;
11397}
11398
11399isc_result_t
11400dns_resolver_getquotaresponse(dns_resolver_t *resolver, dns_quotatype_t which)
11401{
11402 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11403 REQUIRE(which == dns_quotatype_zone || which == dns_quotatype_server);
11404
11405 return (resolver->quotaresp[which]);
11406}
11407
11408unsigned int
11409dns_resolver_getretryinterval(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
11410 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11411
11412 return (resolver->retryinterval);
11413}
11414
11415void
11416dns_resolver_setretryinterval(dns_resolver_t *resolver, unsigned int interval)
11417{
11418 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11419 REQUIRE(interval > 0);
11420
11421 resolver->retryinterval = ISC_MIN(interval, 2000);
11422}

11424unsigned int
11425dns_resolver_getnonbackofftries(dns_resolver_t *resolver) {
11426 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11427
11428 return (resolver->nonbackofftries);
11429}
11430
11431void
11432dns_resolver_setnonbackofftries(dns_resolver_t *resolver, unsigned int tries) {
11433 REQUIRE(VALID_RESOLVER(resolver));
11434 REQUIRE(tries > 0);
11435
11436 resolver->nonbackofftries = tries;
11437}
